root:
pūjayen manasā taṃ ca puṣpadhūpādibhir budhaḥ |
tadagre deśayet pāpaṃ sarvapuṇyaṃ pramodayet || 4.5 ||
commentary: tadagra ityādi pāpadeśanā kṛtapāpaprakāśanenākaraṇasamvaragrahaṇam | puṇyānumodanā sarvabuddhabodhisattvasaccaritasattvānāṃ puṇyeṣu saharṣasādhukārakaraṇam ||

root:
channopāntaḥ pariṇataphaladyotibhiḥ kānanāmrais  
tvayy ārūḍhe śikharam acalaḥ snigdhaveṇīsavarṇe |  
nūnaṃ yāsyaty amaramithunaprekṣaṇīyām avasthāṃ  
madhye śyāmaḥ stana iva bhuvaḥ śeṣavistārapāṇḍuḥ ||
commentary: prayatno guptau yatnaḥ | vyāḍāḥ sarpādayaḥ | bhūcarā narapiśācādayaḥ śāsakāḥ |

root:
tava karakamalavare nakham adbhutaśṛṅgaṃ 
dalitahiraṇyakaśiputanubhṛṅgam |
keśava dhṛtanaraharirūpa jaya jagadīśa hare || 1.8 ||
commentary: tathā kāmapi bālāṃ śliṣyati upagūhati | kāmapi bālāṃ cumbati | kāmapi rāmāṃ ramayati krīḍayati | sasmitacāru hasitaṃ cāru yathā syāttathā aparām anyāṃ paśyati prekṣate | aparām anugacchati | gacchantīmanusarati |

root:
dṛṣṭiviśrāmahetos tu diśaḥ paśyet kadācana |
ābhāsamātraṃ dṛṣṭvā ca svāgatārthaṃ vilokayet || 5.36 ||
commentary: saṃpūryetyādi. dānādipāramitā eva guṇā, guṇyante 'bhyasyanta iti kṛtvā. tān saṃpūrya paripūrṇān kṛtvā, yat saṃbuddhānāṃ kṛtyaṃ sakalam avaśyakartavyaṃ kṛtsnaṃ tad api kṛtvā, bhūtakoṭeḥ śūnyatālakṣaṇāyāś cittacaittanirodhātmikāyā yat sākṣāt karaṇaṃ tad api sādhyam astīti pāramitānayasthā evaṃ bruvate caturthaṃ sādhyam iti.

root:
śrīmantranītigatacārucaturthaseka-
rūpaṃ vidanti na hi ye sphuṭaśabdaśūnyam |
nānopadeśagaṇasaṃkulasaptabhedais
teṣāṃ sphuṭāvagataye kriyate prayatnaḥ || 2 ||
commentary:
prathamārambhiṇaḥ saṃtatābhyāsena kleśasya parihārārtham āha.

dṛṣṭicittaparikhedaparityāgāya kadācit karhicit diśo vyavalokayet. atha kadācit kaścit tatsamīpam āgacchet, tadā tasya praticchāyāmātraṃ viditvā svāgatavādena saṃtoṣaṇārthaṃ vilokayet. anyathā tatra tasyāvadhyānenākuśalaṃ prasavet.

root:
śaktisaṅgamasaṅkṣobhāc chaktyāveśāvasānikam |
yat sukhaṃ brahmatattvasya tat sukhaṃ svākyam ucyate || Seni 13 ||
commentary:
bhagavatsiddhāntavedānte 'pi dṛṣṭāntopalakṣitaṃ prāg uktam āha—śaktītyādi | śaktir iti lalanā | tatsaṅgamaḥ samparkaḥ | tatsaṅkṣobhaḥ sañcālanaṃ tataḥ | śaktyāveśāvasānikam iti śaktyām aṅganāyām āveṣo 'bhiniveśa uttarottaro 'nutarāgas tadavasānikaṃ tatparyantajaṃ sukhaṃ yad brahmatattvasya jñānatattvasya tat sukhaṃ svākyaṃ svakīyam ucyate | anena bolagarbhatadagrāntarālakapālasthaiḥ sāmyam ācaṣṭe |

	sakalalalanāsamudgatasuratānandakṣaye kāle |
	nodeti saṃvid anyā tāvat kaulāgamābhyudayaḥ ||

iti vacanāt ||

root:
nāsti bhāvako na bhāvo 'sti mantraṃ nāsti na devatā |  
tiṣṭhetau mantradevau ca niṣprapañcasvabhāvataḥ || 11 ||
commentary:
nanvevaṃ śūnyatā tattvam | mudrāyogājjapanāccopāyopetaṃ tadupasūcitam | na tviha kiñcidbhāvyamupadiṣṭamutpannarūpāṇāmeva pañcakulānāṃ yoginīnāṃ nirdeśādyogināṃ ca taddvāreṇaiva tathā sūcanāt | satyaṃ tattvato bhāvyabhāvakabhāvanānāmanupapatterādiśāntatvātsarvadharmāṇām | taddarśayati—nāsti bhāvaketyādi |

tatkiṃ mantradevatayoruccheda evotpannakrama ityāha—tiṣṭhetāviti | niṣprapañcaḥ śūnyataikarasatvāt | svabhāvaḥ sahajamahāsukharūpaḥ | tadrūpeṇa mantradevau tiṣṭhataḥ |

root:
sānandasallakṣaṇamaṇḍitāṅgaṃ
sambhujyamānaṃ daśabhūmisaṃsthaiḥ |
sattvārthakāri pravadanti sādhyaṃ
dānādiṣaṭpāramitānayasthāḥ || 6 ||
commentary: sānandetyādi. sahānandena vartata iti sānandam. sānandaṃ ca tat sallakṣaṇamaṇḍitāṅgaṃ ca sambhujyamānaṃ dharmadeśanādvāreṇopajīvyamānam. kaiḥ? daśabhūmīśvaraiḥ, pariśiṣṭabhūmisthitānām agocaratvāt. daśabhūmiprāptair avalokiteśvaramañjuśrīprabhṛtibhir upabhujyamānam iti yāvat. etad uktaṃ bhavati—śuddhāvāsopari ghanavyūhasaṃjñake samyaksaṃbuddhabhuvane yathā bhagavān ānandarūpaḥ sambhogakāyātmā nirmāṇadvāreṇa sakalajagadarthasaṃpādakaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhanavabhūmīśvarair apy adṛśyaśarīro daśabhūmīśvarair eva paraṃ bodhisattvair dharmaśravaṇadvāreṇopabhujyamāna āsaṃsāraṃ cakāsti, tathaiva tat sādhyam iti tṛtīyam.

root:
nacaitāni parityajya pṛthag loke pramāṇatā |
saṃsāramocakādeśca hiṃsā puṇyatvasammatā || 5 ||
na paścāt puṇyamicchanti kecidevaṃ vigānataḥ |
mlecchāryāṇāṃ prasiddhatvaṃ na dharmasyopapadyate || 6 ||
commentary: nanu sannikṛṣṭārthagocaram eva sarvaṃ pramāṇam | ataḥ prasiddheḥ pramāṇāntarāgocarārthatvaṃ guṇaḥ na doṣāya ata āha na ceti | na ca pratyakṣādīni parityajya loko nāma pramāṇagaṇe pramāṇam upasaṃkhyāyate | varṇavivekasambandhāvadhāraṇayos tu pratyakṣādipramāṇatvaṃ vanasambandhaparihārayor abhidhāsyāma iti | api ca bhaved api prasiddhiḥ pramāṇaṃ yadi vyavasthitaiva prasiddhiḥ syāt | sā tv avyavasthitā | tathā hi saṃsāramocakā nāma nāstikā bāhyahiṃsām eva dharmam āhuḥ | anye tu tapaḥ prajāpatyādi pīḍātmakatvāt parapīḍāvat adharma ....... stu vidhiniṣedhapramāṇakau tadviparītau dharmādharmau saṅgirante | tad evaṃ mlecchāryāṇāṃ parasparavigānān na lokaprasiddhatvaṃ dharmādharmayor upapadyata ity āha saṃsāreti sārdhena ||

root:
vairocanākṣobhyāmoghaś ca ratnārolikasāttvikaḥ |  
brahmā viṣṇuḥ śivaḥ sarvo vibuddhas tattvam ucyate || 12 ||
commentary: kīrtir yaśaḥ. parivāraḥ dāsīdāsakarmakarādiḥ. upasthānaṃ pādadhāvanamardanādi. ebhir arthi tadabhilāṣaṃ mama cittam. tasmāt tiṣṭhāmi kāṣṭhavat.

root:
sahāpi vākcharīrābhyāṃ mandavṛtter na tat phalam |
yat paṭor ekakasyāpi cittasya brahmatādikam || 5.15 ||
commentary:
vīryapāramitā tu kuśalotsāhasvabhāvātivispaṣṭaṃ cittam evety āha.

vacanakāyasahitasyāpi cittasya kuśalapakṣe mandapracārasya na tādṛśaṃ phalamupajāyate, yādṛśaṃ dhyānādiviṣaye paṭupravṛtter ekākino 'pi cittasya phalaṃ brahmabhūyādikam. tasmāt sā cittam eva.

root:
śrīsambhavavimokṣāc ca śikṣed yad guruvartanam |
etac cānyac ca buddhoktaṃ jñeyaṃ sūtrāntavācanāt || 5.103 ||
commentary:
kalyāṇamitrasya paryupāsanaparijñānārtham āha.

śrīsaṃbhavavimokṣād āryagaṇḍavyūhaparivartāt kalyāṇamitraparyupāsanaṃ śikṣet jānīyāt. yathoktam āryagaṇḍavyūhe āryaśrīsaṃbhavena- 

	kalyāṇamitrasaṃdhāritāḥ kulaputra bodhisattvā na patanti durgatiṣu. yāvat saṃcodakāḥ kalyāṇamitrā akaraṇīyānām. saṃnivārakāḥ pramādasthānāt. niṣkāsayitāraḥ saṃsārapurāt. tasmāt tarhi kulaputra evaṃmanasikārāpratiprasrabdhena kalyāṇamitrāṇy upasaṃkramitavyāni. pṛthivīsamacittena sarvabhārodvahanāparitasanatayā. vajrasamacittenābhedyāśayatayā. cakravālasamacittena sarvaduḥkhāsaṃpravedhanatayā. lokadāsasamacittena sarvakarmasamādānāvijugupsanatayā. rajoharaṇasamacittena mānābhimānavivarjanatayā. yānasamacittena gurubhāranirvāhanatayā. aśvasamacittena akrudhyanatayā. nausamacittena gamanāgamanāparitasanatayā. suputrasadṛśena kalyāṇamitramukhavīkṣaṇatayā. ātmani ca te kulaputra āturasaṃjñotpādayitavyā kalyāṇamitreṣu ca vaidyasaṃjñā, anuśāsanīṣu bhaiṣajyasaṃjñā, pratipattiṣu vyādhinirghātanasaṃjñā. ātmani ca te kulaputra bhīrusaṃjñotpādayitavyā, kalyāṇamitreṣu śūrasaṃjñā, anuśāsanīṣu praharaṇasaṃjñā, pratipattiṣu śatrunirghātanasaṃjñā.

yad uktaṃ sūtrāṇāṃ ca sadekṣaṇād iti tad upadarśayitum āha. etad iha śāstre pratipāditam, anyad yad iha noktam. buddhena bhagavatā bodhisattvānāṃ karaṇīyatayā nirdiṣṭam, tan nānāsūtrāntārthaparicayād veditavyam.

root:
bhavadbhaktyamṛtāsvādād bodhasya syāt parāpi yā |  
daśā sā māṃ prati svāminn āsavasyeva śuktatā || 11 ||
commentary: he svāmin tavcchaktipātasamāveśamayabhaktyānandāsvādam anāsādya, bodhasya parā dehapātaprāpyā prakṛṣṭāpi yā śāntaśivapadātmā daśā syāt kaiścit sambhāvyate, sā taiḥ sambhāvyamānā māṃ praty āsavasya yathā śuktatā paryuṣitatā tathā bhātīti yāvat | yatas tair bhaktyamṛtam anāsvādyaiva śuktīkṛtam | yaiḥ punar āsvādyate, taiḥ svacamatkārānandaviśrāntīkṛtatvāt kā śuktatāsambhāvanā? āsvādād iti lyablope pañcamī | athavā tvadbhaktyamṛtāsvādād api parā mokṣarūpā yā kācid daśāstīti sambhāvyate, sā mahyaṃ na rocate, bhaktyamṛtāsvādasyaiva niratiśayacamatkāravattvād ity evaṃparam etat |

root:
nāsti bhāvako na bhāvo 'sti mantraṃ nāsti na devatā |  
tiṣṭhetau mantradevau ca niṣprapañcasvabhāvataḥ || 11 ||
commentary:
satyadvayam adhikṛtyāha—nāsti ityādi. nāsti bhāvako na bhāvo 'stīti bhāvanaṃ bhāvaḥ. bhāvakaḥ kartā. bhāvanā kriyā. dvayam idaṃ bhāvanīyāt pṛthag naiva draṣṭavyam. devatāmantrābhyām anyo nāham. bhāvanāpi tayoḥ prakāśarūpataiva, nānyety eṣa tattvādhimokṣaḥ kartavya ity arthaḥ. tattvaṃ satyaṃ bhūtam iti paryāyāḥ. atas tattvapaṭale satyadvayaṃ vaktavyam.

tatra sarva eṣa vistaraḥ saṃvṛtisatyaṃ paramaudāryasādhanam adhikṛtyoktam. paramagāmbhīryasādhanaṃ paramārthasatyam adhikṛtyāha—mantram ityādi. tāv api devatāmantrau paramārthato na staḥ. kutaḥ? yathāpratibhāsam asattvād iti bhāvaḥ.

paramārthatas tarhi, kathaṃ tau sta ity āha—santiṣṭheta ityādi. prapañcair viparyāso bhrāntir ity eko 'rthaḥ. tatra sarvabhrāntīnām agocaratvād dharmadhātur aprapañcaḥ. tanaiva samyagjñānena sabījasaṃkleśakṣayāt pratiṣṭhādehabhoganirbhāsānāṃ ca vijñaptīnāṃ prahāṇād anāsravo dharmadhātur aprapañcaḥ. trayam idaṃ viśuddhākāśanibham anantam aprapañcam dharmakāyam ity arthaḥ. tad eva svabhāvaḥ tena svabhāvena sākṣātkarttavyāv iti bhāvaḥ.

root:
bhūmiṃ chādayituṃ sarvāṃ kutaś carma bhaviṣyati |
upānaccarmamātreṇa channā bhavati medinī || 5.13 ||
commentary: he rādhe | gandhavāhaḥ malayajo vāyuḥ iha vasante virahiṇīnāṃ ceto dahati | kiṃ kurvan | vāsayan sugandhayan | kāni | kānanāni | kaiḥ kṛtvā | daravidalitamallīvallicañcatparāgaprakaṭitapaṭavāsaiḥ | daravidalitā īṣadvikasitāśca tā mallīvallyaśca | tāsu cañcantaḥ itastato gacchantaḥ te ca te parāgāśca puṣpareṇavaśca sugandhivastucūrṇāni ca | athavā taiḥ parāgaiḥ prakaṭitapaṭuvāsāḥ prakaṭitāśca paṭavaḥ utkṛṣṭāśca te vāsāśca taiḥ | tanu virahiṇīnāṃ dahati | kimbhūtaḥ | prasaradasamabāṇaprāṇavat | prasaraṃścāsau asamabāṇaḥ kandarpaśceti tasya prāṇa iva samāna iva bhavatīti prāṇavat | punaḥ kimbhūtaḥ | ketakīgandhabandhuḥ | ketakīnāṃ gandhaḥ tasya bandhuḥ sahavāsī |

root:
upādhyāyānuśāsinyā bhītyāpy ādarakāriṇām |
dhanyānāṃ gurusaṃvāsāt sukaraṃ jāyate smṛtiḥ || 5.30 ||
commentary: punaḥ kiṃbhūte | madanamahīpatikanakadaṇḍarucikesarakusumavikāśe | madanaścāsau mahīpatī rājā ca | tasya kanakadaṇḍaśchatraṃ tasya ruciriva ruciḥ yeṣāṃ tāni tathā | tāni ca kesarakusumāni nāgakesarakusumāni teṣāṃ vikāśo vikasanaṃ yasmin sa tathā tasmin | punaḥ kiṃbhūte | militaśilīmukhapāṭalipaṭalakṛtasmaratūṇavilāse | militāḥ śilīmukhāḥ ṣaṭpadāḥ yasmin tattathā | tadyatpāṭalipaṭalaṃ pāṭalikusumanivahaṃ ca tena kṛtvā kṛtaḥ smaratūṇavilāsaḥ smarasya madanasya tūṇīrasya śobhākāro yasmin sa tathā |

root:
śivo bhūtvā yajeteti bhakto bhūtveti kathyate |
tvameva hi vapuḥ sāraṃ bhaktairadvayaśodhitam || 1.14 ||
commentary: śivotbhūtvā iti | "śivo bhūtvā śivaṃ yaje" iti yadāmnāyeṣūcyate tatra dehapāta eva śivateti ye manyante teṣāṃ sati dehe śivībhāvābhāvādyajamānatānupapatteḥ svasvarūpaśivasamāveśabhaktiśāly eva yajanaṃ jānātīti tātparyam | anenaivāśayenāha tvameva yataḥ sāram utkṛṣṭaṃ vapuḥ svarūpaṃ advayena bhedaśaṅkāśaṅkuśataśātinā śodhitaṃ nirmalīkṛtaṃ bhaktairiti |

root:
vajragarbhe tadagre vā patitaṃ vā kapālake |
na ceṣṭam antarāle 'pi tattvaṃ vittau guror mukhāt || SeNi 22 ||
commentary:
kutaḥ | āha—vajretyādi | neṣṭaṃ yataḥ | aniṣṭir eva kutaḥ | āha—vajragarbhe tadagre ca sātarūpākṣobhyāstitvena vajrasattvamudrāviyogāt | antarāle kapāle ca, āstāṃ tāvad vajrasattvamudrāviyogo 'dhyavasitasātasaṃvedanabhāvād grāhyādibhāvenākṣobhyamudrāyā api viyogāt | etac ca pūrvoktavajrasattvamudrāviyogata ity anuvṛtter labhyate |

tarhi tattvaṃ kutra jñeyam | tattvaṃ vittau guror mukhād iti | anena ṣoḍaśārdhārdhabindudhṛgbhagavato yatrāvasthānaṃ tad āmnāyate | tad āhuḥ—

	beṇṇi vi galle beṇṇi vi tulle |
	vājja paḍante paṃmu acchüante ||
	vājja paḍantā akhobbhaḍā paṃmu acchüantā vājja |
	kājje kāraṇa muddïa ehu so mahāsuharājja || 

etayor vajrarūpasattvarūpayor vajrasattvaśūnyatākaruṇāprajñopāyanirvāṇabhavādivyapadeśo boddhavyaḥ | ayam eva cārtha utpattikrame mahārāgād drutāpattau candrārkamadhyasthabindudvayarūpeṇordhvādhovartinā tatra tatra bhagavatā darśitaḥ | utpannas tu yathoktaḥ sekārthaḥ | pariniṣpannas tu dravād bolarūpasūryasthaḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ śūnyatākaruṇārūpo dharmadhātusvabhāva utthito bhagavān | ekapādāṅguṣṭhāsanalagnatā tu skhaladavasthākālākalitatāṃ sūcayitum ||

nanv evam—

	vajravaraṭakamadhyasthaṃ hūṃtattvaṃ vibhāvayet punaḥ ||

iti katham | atra hi vajravaraṭakasya madhyastham ity asyārthasya vighaṭanāt | na | anyārthatvād asya | tathā hi vajravaraṭakayoḥ prajñopāyavarāṅgayor madhyasthaṃ hūṃtattvam iti ha iti hetuśūnyam u ity ūhāpagatam aṃ ity apratiṣṭhitaṃ bhāvayed iti vivakṣitatvāt |

tarhi maṇer antargatam iti katham | ucyate | atrāpy anya evārthaḥ | tathā hi maṇyoḥ paṅkajakuliśayor antargatam itīdam api sustham | 

nanv etat katham avagamyate yad ubhayatrāyam artho vivakṣita iti | ucyate—

	kamalākāśe maṇivaraṭakayoḥ pīḍanasthāne |
	vajraparyaṅkataś cittaṃ maṇyantargatam īkṣayan |
	yat tad utpadyate jñānaṃ jñānaṃ tadrūpam ity alam ||

iti paramādye pravacanāt | atrāyam arthaḥ | kamalasyākāśe kamalamadhyaśūnyadeśe maṇivaraṭakayoḥ pañkajakuliśayoḥ pīḍanasthāne saṅghaṭṭanasthāne | vajraparyaṅkata iti vajrasya pari sarvato 'ṅkataḥ kroḍata iti pañcamyā vajrād bahir lagnamātraṃ vivakṣitam | cittaṃ maṇyor antargatam īkṣamāṇasya yad vijñānam utpadyate tad vijñānasvarūpam ity arthaḥ | tathā ca vajāmṛte—

	nābhimadhye sthitaṃ devi karṇikāgūḍhagocare |
	sravate śukrarūpeṇa bhagaliṅgāntare sthitam ||

iti | uktaṃ ca hevajre—

	candrāli kālimārtaṇḍa bījaṃ madhyagataṃ bhavet |

iti | tathā ca |

	yāvan no patati prabhāsvaramayaḥ śītāṃśudhārādravo 
		devīpadmadalodare samarasībhūto jinānāṃ gaṇaiḥ |
	sphūrjadvajraśikhāgrataḥ karuṇayābhinnaṃ jagatkāraṇaṃ 
		tāvac chrīkaruṇābalasya sahajaṃ jānīhi rūpaṃ vibhoḥ || (1)

	yāvad vajramaṇes trivajradahane bhraśyan vidhur vāyunā 
		tiṣṭhaty abjapuṭe sukoṭarakuṭīlīnecchur asmin kṣaṇe |
	yad bhūtaṃ svaparādikalparahitaṃ vyāpārahīnaṃ mano
		jānīmaḥ sahajaṃ tad eva hi punar yuktyāgamena sphuṭam | (2) 

	prajñāpaṅkajavajrayogaparamānandāvaśeṣe sthite
		sthānasrāvaviśuddhabindur acalo yāvan mṛgāṅko mataḥ |
	tāvac cittam acañcalaṃ calamarutsrotaś ca vidhvaṃsyate 
		na śrotraṃ śṛṇute 'kṣi neṅgati mahāmudreti sā ceṣyate || (3) 

tarhi—

	nānyena kathyate sahajaṃ na kasminn api labhyate |
	ātmanā jñāyate puṇyād guruparvopasevayā ||

ity uktaṃ katham | atra guruparva vajraparva | sevākāla ity arthasaṅgatyabhāvād upasevābhāvāt | na | upaśabdena sāmīpyavācakatvena vajrād bahiḥ samīpe sevety uktam | 

tarhi—

triṣkṛtvo rātreḥ, triṣkṛtvo divasasya. triskandhaḥ trayāṇāṃ skandhānāṃ pāpadeśanāpuṇyānumodanābodhipariṇāmanānāṃ samāhāraḥ. triskandhaṃ pravartayet. śeṣā mūlāyā anyāḥ. athavā, saṃcitya kṛtā yāḥ pratikṛtās tābhyo 'nyāḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣeṇāsaṃprajānatā vā kṛtāḥ. tāsāṃ praśamaḥ pratikaraṇaṃ tena triskandhaparivartanena bodhicittasya jinānāṃ ca bhagavatāṃ samāśrayaṇāc ca. etena vidūṣaṇāsamudācārādayo darśitā bhavanti.

tatra pāpaśodhanaṃ caturdharmakasūtre deśitam—

	caturbhir maitreya dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṛtopacitaṃ pāpam abhibhavati. katamaiś caturbhiḥ? yad uta vidūṣaṇāsamudācāreṇa, pratipakṣasamudācāreṇa, pratyāpattibalena, āśrayabalena ca. tatra vidūṣaṇāsamudācāro 'kuśalaṃ karma kṛtvā vipratisārarūpāt savigarhaṇā pāpadeśanā, tadanuṣṭhānaṃ tatsamudācāraḥ. tatra pratipakṣasamudācāro 'kuśalapratipakṣaḥ kuśalam, tatsamudācāraḥ, kṛtvāpy akuśalaṃ karma kuśale karmaṇy atyantam abhiyogaḥ. tatra pratyāpattibalaṃ saṃvarasamādānād akaraṇasaṃvaralābhaḥ | tatrāśrayabalaṃ buddhadharmasaṃghaśaraṇagamanam, anutsṛṣṭabodhicittatā ca. sa balavatsaṃniśrayeṇa na śakyate pāpenābhibhavitum. ebhir maitreya caturbhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṛtopacitaṃ pāpam abhibhavat.

iit. viśeṣatas tu bodhisattvāpattīnāṃ gurvīṇāṃ laghvīnāṃ ca deśanā āryopāliparipṛcchāyām uktāḥ. tāḥ śikṣāsamuccaye draṣṭavyāḥ.

sarvāpattayo bodhisattvena pañcatriṃśatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike rātriṃdivam ekākinā deśayitavyāḥ. tatreyaṃ deśanā—aham evaṃnāmā buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmīty ārabhya yāvat saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi, namaḥ śākyamunaye tathāgatāyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāya. namo vajrapramardine ityārabhya yāvat.

upaimi sarvān śaraṇaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ.

iti vistaram uktvāha-iti hi śāriputra bodhisattvena imān pañcatriṃśato buddhān pramukhān kṛtvā sarvatathāgatānugatair manasikāraiḥ pāpaviśuddhiḥ kāryā. tasyaivaṃ pāpaviśuddhasya ta eva buddhā bhagavanto mukhāny upadarśayanti. peyālam. na tat śakyaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhanikāyair āpattikaukṛtyasthānaṃ viśodhayituṃ yad bodhisattvas teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ nāmadheyadhāraṇaparikīrtanena rātriṃdivaṃ triskandhakadharmaparyāyapravartanena āpattikaukṛtyān niḥsarati, samādhiṃ ca pratilabhate. etat sākalyena śikṣāsamuccaye veditavyam.

ukto vidūṣaṇāsamudācāraḥ. pratipakṣasamudācārapratyāpattibale 'pi vistareṇa śikṣāsamuccayād eva draṣṭavye. āryamaitreyavimokṣe tu bodhicittena pāpaviśuddhir uktā. taccoktam eva prāk. jināśrayāt pāpaviśuddhau sūkarikāvadānam udāhāryam.

	ye buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ yānti na te gacchanti durgatim |
	prahāya mānuṣān kāyān divyān kāyāṃl labhanti te ||

evaṃ dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ cādhikṛtya pāṭhaḥ. anenāśrayabalamuktam.

commentary:
tathopāyakauśalyasūtre jyotiṣkamāṇavakādhikāre—

	eṣā rakṣātmabhāvasya bhaiṣajyavasanādibhiḥ |

bhaiṣajyavasanādibhir ātmabhāvo hi paripālanīyaḥ parārthopayogitvāt. yathoktaṃ prākūtatra dvividhaṃ bhaiṣajyaṃ satatabhaiṣajyaṃ glānapratyayabhaiṣajyaṃ ca. tatra satatabhaiṣajyam odanādi. tadarthaṃ piṇḍāya gocare caratā grāmapraveśe yathoktaśikṣāyāṃ smṛtim ādhāya caritavyam. tato labdhāt piṇḍapātāt caturthabhāgavibhaktāt vinipātagatānanāthavratasthān saṃvibhāginaḥ kuryāt. ekaṃ pratyaṅgaṃ vinipātinām, dvitīyam anāthānām, tṛtīyaṃ sabrahmacāriṇāṃ datvā, caturtham ātmanā paribhuñjīta. sa paribhuñjāno na raktaḥ paribhuṅkte, asaktaḥ, agṛddhaḥ, anadhyavasitaḥ, anyatra yāvad evāsya kāyasya sthitaye yāpanāyai. madhyamāṃ mātrām. tathā ca paribhuṅkte yathā nātisaṃlikhito bhavati, nātigurukāyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? atisaṃlikhito hi kuśalapakṣaparāṅmukho bhavati, atigurukāyo middhāvaṣṭabdho bhavati. tena taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya kuśalapakṣābhimukhena bhavitavyam iti āryaratnameghe 'bhihitam. āryaratnarāśāvapi-

	paribhuñjatā caivaṃ manasikāra utpādayitavyaḥ—santy asmin kāye aśītikṛmikulasahasrāṇi, tāni anenaivojasā sukhaṃ viharantu. idānīṃ caiṣām āmiṣeṇa saṃgrahaṃ kariṣyāmi. bodhiprāptaś ca punar dharmeṇa saṃgrahaṃ kariṣyāmi.

iti vistaraḥ.

punar atraivoktam-

	dvayor ahaṃ kāśyapa śraddhādeyam anujānāmi. katamayor dvayoḥ? yuktasya muktasya ca |

iti. anayā diśā sarvaparibhogāḥ sattvārtham adhiṣṭhātavyāḥ. anyathā-

	ātmatṛṣṇopabhogāt tu kliṣṭāpattiḥ prajāyate || (Sikṣāsamuccaya 13)

iti.

yathoktaṃ candrapradīpasūtre-

	te bhojanaṃ svādurasaṃ praṇītaṃ labdhvā ca bhuñjanti ayuktayogāḥ |
	teṣāṃ sa āhāru vadhāya bhoti yatha hastipotāna bisā adhautakāḥ || (Samādhirāja 9.29)

vistareṇa caitac chikṣāsamuccaye draṣṭavyam.

glānabhaiṣajyaṃ tu yāmikaṃ sāptāhikaṃ yāvaj jīvikam iti trividham. etac ca bhikṣuvinaye pratipāditaṃ tatraivāvadhāryam.

vasanādibhir ātmarakṣām āha-tricīvarabahis tyajed iti. saced āgatya kaścid bodhisattvaṃ pātracīvaraṃ yāceta, tena atityāgo na kartavyaḥ. kiṃ tu yat tad anujñātaṃ bhagavatā-

	tricīvaraṃ śramaṇakalpaḥ, tato 'tiriktaṃ ca yad bhavet, tyaktavyam arthine, nānyathā. uktaṃ ca bodhisattvapratimokṣe—sacet punaḥ kaścid āgatya pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā yāceta, sacet tasyātiriktaṃ bhaved buddhānujñātāt tricīvarāt, yathāparityaktaṃ dātavyam. sacet punas tasya ūnaṃ tricīvaraṃ bhavet yan niśritya brahmacaryāvāsaḥ, tan na parityaktavyam. tatkasmāddhetoḥ? avisarjanīyaṃ hi tricīvaramuktaṃ tathāgatena. sacec chāriputra bodhisattvas tricīvaraṃ parityajya yācanaguruko bhavet, na tena alpecchatā āsevitā bhavet.

iti.

commentary:

ākārair nīlapītasukhaduḥkhādibhiś citrarūpaiḥ śūnyaṃ nirākāram. ata eva gaganasyeva nirākāratvenendor iva prabhāsvaratvena rūpaṃ svabhāvo yasya tat tathā. pratyātmavedyam iti svasaṃvedanaikavedyam. karuṇā duḥkhād duḥkhahetor vā sakalajagadabhyuddharaṇakāmatā. saiva rasaḥ svabhāvo yasya tat tathoktam. etad uktaṃ bhavati—nīlapītādicitrākāraśūnyaṃ nirābhāsaṃ nirañjanaṃ gaganopamaṃ svacchaṃ sakalajagadarthakāri mahākaruṇāyuktaṃ pratyātmavedyaṃ pāramitopadeśaśabdābhidheyaṃ sādhyam iti pāramitānaye prathamaṃ sādhyam.

śobhanāni ca tāni lakṣaṇāni ca dvātriṃśallakṣaṇasaṃjñakāni, tair bhūṣitam. arthaṃ janānāṃ prayojanaṃ kartuṃ śīlaṃ svabhāvo yasya tad arthakāri. dānādīnāṃ daśapāramitānāṃ niṣyandaṃ tatprakarṣaprabhavatvena sadṛśaṃ phalam. duḥkhasya pūrvam eva prahīṇatvāt, sākṣātkaraṇāvasthāyāṃ saukhyasyāpy abhāvāt, upekṣārūpatvenāpetasaukhyam apagatasaukhyam. etad uktaṃ bhavati—dvātriṃśallakṣaṇadharāśītyanuvyañjanavirājitaśarīraṃ sakalajagadarthakāri dānādipāramitābhyāsabalenotpannaṃ samyaksaṃbuddharūpaṃ sukhaduḥkharahitatvenopekṣārūpaṃ dvitīyaṃ sādhyam.

dṛṣṭotsāhaś cakitacakitaṃ mugdhasiddhāṅganābhiḥ |
sthānād asmāt sarasaniculād utpatodaṅmukhaḥ khaṃ
diṅnāgānāṃ pathi pariharan sthūlahastāvalepān ||
commentary: athetyādi | maṇḍalavyatirekeṇābhiṣekasyāsadbhāvāt tantraśravaṇādhikāro na syād ity abhiprāyaḥ | pañcamānam ity ekasyāpi pañcaprakāraṃ maṇḍalaṃ na tu pañcānāṃ yathā kramaṃ ||

root:
evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān vajrasattvaḥ |
sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittahṛdayavajradhātvīśvarībhage vijahāra ||
anekaiś ca vajrayogivajrayoginīgaṇaiḥ । tadyathā । śvetācalena ca vajrayoginā । pītācalena ca vajrayoginā । raktācalena ca vajrayoginā । śyāmācalena ca vajrayoginā । mohavajryā ca vajrayoginyā । piśunavajryā ca vajrayoginyā । rāgavajryā ca vajrayoginyā । īrṣyāvajryā ca vajrayoginyā । evaṃ pramukhair yogiyoginīkoṭiniyutaśatasahasraiḥ ||1.1||
commentary:
evaṃ mayetyādyāha saṅgītikāraḥ | nidānavākyaṃ etat | yasmāt saṅgītikāreṇa sūtratantrādāv avaśyaṃ vaktavyaṃ | bhagavato vacanāt | tathā ca | evaṃ mayā śrutam iti kṛtvā bhikṣavo mama dharmaḥ saṅgātavyam ityādi | evaṃ sati | 

śraddhāvatāṃ pravṛttyaṅgaṃ śāstā parṣac ca sākṣiṇi | 
deśakālau ca nirdiṣṭau svaprāmāṇyaprasiddhaye || iti pratipāditaṃ bhavati ||

tatra | evam iti yathā saṃgāsyāmi | mayety anena viparītaśrutaparaṃparāśrutayor nirāsaḥ | etenātmanaḥ sākṣāt śrutam aviparītaṃ ca pratipādayati | śrutam iti śrotajñānenādhigatam | ekasmin samaya iti | ekasmin kāle | anyasmin kāle tv anyad api śrutam ity arthaḥ | etenātmano bāhuśrutyam etattantrasya daurlabhyaṃ ca pratipādayati | bhagavān iti | bhagā aiśvaryādayaḥ | tathā ca | aiśvaryasya samagrasya jñānasya yaḥ yaśasaḥ śriyaḥ rūpasyātha prayatnasya ṣaṇṇāṃ bhagasya iti śrutiḥ || tāni vidyante 'syeti rāgādikleśabhañjanād vā | 
vajrasattva iti | vajram abhedyaṃ sattvam arthakriyākāritvam asyeti | athavā vajra iva vajraḥ sa cāsau sattvaḥ prāṇī ceti | sarvetyādi | sarve ca te tathāgatāś ca teṣāṃ kāyavākcittaṃ jīvaccharīra tasya hṛdayam atyantābhilaṣaṇīyatvāt | tad eva vajradhātvīśvarībhagam ||

vajro liṅgaṃ tasya dhātuḥ sāṃvṛtavivṛtatvalakṣaṇaḥ | bodhicittaṃ tasyeśvarī vā prajñā vajradhātunā sevitatvāt tasyāḥ | tadvarāṅge bhage vijahāreti | vihṛtavān vajrapadmasaṃyogena sampuṭayogena sthitavān ity arthaḥ | ayaṃ ca vihāraḥ prākṛtajanasyāpy atyantagupto bhavati kiṃ punar bhagavato vajrasattvasya | tataś cārthād uktaṃ bhavati | sumerugirimūrdhnivajrasatvabhūmau vajramaṇiśikharakūṭāgāre viharati smeti | etena śāstrā kālo deśaś coktaḥ ||

parṣadaṃ vaktum āha | anekaiścetyādi | vajrayoginaḥ | śvetācalādayaḥ | vajrayoginyo mohavajryādayaḥ | teṣām tāsāṃ ca gaṇāḥ samūhā ekarasāktāḥ bahuvacanaṃ tv ekavacanasyāpi pañcatathāgatātmatvāt ||

tadyathetyupadarśane | śvetācaleneti bhagavato bhagavatīdehagatarūpajñānena | evaṃ pītācaleneti | bhagavatīdehagatagandhajñānena | raktācaleneti | bhagavatīdehagatarasajñānena | śyāmācaleneti | bhagavatīdehagatasparśajñānenana || 

mohavajryā ceti | bhagavatyo bhagavaddehagatarūpajñānena | piśunavajryā ceti bhagaddehagatagandhajñānena | rāgavajryā ceti bhagavaddehagatarasajñānena | īrṣyāvajryā ceti bhagavaddehagatasparśajñānena | svayaṃ tu bhagavān bhagavatīdehagataśabdajñāne rūpaḥ | bhagavatī tu bhagavaddehegataśabdajñānarūpā ato naitat prabhedaḥ kṛtaḥ ||

evaṃ pramukhair iti | evaṃprakāraiḥ | cakṣuṣā ghrāṇena rasanayā kāyena śrotreṇa rūpeṇa vedanayā saṃjñayā saṃskāreṇa vijñānena pṛthivyā jalena tejasā vāyūnā ākāśena ityādibhir ityarthaḥ | etenaivamvidhe vihāre parṣaddevyopyetāddṛśyo bodhicitte tu kathitaṃ bhavati ||

root:
aprakāśyam idaṃ tantram adṛṣṭamaṇḍalasya hi |
nānyamaṇḍalapraviṣṭasya tantrarājaṃ tu darśayet || 1.8 ||
commentary: adṛṣtamaṇḍalasyeti | yogayoginītantroktakrameṇābhiṣiktasya | anyamaṇḍalaṃ kriyātantoktamaṇḍalaṃ | tatra praviṣṭasyābhiṣiktasya pakṣāntaram āha ||

root:
maddhitāya mamārthāya anukampāya me vibho |
māyājālābhisaṃbodher yathā lābhī bhavāmy aham || 7 ||
commentary: codayantīti sambodhayanti ||

root:
tathatāyāṃ gataḥ śrīmān āgataś ca tathaiva ca |  
anayā prajñayā yuktyā tathāgato 'bhidhīyate || 8 ||
commentary: tathatāyāṃ gata iti suviśuddhatathataikarase dharmakāye sthitaḥ. śrīmān iti sarvabuddhadharmeśvaraḥ, na tu śrāvakādiḥ. āgataś ceti tasyā eva tathatāyāḥ sakāśād āgatas tanniṣyandābhyāṃ sambhoganirmāṇakāyābhyāṃ jagadarthakaraṇāya. evaṃ tathatāgataśabdayor ekaśeṣo madhyatakārasya nairukto lopaḥ. evaṃ tāvat sarve tathāgatāḥ. teṣām ādarśajñānādīni pañcakulāni.

root:
dṛśyase purato gatāgatameva me vidadhāsi |
kiṃ pureva sasaṃbhramaṃ parirambhaṇaṃ na dadāsi ||
commentary: he rādhe purato 'grataḥ | dṛśyase avalokyase | kasya | mama | kiṃ nu gatāgataṃ gamanāgamanam | vidadhāsi karoṣi | kimiti pureva pūrvānubhūtamiva | parirambhaṇamāliṅganaṃ na dadāsi | kimbhūtam | sasaṃbhramaṃ saha saṃbhrameṇa vartata iti |

root:
na hi tad vidyate kiṃcid yan na śikṣyaṃ jinātmajaiḥ |
na tad asti na yat puṇyam evaṃ viharataḥ sataḥ || 5.100 ||
commentary:
kiṃ punar evam aniyamenābhidhīyata ity āha.

yasmāt sarvākāraṃ sarvavastutattvam adhigamya sarveṣāṃ hitasukhavidhānārtham udyacchadbhir buddhasutaiḥ na tad asti kiṃcit yan na śikṣitavyam. anyathā sarvākāraḥ sarvasattvānām arthaḥ kartum aśakyaḥ. puṇyasaṃbhāro 'pi evaṃ vicarato 'paryanta eva syāt.

root:
kaścit kāntāvirahaguruṇā svādhikārāt pramattaḥ  
śāpenāstaṅgamitamahimā varṣabhogyeṇa bhartuḥ |  
yakṣaś cakre janakatanayāsnānapuṇyodakeṣu  
snigdhacchāyātaruṣu vasatiṃ rāmagiryāśrameṣu ||
commentary: kulaṃ caitad iti vajrapadmādikam.

root:
teṣāṃ dikṣu prathitavidiśālakṣaṇāṃ rājadhānīṃ  
gatvā sadyaḥ phalam avikalaṃ kāmukatvasya labdhā |  
tīropāntastanitasubhagaṃ pāsyasi svādu yasmāt  
sabhrūbhaṅgaṃ mukham iva payo vetravatyāś calormi ||
commentary: athetyādi | maṇḍalavyatirekeṇābhiṣekasyāsadbhāvāt tantraśravaṇādhikāro na syād ity abhiprāyaḥ | pañcamānam ity ekasyāpi pañcaprakāraṃ maṇḍalaṃ na tu pañcānāṃ yathā kramaṃ ||

root:
rakṣasīmaṃ manaḥ kasmād ātmīkṛtya samucchrayam |
tvattaś cet pṛthag evāyaṃ tenātra tava ko vyayaḥ || 5.60 ||
commentary:
tad eva dauṣprajñavikṣepāsamyakpraṇidhivipakṣābhibhūtirahitatvenāha mahādhyānetyādi |

tatrāsyāṃ gāthāyāṃ dhyānaprajñayor vyatyayo draṣṭavyaḥ | tataś cāyam arthaḥ | mahāprajñāśarīradhṛg iti vajradhūpā | mahati prajñā mahāprajñā saiva śarīraṃ tad dhārayatīti mahāprajñāśarīradhṛk || mahādhyānasamādhistha iti vajrapuṣpā | samādhiś cittasyaikāgratālakṣaṇas tasmiṃs tiṣṭhatīti samādhisthaḥ | mahac ca tad dhyānaṃ ca mahādhyānaṃ mahattvaṃ caturdhyānātmakatvāt | teṣu caturṣu dhyāneṣu samādhisthaḥ || praṇidhir iti vajradīpā | praṇidhīyata iti praṇidhiḥ | bodhisattvānāṃ praṇidhānavaśād utpatteḥ || mahopāya iti vajragandhā | mahāṃś cāsāv upāyaś ca mahopāyaḥ | tata evopāyabalenāśeṣānavaśeṣasya sattvadhātor yathāśayābhiprāyaparipūraṇāt || 

ata eva prajñādhyānapraṇidhyupāyapāramitālakṣaṇatayā bāhyapūjācatuṣṭayātmakam iti ||

sāmbhogikamārgaprītihetubhāvena balajñānayor dharmadhātvavatārasvabhāvatvāt tayor eva balajñānayoḥ pravibhāgaḥ | tatra balaṃ śraddhādipañca | jñānaṃ darśanamārge bhāvanāmārge ca | tatra darśanamārge bodhyaṅgeṣu | bhāvanāmārga āryāṣtāṅgeṣu || 

tataś ca śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhirūpatayā dvārapālacatuṣṭayātmakaṃ mahāyānābhisampratyayapravṛttitannairantaryasantuṣṭikāraṇatvāt ||

root:
hasitādiviśuddhyā yad ācāryādi samīhitam |
utpattyā tad vyavastheyaṃ na cotpannasvabhāvataḥ || SeNi 24 ||
commentary: nanu ṣaṇṇāṃ kalaśābhiṣekatāpy uktā sarvatra kalaśavyāpārāt | sā tarhi katham | kalaśaśabdasya payodharopalakṣaṇatvena payodharavyāpārād atrāpi sā ghaṭate | tad etat sarvaṃ darśayati—hastetyādi | gatārtham ||

root:
viśuddhajñānadehāya trivedīdivyacakṣuṣe |
śreyaḥprāptinimittāya namaḥ somārdhadhāriṇe || 1.1 ||
commentary:
paraguṇāmarṣaṇaṃ vārayann āha-

sarveṣāṃ hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭānāṃ sattvānām, sarve vopakramāḥ duḥkhaparihāreṇa tuṣṭayarthāḥ. sarvārambhapariśrameṇa tuṣṭir evotpādayitavyety arthaḥ. sā ca tuṣṭir dhanavisargair api durlabhā, syād vā na veti. iha punar ayatnasiddhopasthitā kasmāt parihīyata iti matvā bhokṣya anubhaviṣyāmi saṃtoṣasukham anyayatnaniṣpāditair guṇair upanāmitam. na hi priyaputraguṇair akṣamāyuktā. iti bhāvanayā paraguṇaśravaṇāc cittakārkaśyam apakuryāt.

root:
maṇḍale caṇḍaroṣasya praviṣṭo yaḥ samāhitaḥ |
śraddhāyatnaparaś caṇḍe tasya tantraṃ tu deśayet || 1.9 ||
commentary: maṇḍala ityādi | etat tantroktamaṇḍala iti bhāvaḥ | samāhito 'nuddhatakāyavāṅmanovyāpārāt | śraddhā abhisampratyayaḥ | yatna udyogaḥ ||

root:
pitari prāptaṃ yat saukhyaṃ tat sukhaṃ bhujyate svayam |  
maraṇaṃ yena sukhena tat sukhaṃ dhyānam ucyate || 21 ||
commentary:
ato vaktavyaṃ kā tasya bhāvanā, kiṃ vā tasya dhyānam ity ata āha—pitari ityādi. pitā vajradharo guruś ca. pañcamyarthe saptamī. pituḥ sakāśāt prāptam. laukikasukhena dṛṣṭāntena pitrā yad upadiṣṭaṃ mahāmokṣasukham ity arthaḥ. anupadiṣṭānāṃ devamanuṣyādīnāṃ śrutir api tasya durlabhā, kiṃ punar anubhava iti bhāvaḥ.

tat sukhaṃ bhujyate svayam iti tad eva nirābhāsam anantaṃ niruttaram akṣayāvyayaṃ mahāmokṣasukhaṃ bhujyate. svayam iti sākṣād iva. kutaḥ? bhujyamāne laukikasukhe tad eva yathālakṣaṇam adhimucya, tathādhimokṣād ālambanīkṛte tasmin ālambanāntarasaṃcāraprasāraniṣedhena niścalasūkṣmīkṛtasya cetasas tathaiva nirantaram ādareṇa sābhogam anābhogaṃ ca vahanāt. iyatī yat tasya bhāvanā.

dhyānam ākhyātum āha—maraṇam ityādi. tathaiva ciraṃ bhāvyamānena mahāsukhena yena iti yadavastheneha maraṇaṃ bhavati, tad iti tadavasthaṃ tan mahāsukhadhyānam ucyate bhāvanāpariniṣpatteḥ.

iha maraṇam iti ko 'rthaḥ? iheti tato mahāsukhād anyasmin bahir adhyātmaṃ cālambane maraṇam apratisaṃvedanaṃ bhavati. ekadvaubahūn vā praharān divasān māsān varṣān vā daṃśamaśakādikṛtair api capeṭamuṣṭikaśābhighātair api paṭupaṭahaśaṃkhabherīmahāmeghasvanair api tāvantaṃ kālam apratibodhanād iti.

athavā na yuktā sahajā bhāvanā, dṛṣṭāntasahajasya pratyakṣatvena dārṣṭāntikasahajasya cānubhūtatvena dhyeyatvāyogāt. ata āha—pitarītyādi. pitari prāptaṃ dṛṣṭāntasahajaṃ bhujyate svayam iti sākṣādanubhūyate. maraṇaṃ mokṣaḥ. yena sukheneti dārṣṭāntikasahajena. iha tat sukhaṃ dhyānam iti dṛṣṭāntasukhe tādātmyena bhāvyamānaṃ dārṣṭāntikasukhaṃ dhyeyam ucyate. anubhūyamānetarayoḥ sādharmyasukhena ekarasībhāvagamanād iti bhāvaḥ.

root:
evaṃ vaśīkṛtasvātmā nityaṃ smitamukho bhavet |
tyajed bhṛkuṭisaṅkocaṃ pūrvābhāṣī jagatsuhṛt || 5.71 ||
commentary:
kṣāntipāramitāpi na cittād bhinnety āha.

parāpakārādisaṃbhave 'pi cittasyākopanatā kṣāntiḥ. anyathā yadi sarvaśatrūṇāṃ tadvinipātanena vairaniryātanaṃ kṛtavataḥ kenacid vairābhāvād upaśāntavairasya na kaścid apakārī syād iti marṣaṇaṃ kṣāntiḥ, tadā etad aśakyānuṣṭhānam. śatravo hi gaganasamatvād aparyantāḥ. teṣāṃ māraṇam aśakyam. tasmāt krodhādinivṛtticittam eva teṣām upāyena māraṇam iva, tatkṛtāpakārasyāgaṇanāt, janmāntaravairāsaṃbhavāc ca māritaprāyāste.

root: tantre caikallavīre 'smin sugupte caṇḍaroṣaṇe || 1.19 ||
commentary: sugupta iti | atigopanīyatvād iti bhāvaḥ ||

root:
anupamasukharūpī śrīnivāso 'nivāso
nirupamadaśadevīrūpavidyaḥ savidyaḥ |
tribhuvanahitasaukhyaprāptikāro 'vikāro
jayati kamalapāṇir yāvad āśāvikāśāḥ || 1 ||
commentary:
kalyāṇamitrasya paryupāsanaparijñānārtham āha.

śrīsaṃbhavavimokṣād āryagaṇḍavyūhaparivartāt kalyāṇamitraparyupāsanaṃ śikṣet jānīyāt. yathoktam āryagaṇḍavyūhe āryaśrīsaṃbhavena- 

	kalyāṇamitrasaṃdhāritāḥ kulaputra bodhisattvā na patanti durgatiṣu. yāvat saṃcodakāḥ kalyāṇamitrā akaraṇīyānām. saṃnivārakāḥ pramādasthānāt. niṣkāsayitāraḥ saṃsārapurāt. tasmāt tarhi kulaputra evaṃmanasikārāpratiprasrabdhena kalyāṇamitrāṇy upasaṃkramitavyāni. pṛthivīsamacittena sarvabhārodvahanāparitasanatayā. vajrasamacittenābhedyāśayatayā. cakravālasamacittena sarvaduḥkhāsaṃpravedhanatayā. lokadāsasamacittena sarvakarmasamādānāvijugupsanatayā. rajoharaṇasamacittena mānābhimānavivarjanatayā. yānasamacittena gurubhāranirvāhanatayā. aśvasamacittena akrudhyanatayā. nausamacittena gamanāgamanāparitasanatayā. suputrasadṛśena kalyāṇamitramukhavīkṣaṇatayā. ātmani ca te kulaputra āturasaṃjñotpādayitavyā kalyāṇamitreṣu ca vaidyasaṃjñā, anuśāsanīṣu bhaiṣajyasaṃjñā, pratipattiṣu vyādhinirghātanasaṃjñā. ātmani ca te kulaputra bhīrusaṃjñotpādayitavyā, kalyāṇamitreṣu śūrasaṃjñā, anuśāsanīṣu praharaṇasaṃjñā, pratipattiṣu śatrunirghātanasaṃjñā.

yad uktaṃ sūtrāṇāṃ ca sadekṣaṇād iti tad upadarśayitum āha. etad iha śāstre pratipāditam, anyad yad iha noktam. buddhena bhagavatā bodhisattvānāṃ karaṇīyatayā nirdiṣṭam, tan nānāsūtrāntārthaparicayād veditavyam.

root:
varṇitaṃ jayadevakena hareridaṃ pravaṇena |
tindubilvasamudrasaṃbhavarohiṇīramaṇena ||
commentary: idaṃ gītam | hareḥ kṛṣṇasya pravaṇena bhaktinamreṇa yattena jayadevakena kavinā varṇitam | kimbhūtena | tindubilvasamudrasaṃbhavarohiṇīramaṇena | tindubilvaṃ nāma nagaram | tadeva samudraḥ tatra saṃbhavaḥ utpattiryasya sa tathā sa cāsau rohiṇīramaṇaśceti | anena tasya candropamā |

maṇimayamakaramanoharakuṇḍalamaṇḍitagaṇḍamudāram |
pītavasanamanugatamunimanujasurāsuravaraparivāram ||
commentary: mudrāṇāṃ bodhārthaṃ sveṣṭadevatāprabhāvaṃ darśayann āha—mudrās tāvad ityādi | śabareśasyeti siddhaśrīśabarapādasya | śeṣaṃ subodham ||

māṃ na jānanti ye mūḍhāḥ sarvapumvapuṣi sthitam |

commentary: kāpi prauḍhagopī adhikaṃ yathā syāttathā dhyāyati | kim | madhusūdanavadanasarojam | madhudaityaṃ sūditavān marditavāniti madhusūdanaḥ tasya vadanameva sarojaṃ mukhakamalam | kiṃviśiṣṭam | vilāsavilolavilocanakhelanajanitamanojam | vilāsena līlayā vilole ca te vilocane nayane ca tābhyāṃ kṛtvā khelanaṃ tathā saha krīḍā tasmājjanito manojaḥ kandarpo yena sa tathā tat |

root:
evaṃ saṃkliṣṭam ālokya niṣphalārambhi vā manaḥ |
nigṛhṇīyād dṛḍhaṃ śūraḥ pratipakṣeṇa tat sadā || 5.54 ||
commentary:
sāṃprataṃ pratikāranirdeśam āha.

upadarśitakrameṇa saṃkliṣṭaṃ saṃkleśasaṃprayuktaṃ niṣphalavyāpāraṃ vā jñātvā svacittaṃ sarvapravṛttinigedhena prabhāvamandatāṃ vidhāya nigṛhṇīyād abhibhavet. dṛḍhaṃ yathā punar api samudācāradharmakaṃ na bhavati. kleśādisaṃgrāme vijayāya kṛtaparikaraḥ śuro bodhisattvaḥ. pratipakṣeṇa yo yasmin pratipakṣa uktaḥ yathā rāgādāv aśubhādi, tena tadviparītavidhānenety arthaḥ. sadā sarvakālam, yadā yadā saṃkliṣṭaṃ pratīyate. ugraparipṛcchāyāṃ gṛhiṇaṃ bodhisattvamadhikṛtyoktam—

	tena surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānāt prativiratena bhavitavyam, amattena anunmattena acapalena acañcalena abhrāntena amukhareṇa anunnatena upasthitasmṛtināsasaṃprajanyena.

iti. atraiva ca—

	pravrajitaṃ bodhisattvam adhikṛtyoktam. smṛtisaṃprajanyasyāvikṣepaḥ.

iti. tathā āryatathāgataguhyasūtre darśitam—

	na khalu punaḥ kulaputra bodhisattvasya vāg raktā vā duṣṭā vā mūḍhā vā kliṣṭā vā kṣaṇavyākaraṇī vā svapakṣotkarṣaṇavacanā vā parapakṣanigrahavacanā vā ātmavarṇānunayavacanā vā paravarṇapratighātavacanā vā pratijñottāraṇavacanā vā ābhimānikavyākaraṇavacanā vā ||

iti. evaṃ niṣphalaspandavarjanenānarthād ātmabhāvasya rakṣā pratipāditā bhavati. tasmān mayā śīlasusthitenāprakampenāśithilena bhavitavyam iti.

etac ca samāhitacittasya sidhyati. ata idaṃ śamathamāhātmyam avagamya tātparyeṇa bhāvayitavyam. anena tīvra ādaro bhavati śikśāsu. tenāpi smṛtir upatiṣṭhate. upasthitasmṛtir niṣphalaṃ varjayati. tasyānarthā na saṃbhavanti. tasmād ātmabhāvaṃ rakṣitukāmena smṛtimūlam anviṣya nityam upasthitasmṛtinā bhavitavyam. etad evāha—

	tatrātmabhāve kā rakṣā yadanarthavivarjanam |
	kena tallabhyate sarve niṣphalaspandavarjanāt ||

	etatsidhyetsadā smṛtyā smṛtistīvrādarādbhavet |
	ādaraḥ śamamāhātmyaṃ jñātvātāpena jāyate || (Śikṣāsamuccaya 7–8)

iti |

śamathamāhātmyaṃ tu yathāvasaram ihaiva kathayiṣyate.

root:
atha tattvapaṭalaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | 
svarūpeṇa nāsti rūpaṃ na draṣṭā ca na śabdo nāpi śrotā ca |  
na gandho nāpi ghrātā ca na raso nāpi rāsakaḥ |  
na sparśo nāpi spraṣṭā ca na cittaṃ nāpi caittikam || 1 ||
commentary:
uktau dvau devatāyogau samāhitaḥ sandhyāsu, asamāhitaḥ sandhyāntarāleṣu. tattvayogo vaktavyaḥ, yatas tribhir vinā nāsti śīghrataraṃ bodhiḥ. ata āha—tattvetyādi. tattvasya dyotakaḥ paṭalas tattvapaṭalaḥ.

rūpaṃ nīlapītādi. tan nāsti na vidyate. kathaṃ nāsti? svarūpeana—yad asya svarūpaṃ bālaiḥ kalpyate darśanagrāhyaṃ vastubhūtam, tena nāsti, ekānekasvabhāvavirahāt. kevalaṃ bhrāntā buddhir bālānām asataiva tena tenākāreṇa khyāti svapnādāv iva. rūpābhāve na kaścid rūpaṃ paśyatīti draṣṭā 'pi nāsti. tenāha—na draṣṭā ceti. na draṣṭety arthaḥ. draṣṭā cakṣurdhātur draṣṭā puruṣo dvāv api svarūpeṇa na staḥ. yad anayoḥ svarūpaṃ vastugrāhakaṃ bālair vikalpyate tena na staḥ. evaṃ yāvan na sparśo nāpi spraṣṭā ca. iyatā daśāyatanāni rūpacakṣurādīni. draṣṭādirūpaś ca pudgalo nāstīty uktam.

na cittam iti vijñānalakṣaṇaṃ cittam. vijānātīti vijñānaṃ ṣaḍvijñānakāyāś cakṣurvijñānadhātur yāvan manovijñānadhātuḥ. etāny eva samanantarātītāni manodhātuḥ. saptaite vijñānadhātavo manaāyatanam. yaś ca ṣaḍbhir vijñānair vijñātā pudgalaḥ, so 'pi vijānātīti vijñānam. tataḥ so 'pi cittaśabdenoktaḥ. tad ubhayaṃ nāsti, tayor grāhakalakṣaṇatvāt, grāhyābhāve ca grāhakāyogāt.

kasmād grāhyaṃ nāsti? ekānekasvabhāvavirahāt. siddha eṣa hetuḥ sāvayaveṣu daśasvāyataneṣu niraṃśeṣu ca paramāṇuṣu. paramāṇumātre 'pi sthūlapratibhāsāyogāt.

dharmāyatane tu yāni dravyāṇi teṣu niraṃśeṣu pratibhāsamānarūpasyotpatter asiddho hetuḥ, tasmān na dharmāyatanaṃ nāstīty ata āha—na caittikam iti. cittasya viṣayaś caittikaṃ dharmāyatanam, tad api nāsti. akṣaṇikānām anyatra nirākṛtatvāt, kṣaṇikānām api grāhyatvāyogāt, atītānāgatānām asattvena vartamānānām akāraṇatvenāgrāhyalakṣaṇatvāc ca viṣayasya. yadi tarhi dvayarūpeṇa na santi, dvādaśāyatanāni pudgalaś ca kena rūpeṇa santi? dvayapratibhāsinā bhrāntirūpeṇa dravyataḥ santi, tena pratītyasamutpannatvāt. yat punar eṣāṃ rūpaṃ dvayaśūnyatā vijñaptimātratā prakāśamātratā sarvatra samarasā, tenaite paramārthataḥ santi. tad dhi paramārthaḥ paramasya lokottarajñānasyārtho viṣayaḥ. tatra dvayasaṃgṛhītaṃ rūpaṃ nāstīti parijñeyam, tadastitvābhiniveśasyaiva sarvānarthamūlatvāt. dvayapratibhāsi bhrāntirūpaṃ prahātavyam, bhrāntiprabhedatvāt sarvānarthānām. dvayaśūnyatārūpaṃ punar eṣāṃ pratyakṣīkartavyam, tatpratyakṣasyaiva samyagjñānarūpatvāt, tasya ca sarvabhrāntipratipakṣatvāt, krameṇa mahāsukhamahāmokṣasakalabuddhaguṇavaśitvasādhanatvāc ca. so 'pi mahāmokṣaḥ paramārthaḥ paramaphalatvāt tad api samyagjñānaṃ paramārthaḥ paramo 'rtho 'syeti kṛtvā. iyatā tathatātattvam uktam.

māsacatuṣṭayāvaśiṣṭasyoktiḥ | daśadivasādhikyād iti cet sapakṣe 'pi kathaṃ sā viṃśatidivasair nyūnatvād iti santoṣṭavyam | tasmād īṣadvaiṣamyam avivakṣitam iti suṣṭhūktaṃ "prathamadivase" iti ||

mahāmudrākulaṃ cāgryaṃ mahoṣṇīṣakulaṃ mahat || 24 ||
commentary:
lokalokottarakulam iti | lokṛ darśane | lokyata iti lokaḥ | tasya kulaṃ lokalokottarakulaṃ padmakulam ity arthaḥ ||

lokālokakulaṃ mahad iti | lokānām āloko lokālokaḥ | akṣobhyaḥ | ādarśajñānātmakatvāt | tasya kulaṃ lokālokakulaṃ mahad vajrakulam evāgryaṃ vairocanādīnāṃ bodhicittasvabhāvatvāt | tasya kulaṃ mahāmudrākulam ity arthaḥ || mahoṣṇīṣakulaṃ mahad iti | sarvatathāgatānāṃ traidhātukadharmarājyābhiṣekapradānān mahoṣṇīṣatvam | tasya kulaṃ mahoṣṇīṣakulaṃ mahad ratnakulam ity arthaḥ ||

commentary:
yatra kuśalapakṣasaṃcāre 'pi kvacit samādhānavighātaḥ syāt, tannopādeyamity āha.

svayameva tu yuktyāgamābhyāṃ kalyāṇamitravacanādvā yathābalamavadhārya yatkiṃcitkarma kartumārabdhaṃ dhyānādhyayanādikam, prathamatastadeva tāvanniṣpattiṃ neyaṃ tannimnena cetasā, na punastadaniṣpannameva parityajya paramārambhaṇīyam.

root:
atha vajradhara śrīmān durdāntadamakaḥ paraḥ |
trilokavijayī vīro guhyarāṭ kuliśeśvaraḥ || 1 ||
commentary:
padārthas tv adhunā vyākhyāyate || atheti vajradharam adhikṛtyāha tasyādhyeṣakatvena prastutatvāt | āryamāyājālaṣoḍaśasāhasrikamahāyogatantrāntaḥpātisamādhijālapaṭalād bhagavacchākyamunibhāṣitā bhagavato mañjuśrījñānasattvasya paramārthā nāmasaṃgītir yā tasyā adhyeṣaṇārthaṃ bhagavān vajradharo mṛdvindriyasattvānugrahārthaṃ | punar apy athety āha | athaśabda ānantarye | atha vajradharo bhṛkuṭītaraṅgapramukhaiḥ sārdham nāthaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgataṃ praṇamya kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhūtvā agrataḥ sthita idam āheti saṃbandhaḥ || vajraṃ dhārayatīti vajradharaḥ | anena padena gāmbhīryam abhidhīyate | śriyo devatyas tā vidyante yasyāsau śrīmān | anena caudāryaṃ sūcitaṃ | tataś ca kim uktaṃ bhavati | prajñopāyātmako bhagavān vajradhara iti | ata evoktaṃ śrīsaṃvare |

	sarvākāśāvakāśe śrīvajrasattvas tathāgataḥ |

iti | duḥkhena dāmyanta iti durdāntā īśvarādayas teṣāṃ damakaḥ śāsako vajradharavineyakatvāt teṣām īśvarādīnām | utkṛṣṭatvāṭ paro vajradharaḥ | bhūrlokabhuvarlokasvarlokā iti trayo lokāḥ | tān vijetuṃ śīlam asyeti trilokavijayī || atha vā jayakaramadhukarasarvārthasiddhikarās trayo bhrātaras trilokāḥ | tān vijetuṃ śīlam asyeti trilokavijayī | ata eva vīro bhagavān vajradharaḥ arair anabhibhavanīyatvāt || śrītattvasaṃgrahe pañca guhyāni paṭhyante | tathā hi |

	yathā yathā hi vinayaṃ yānti sattvāḥ svabhāvataḥ |
	tathā tathā hi sattvārthaṃ kuryād rāgādibhiḥ śuciḥ ||
	sarvasattvahitārthāya buddhaśāsanahetutaḥ |
	mārayan sarvasattvāṃs tu na sa pāpena lipyate ||
	sarvasattvahitārthāya buddhakāyaprayogataḥ |
	haraṃs tu paravittāni na sa pāpena lipyate ||
	rāgatulyaṃ sukhaṃ nāsti taj jinebhyaḥ samādadat |
	sattvārthāt paradārāṇi sevayan puṇyam āpnuyāt ||
	sarvasattvahitārthāya buddhaśāsanahetutaḥ |
	sarvakarmāṇi kurvaṃs tu bahu puṇyam avāpnuyāt ||

iti ||

teṣāṃ pañcānāṃ guhyānāṃ rājā guhyarāṭ | guhyair vā rājata iti guhyarāṭ || kuliśo vajras tasyeśvaraḥ kuliśeśvaraḥ || bhagavān vajradharo 'grataḥ sthito bhūtvā kṛtāñjalipuṭa idaṃ vakṣyamānam āheti kriyāpadaṃ sarvatra yojanīyam ||

root:

durdāntadamakair vīrair vīrabībhatsarūpibhiḥ || 3 ||
commentary: śrīvajrapāṇyabhiṣekatantre śrīvajradharānucarā bhṛkuṭītaraṃgapramukhāḥ pañca śatāni krodhagaṇānāṃ paṭhyante | taiḥ sārdhaṃ bhagavān vajradharaḥ saṃbuddhaṃ praṇamyedam āheti yojyaṃ || te ca krodhagaṇāḥ paramārthato 'nantāḥ | ata āhānantair vajrapāṇibhir iti | te 'pi durdāntadamakā vajradharavat | ata evāha durdāntadamakair iti | ata eva vīrās te | tair anabhibhavanīyatvāt | ata āha vīrair iti | kiṃrasā vīrarasāḥ | kiṃrūpiṇo bībhatsarūpiṇaḥ | ata eva vīrabībhatsarūpibhir iti ||

commentary:
aparam āha.

uddhatam iti saddharmādiśravaṇapramādād api uddhatam, vikṣepabahulam ity arthaḥ. sopahāsaṃ vāgviheṭhanārambhakaṃ tayā yuktaṃ vā. mānaś cittasyonnatiḥ. madaḥ svadharme cittasyābhiniveśaḥ. tābhyām anvitaṃ tatsaṃprayuktam. utprāsaḥ kāyikī viheṭhanā. tena sahotkaṭam. vakraṃ kuṭilaṃ śaṭhaṃ vā. vañcakaṃ pratārakaṃ māyāvi vā. yadi mano bhavet, sthātavyaṃ kāṣṭhavat tadeti saṃbandhaḥ.

nirlepanīrūpanirañjanādyair
bhrāntir na kāryāparasādhyasattve || 20 ||
commentary: tasminn iti || tasminn adrau citrakūṭādrau | abalāviprayuktaḥ kāntāvirahī | kanakasya valayaḥ kaṭakam || "kaṭakaṃ valayo 'striyām" ity amaraḥ || tasya bhraṃśena pātena riktaḥ śūnyaḥ prakoṣṭhaḥ kūrparādadhaḥ pradeśo yasya sa tathoktaḥ || "kakṣāntare prakoṣṭhaḥ syāt prakoṣṭhaḥ kūrparādadhaḥ" iti śāśvataḥ || virahaduḥkhāt kṛśa ity arthaḥ | kāmī kāmukaḥ sa yakṣaḥ | katicinmāsān | aṣṭau māsān ity arthaḥ | "śeṣān māsān gamaya caturaḥ" iti vakṣyamāṇatvāt || nītvā yāpayitvā | āṣāḍhānakṣatreṇa yuktā paurṇamāsyāṣāḍhī || "nakṣatreṇa yuktaḥ kālaḥ" ity aṇ | "ṭiḍḍhāṇañ-" ityādinā ṅīp || sāṣāḍhy asmin paurṇamāsīty āṣāḍho māsaḥ || "sāsmin paurṇamāsīti saṃjñāyām" ity aṇ || tasya prathamadivase āśliṣṭasānum ākrāntakūṭam | vaprakrīḍā utkhātakelayaḥ || "utkhātakeliḥ krīḍādyair vaprakrīḍā nigadyate" iti śabdārṇave || tāsu pariṇatas tiryag dantaprahāraḥ || "tiryagdantaprahāras tu gajaḥ pariṇato mataḥ" iti halāyudhaḥ || sa cāsau gajaś ca tam iva prekṣaṇīyaṃ darśanīyaṃ meghaṃ dadarśa || gajaprekṣaṇīyam ity atreva lopāluptopamā || kecit "āṣāḍhasya prathamadivase" ity atra "pratyāsanne nabhasi" iti vakṣyamāṇanabhomāsasya pratyāsasya "praśamadivase" iti pāṭhaṃ kalpayanti tad asaṅgatam | upayogābhāvenāvivakṣitatvāt | vivakṣitatve vā svapakṣe 'pi prathamadivasātikrameṇa meghadarśana kalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvena tadasambhavāt | pratyutāsmatpakṣa eva kuśala sandeśasya bhāvyanarthapratīkārārthasya purata evānumānamuktaṃ bhavatīty upayoga siddhiḥ || nanūnmattasya nāyaṃ viveka iti cen na | unmattasya nānarthasya pratīkārārthaṃ pravṛttir apīti sandeśa eva mā bhūt || tathā ca kāvyārambha evāprasiddhaḥ syād itv aho mūlacchedī pāṇḍityaprakarṣaḥ | kathaṃ tarhi "śāpānto" me bhujagaśayanād utthite śārṅgapāṇau" ityādinā bhagavatprabodhāv adhikasya śāpasya māsacatuṣṭayāvaśiṣṭasyoktiḥ | daśadivasādhikyād iti cet sapakṣe 'pi kathaṃ sā viṃśatidivasair nyūnatvād iti santoṣṭavyam | tasmād īṣadvaiṣamyam avivakṣitam iti suṣṭhūktaṃ "prathamadivase" iti ||

commentary:
brahmādipadānāṃ svasamaye 'prasiddhatvādarthamāha—brahmetyādi |
nirvṛtirnirvāṇam | tato buddha eva vastuto brahmā | na punaranyastasya paramārthato 'nivṛttatvāt | evamuttareṣvapi | viśanāditi vyāpanāt | sukalyāṇādityatyantakalyāṇatvāt | sarveṣāmātmā nijaṃ rūpam | tatra sthito yatastataḥ sarva ityarthaḥ |

amandaṃ kandarpajvarajanitacintākulatayā valadbādhāṃ rādhāṃ sarasamidamūce sahacarī ||
commentary: rādhāṃ prati sahacarī sakhī sarasaṃ yathā syāttathā yadagre gītena vakṣyamāṇaṃ idameva ūce uvāca | rasena saha vartata iti sarasam | tatkriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ dvitīyāntaṃ napuṃsakameva | kiṃbhūtām rādhām | valadbādhāṃ valantī vardhamānā bādhā vyathā yasyāstām | kasmin kāle | vasante | kiṃbhūtām bhramantīṃ calantīm | kasmin | kāntāre durge pathi mārge | kairavayavaiḥ | caraṇādibhiḥ | kiṃbhūtaiḥ | vāsantīkusumasukumāraiḥ | vāsantī mādhavīlatā | tasyāḥ kusumāni | tadvat sukumārā mṛdulāḥ taiḥ | punaḥ kiṃbhūtām | bahuvihitakṛṣṇānusaraṇām | bahudhā anekaprakāreṇa athavā bahuvāraṃ vihitaṃ kṛtaṃ kṛṣṇānusaraṇaṃ kṛṣṇānveṣaṇaṃ yayā sā tathā tām| kayā hetubhūtayā| amandaṃ atyarthaṃ yathā syāttathā kandarpajvarajanitacintākulatayā | dāhahetutvāt kandarpa eva jvaraḥ athavā kandarpeṇa jvarastena janitā prādurbhūtā jīvanacintā tayā ākulā vyākulā tasyāḥ bhāvastayā |

mā mojju deha sudukkhia hoi hai jīva vihuna || piśunavajryāḥ || 4.28 ||
commentary:
parāgamasāmyam uktvā svāgamavirodham āha—kiṃ cetyādi | iha hi madhyamakādivicārito 'rtho mantranaye phalena devatāyogena khyāpyate | tataś ca yad yena mudryate tat tatsvabhāvaṃ bhavatīti kṛtvā grāhyasya rūpādiskandhacatuṣṭayasvabhāvasya grāhyatvahānaye vairocanādayaś catvāro grāhakāḥ paratantrarūpāḥ kathyante | teṣāṃ ca mudrārthaṃ pariniṣpannarūpo grāhyagrāhakaśūnyo 'kṣobhyaś ced ucyate tad āgamoktā vajrasattvamudrā virudhyate | ratnagarbhādisthabodhicitte pariniṣpannarūpākṣobhyasadbhāvāt | vajrasattvamudrāṃ ca vinā na bauddhakṛtānto bhavatīti kathaṃ bāhyasiddhāntena na sāmyam | tathā ca kambalāmbarapādāḥ—

	sarvaḥ samānaḥ pravibhajyamānaḥ 
		sukṣmekṣikākṣāmadhiyā kṛtāntaḥ |
	bauddhasya bāhyasya vibhāgakartrī
		na syād ihaikā yadi śūnyatoktiḥ ||

	mā bhūt saṃvitpratiṣṭhānam ata eva munir bhayāt |
	bhinatti deśanādharmam uktvoktvā śūnyatātmanā ||

iti pravacanam api | 

	samastavedasiddhānāṃ kṛtānām īśvarādibhiḥ |
	bauddhānāṃ tantramantrāṇāṃ viśeṣaḥ śunyatāṃ prati ||

iti | paraparikalpitaśūnyatoktibhyas tathāgataśūnyatoktīnām abhisandhikṛto viśeṣaḥ sphuṭa iti na pratanyate ||

commentary: he keśava dhṛtakacchaparūpa | dhṛtaṃ kacchapasya rūpaṃ yena sa tathā saṃbuddhiḥ | tava pṛṣṭhe kṣitiḥ pṛthvī tiṣṭhati | kiṃbhūte | ativipulatare | atiśayena vipulaṃ vistīrṇaṃ tasmin | punaḥ kiṃbhūte | dharaṇidharaṇakiṇacakragariṣṭhe | dharaṇyāḥ bhūmerdharaṇaṃ tena kiṇaḥ mṛtaraktagranthiḥ | sa eva cakraṃ cakrākāraḥ tena gariṣṭhaṃ gurutaram | tasmin | jagadīśa hare iti sarvatra yojyam |

commentary: yad ekasya rucijanakaṃ tad anyasya viparītam. anyonyaviruddhābhiḥ pṛthagjanecchābhirakheditam avipratisāri. katham? dayānvitam. hetupadam etat. kutaḥ? yasmāt kleśotpādān na svātantryādidam etat parasparaviruddhacaritam eṣāṃ bālānām iti matvā.

tasyās tiktair vanagajamadair vāsitaṃ vāntavṛṣṭir
jambūkuñjapratihatarayaṃ toyam ādāya gaccheḥ |
antaḥsāraṃ ghana tulayituṃ nānilaḥ śakṣyati tvāṃ
riktaḥ sarvo bhavati hi laghuḥ pūrṇatā gauravāya ||
commentary:
ata idam abhidhīyate.

śikṣyate upādīyate gṛhītasaṃvaraṇeneti vihiteṣu karaṇīyatā, pratiṣiddheṣv akaraṇaṃ śikṣā, tāṃ rakṣituṃ paripālayituṃ kāmena icchatā bodhisattvena ātmacittaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ prayatnata iti kathayiṣyamāṇāt. atha śikṣārakṣaṇādhikāre kim iti cittaṃ rakṣyata ity āha—na śikṣeti. anyathā śikṣaiva rakṣitum aśakyā calam anāyattaṃ cittam arakṣatā, cittasya calatāyāṃ śikṣāyāḥ sthairyāyogāt.

root:

dehe sambhavatīty asmād devateti nigadyate || 14 ||
commentary:
tattvameva tadadyāpi na jñāyate yadātmakametatsarvamityāha—satsukhatveneti |
satsukhaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ mahāsukham | vibuddho bodhanādrateriti tasyaiva mahāsukhasya bodhādvibuddho buddha eva | nanu devatāviśeṣāḥ pratipāditāḥ | devatātvameva tu sāmānyaṃ na pratipāditamityāha—deha iti | dehe sambhavatīti devatā varṇāgamalopābhyām |

root:
pañcapradīpāmṛtabinducandra-
bhrūmadhyabindūdbhavamaṇḍalāni |
vāyoḥ svarūpaṃ galaśuṇḍikādyam
atattvarūpaṃ svayam ūhanīyam || 18 ||
commentary:
pañcapradīpetyādi. pañcapradīpaśabdena gokudahanalakṣaṇasya, amṛtaśabdena vimūmāraśulakṣaṇasya satatānuṣṭhānam eva sādhyaṃ manyante. bindur iti hṛccandrasthaṃ binduṃ dedīpyamānaṃ tattvaṃ sādhyaṃ ceti kṛtvā kecid bhāvayanti. candra iti hṛdisthaṃ kalārūpam ardhacandraṃ vā hṛtkamalasthaṃ kecid bhāvayanti.

bhrūmadhyabindūdbhavamaṇḍalānīti bhruvor madhya ūrṇāyāṃ binduṃ vibhāvya tadbindūdbhavāni maṇḍalāni vāyuvāruṇamāhendrāgneyalakṣaṇāni. etad uktaṃ bhavati—mukhaśravaṇacakṣurghrāṇāni hastāṅgulībhiḥ pidhāya bhrūmadhyabindur draṣṭavyaḥ. tasya sphuṭāvasthāyāṃ śubhāśubhanimittasaṃsūcakāni māhendrādimaṇḍalāny upajāyante. taṃ ca binduṃ tattvam iti manyante.

vāyoḥ svarūpam iti pūrakakumbhakarecakapraśāntakalakṣaṇam ānāpānādilakṣaṇaṃ ceti. etad uktaṃ bhavati—śaivasāṃkhyādinirdiṣṭaṃ vāyusvarūpaṃ jñātvā taṃ vāyuṃ nirodhabhāvanayā sthirīkṛtyākāśa utplutya gamanaṃ parapurapraveśaṃ yāvan muktiṃ ca sākṣāt kurvanti vāyuvādinaḥ.

galaśuṇḍiketi. galapradeśe jihvāmūlopari hastiśuṇḍikākārā adhaḥpralambamānā upajihvāsaṃjñikā galaśuṇḍikāsti. sā ca śaktirūpā. tadadhaḥ śivarūpam asti tattvam. sā ca jihvāgreṇa spṛśyamānā nirantaraṃ amṛtaṃ sravati. tena ca ghargharāmṛtavarṣaṇena santarpyamānam ātmānaṃ dhyāyād iti galaśuṇḍikātattvam. ādiśabdena hṛnmadhyaṣoḍaśanāḍikācakramadhyasthajñānasvarūpaṃ śivarūpaṃ tattvaṃ bhāvayitavyam ityādīnāṃ parigrahaḥ.

tat sarvaṃ tīrthikādibhis tattvarūpeṇābhimatam atattvam iti svayam evohanīyaṃ vicāraṇīyam iti yāvat.

tasyās tiktair vanagajamadair vāsitaṃ vāntavṛṣṭir
jambūkuñjapratihatarayaṃ toyam ādāya gaccheḥ |
antaḥsāraṃ ghana tulayituṃ nānilaḥ śakṣyati tvāṃ
riktaḥ sarvo bhavati hi laghuḥ pūrṇatā gauravāya ||
commentary: tasyā iti || he megha vāntavṛṣṭir udgīrṇavarṣaḥ san | kṛtavamanaś ca vyajyate | tiktaiḥ sugandhibhis tiktarasavadbhiś ca || "tikto rase sugandhau ca" iti viśvaḥ || vanagajamadair vāsitaṃ surabhitaṃ bhāvitaṃ ca | himavad vindhyamalayā gajānāṃ prabhavā iti vindhyasya gajaprabhavatvād iti bhāvaḥ | jambūkuñjaiḥ pratihatarayaṃ pratibaddhavegam | sukhapeyam ity arthaḥ | anena laghutvaṃ kaṣāyabhāvanā ca vyajyate | tasyā revāyās toyam ādāya gaccher vraja | he ghana megha, antaḥ sāro balaṃ yasya taṃ tvām anila ākāśavāyuḥ | śarīrasthaś ca gamyate | tulayituṃ na śakṣyati śakto na bhaviṣyati | tathā hi rikto 'ntaḥsāraśūnyaḥ sarvo 'pi laghur bhavati | prakampyo bhavatīty arthaḥ | pūrṇatā sāravattā gauravāyāprakampyatvāya bhavatīty arthaḥ | ayam atra dhvaniḥ—ādau vamanaśodhitasya puṃsaḥ paścāc chleṣmaśoṣaṇāya laghutiktakaṣāyāmbupānāl labdhabalasya vātaprakampo na syād iti | tathāha vāgbhaṭaḥ—"kaṣāyāś cāhimās tasya viśuddhau śleṣmaṇo hitāḥ | kimu tiktakaṣāyā vā ye nisargāt kaphāpahāḥ || kṛtaśuddheḥ kramāt pītapeyādeḥ pathyabhojinaḥ | vātādibhir na bādhā syād indriyair iva yoginaḥ ||" iti ||

commentary: punar api kiṃviśiṣṭam ity āha | yātītair ityādi | atītair buddhair yā bhāṣitā anāgatāś ca ye samyaksaṃbuddhā hi yasmād yāṃ bhāṣiṣyante punaḥ | pratyutpannāś ca buddhā bhagavanto bhāṣante yāṃ nāmasaṃgītiṃ punar apīti || pratyutpannāś ca saṃbuddhā yāṃ bhāṣante punaḥ punaḥ ||

commentary: tvayīti || kṛṣer halakarmaṇaḥ phalaṃ sasyaṃ tvayi || adhikaraṇavivakṣāyāṃ saptamī || āyattam adhīnam || "adhīno vighna āyattaḥ" ity amaraḥ || iti hetoḥ prītyā snigdhaiḥ | akṛtrimapremārdrair ity arthaḥ | bhrūvikārāṇāṃ bhrūvilāsānām anabhijñaiḥ | pāmaratvād iti śeṣaḥ | janapadavadhūnāṃ pallīyoṣitāṃ locanaiḥ pīyamānaḥ sādaraṃ vīkṣyamāṇaḥ san | mālaṃ mālākhyaṃ kṣetraṃ śailaprāyam unnatasthalam || "mālam unnatabhūtalam" ity utpalamālāyām || sadyas tatkālam eva sīrair halair utkaṣaṇena karṣaṇena surabhi ghrāṇatarpaṇaṃ yathā tathā āruhya || tatrābhivruṣyety arthaḥ || "surabhir ghāṇatarpaṇaḥ" ity amaraḥ || kiñcit paścāl laghugatis tatra nivṛṣṭatvāt kṣipragamanaḥ san "laghu kṣiprataraṃ drutam" ity amaraḥ || bhūyaḥ punar apy uttareṇaivottaramārgeṇaiva vraja gaccha || tṛtīyāvidhāne "prakṛtyādibhya upasaṃkhyānam" iti tṛtīyā || yathā kaścid bahuvallabhaḥ patiḥ kutracit kṣetre kalatre gūḍhaṃ vihṛtya || "kṣetraṃ śarīre kedāre siddhasthānakalatrayoḥ" iti viśvaḥ || dākṣiṇyabhaṅgabhayān nīcamārgeṇa nirgatya punaḥ sarvādhyakṣa iva sañcarati tad vaditi dhvaniḥ ||

commentary: mahātantram iti | trividhaṃ tantraṃ | hetuphalopāyabhedena tatra hetur anādinidhanasahajaikasvabhāvaṃ jñānaṃ mahāsukhaṃ | bhāvyamānatvāt | tad eva phalam āgantukakleśādimalāpagamena sādhyatvāt | upāyas tv āgantukamalāpakarṣaṇe utpattyutpannakramabhāvenaiva | tanpratipādako 'pi granthasandarbhaḥ prabandhaḥ tantraśabdenocyate | upacārāt | tantraḥ kriyātantraḥ tasya rājā tad ukto mantradevatābhāvanādividhiḥ | tasyeśvaraṃ prabhuṃ paraṃ śreṣṭhaṃ āśu śīghram ||

commentary:
idānīṃ vicitrasusthāpanārtham āha—vicitram ityādi | sadguror ityādinā

	vicitraṃ vividhaṃ khyātam āliṅganacumbanādikam || 

ity uddeśāt | atra hy ādigrahaṇād gṛṣṭiparyantaṃ vicitraṃ vivakṣitam |

nanu ghṛṣṭiparyantam iti katham gamyate |

	bāhubhyāṃ ca samāliṅgya prajñāṃ vai ṣoḍaśābdikām |
	ghaṇṭhāvajrasamāyogād ācāryasecanaṃ matam || 

iti nirdeśāt | atra ghaṇṭhāvajrasamāyogaḥ padmavajrasparśo vivakṣitaḥ | 

nanv ayam ācāryasekaḥ | ādāv ācāryaś ca vicitram iti kuto jñeyaḥ |

	ānandādyāḥ kramaśo jñeyāś catuḥsecanasaṅkhyayā || 

iti pratinirdeśāt | atrānandādyāś catvāraḥ—

	ācārya guhya prajñā ca caturthaṃ tat punas tathā | 

iti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ jñeyāḥ | ānandaś ca vicitra eva kṣaṇa iti ghṛṣṭiparyantaṃ vicitram |

	vipākaṃ tadviparyāsaṃ sukhaṃ jñānasya bhuñjanam || 

ity uddeśān maṇyagraṃ yāvat paramaḥ sukharūpatvāt paramasya | 

nanv etat katham | 

	paramānande tu samprāpte nānātvavarjite kṣaṇe |
	śāstā brūyān mahāsattva dhāraṇīyaṃ mahat sukham || 

iti nirdeśāt | atraiva nānātvavarjite kṣana ityādy arthasadbhāvād iti sarvasustham | maṇyantargatam ityādi ca gatārtham | 

yadi ghṛṣṭiparyantam ānandaḥ sa cācāryo maṇeḥ puraḥ paramaḥ sa ca guhyas tarhi—

	hasitaśuddhyā tv ācārya īkṣaṇe guhyakas tathā |
	prajñā pāṇyavāpatau tu tat punar dvandvatantrake || 

iti katham | bāhyotpattyā tan neyam | tarhy udakābhiṣekādīnām ācāryatoktā yā sā katham | sāpi bāhyotpattyā jñeyā | tathāgatāśvāsānande cācāryatā gambhīrotpattyā vajradharāśvāsānadne cotpannena | caturmudrāpakṣe ca pariniṣpannenācāryatvena karmudrā boddhavyā ||

commentary:
ata evaitāś catasraḥ sattvavajryādipāramitā a ā aṃ aḥ iti caturbhir akṣaraiḥ pariniṣpannā iti || tataś ca yad eva cittaṃ dharmadhātusvabhāvaṃ prakṛtyā grāhyagrāhakādyākāravirahāt tad evāgantukamalābhāvaprabhāsvaratvāj jñānāntarodayanimittatvāc cādarśajñānātmakam || dharmālambanakṛpādyātmakatayā saṃtānāntarabhedāparāmarṣāc ca samatājñānam || sarvajñeyāviparyāsāt pratyavekṣaṇājñānam || samastalokahitahetutayā kṛtyānuṣṭhānjñānātmakam || ataś ca yathākramaṃ śāśvatādyadhipatisvabhāvam || ata evāha mahāmahamahārāga ityādi ||

atra cādāv amitābhasyopādānaṃ rāgasya prādhānyakhyāpanārthaṃ | ata evāha rāgo dveṣaś ca mohaś ceti | sarvatathāgatasarvākāśavyāpipūjāsaṃdarśanakāle mahāmaha ity ucyate | mahaśabdena pūjābhidhīyate | mahaṇ maho mahāmahaḥ | mahātmako rāgaś ca mahārāgaḥ | mahāmahaś cāsau mahārāgaś ca mahāmahamahārāgaḥ | tatra mahārāga iti sattvapācanamocanalokṣaṇaḥ sa ca bhagavān śrīvajrasattvaḥ | mahārāgo hi bhagavān vajrasattvas tathāgata iti vacanāt || sarvasattvaratiṃkara iti rāgacaritānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ratiṃ prītiṃ mahāsukhātmikāṃ karotīti sarvasattvaratiṃkaraḥ | ayam amitābhasvabhāvaḥ ||

dveṣacaritān adhikṛtyāha | mahāmahamahādveṣa iti | mahāmaheti gatārthaḥ | mahādveṣo 'kṣobhyaḥ sa ca sarvakleSamahāripuḥ | kleśopakleśādīnāṃ mahāripur ity arthaḥ ||

commentary: tato 'grataḥ saptapātāladeśagatadṛṣṭiḥ sann ityarthaḥ | vātetyādi tad anantākāśāntargataṃ nīlayaṃkārapariṇataṃ vāyumaṇḍalaṃ ṣoḍaśalakṣayojanapramāṇam utsargeṇa tiryagsaṃkhyapramāṇaṃ cākāraṃ koṭidvaye ca latāpatākāṅkitaṃ śyāmavarṇaṃ bhāvayet | tadupari raktaraṃkārapariṇatam agnimaṇḍalaṃ trikoṇaṃ pṛthivīmaṇḍalapramāṇaṃ raktavarṇaṃ koṇeṣu raṃkārāṅkitaṃ bhāvayet | tadupari śuklavaṃkārapariṇataṃ jalamaṇḍalaṃ śuklavarṇalaṃ madhye ghaṭāṅkitam aṣṭalakṣocchrayaṃ tiryagdvādaśalakṣaṃ bhāvayet | tadupari pṛthivīmaṇḍalaṃ pītalaṃkārapariṇataṃ caturasraṃ sarvasauvarṇacatuḥpārśveṣu triśūlavajrāṅkitam | lakṣatrayasamucchrayaṃ tiryagdvādaśalakṣaṃ bhāvayet | tadūrdhvaṃ caturvarṇasuṃkāraṃ dhyātvā tatpariṇataṃ sumeruṃ caturatnamayam aśītiyojanasahasrapramāṇadṛśyabhāgaṃ pṛthivyūrdhvasthitāśītisahasrapramāṇajale nirmagnāśītisahasrādṛśyabhāgam | saptaśītāsaptaparvatapariveṣṭitam | tatra prathamaḥ śīto 'śītisahasrayojanavistāraḥ tadardhamānena parvataḥ | śīto 'pi tathā etadardhamānenāparaḥ parvataḥ | śītam api tathā evaṃ yathākramaṃ sarvaṃ bodhavyam | tatas tadbahir mahāsamudram aśītisahasrayojanavistāram | tadante cakravāḍaṃ tiryagdvādaśayojanaṃ yojanaśatatrayasamucchrayeṇa | tadbahir mahācakravāḍam etaddviguṇena | tadbahir agniprākāraṃ tathāpramāṇam |  tataḥ sumeroḥ pūrve pūrvavideham ardhacandrākāraṃ navasahasrayojanapramāṇam | dakṣiṇe jambudvīpaṃ trikoṇaṃ saptasahasrayojanapramāṇam | paścime aparagoḍānīyam aṣṭasahasrayojanapramāṇam | vartulam | uttare uttarakuruṃ caturasraṃ daśasahasrayojanapramāṇam | dvīpānāṃ vāmadakṣiṇayor dvāv upadvīpau tadardhapramāṇau | tatra pūrvavidehādikrameṇa dehavidehau | śāṭhottaramantriṇau | amaravarau kurukauravau ceti bhāvayet | granthavistarabhayāt tu mūle pratyakṣarena noktaṃ caturmaṇḍalabhāvanaiva tu sarveṣu cittam iti śraddheyam ||

commentary: prasiddhimeva darśayati dhārmiketi hyantena | anugrahakāriṇi hi laukikā dhārmikaśabdaṃ prayuñjānā dṛśyante | pīḍākāriṇi cādhārmikaśabdam | yaśca dharmam ācarati sa dhārmikaḥ | tad yady anugraho dharmaḥ tad evam upapadyate nānyatheti | etad eva bhagavato vyāsasyāpy abhimatam iti darśayati tatheti prayojanamantena | nirviṣayaprayogāsambhavāt tadviṣayam idamā pratinirdiśati | tad ayam arthaḥ viśiṣṭaviṣaye puṇyapāpapadadvaye ācaṇḍālaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ vidyamāne tenaiva dharmādharmapramitisiddher anarthakaṃ śāstram iti | nanv evaṃ puṇyapāpapramāṇakau dharmādharmāvuktau na lokapramāṇakau | naivam | tatprayogasyaiva lokāyattatvāt | tasmādayam anupālambha iti ||

commentary: āpṛcchasveti | priyaṃ sakhāyaṃ priyasakham || "rājāhaḥsakhibhyaṣ ṭac" iti ṭac samāsāntaḥ || tuṅgam unnataṃ puṃsāṃ vandhair narārādhanīyai raghupatipadai rāmapādanyāsair mekhalāsu kaṭakeṣu || "atha mekhalā | śroṇisthāne 'drikaṭake kaṭibandhebhabandhane" iti yādavaḥ || aṅkitaṃ cihnitam | itthaṃ saṅkhitvān mahattvāt pavitratvāc ca sambhāvanārham | amuṃ śailaṃ citrakūṭādrim āliṅganyāpṛcchasva sādho yāmīty āmantraṇena sabhājaya || "āmantraṇasabhājane | āpracchannam" ity amaraḥ || "āṅi nupracchacor upasaṅkhyānam" ity ātmanepadam || sakhitvaṃ nirvāhayati—kāla iti || kāle kāle pratiprāvṛṭkālam | suhṛtsamāgamanakālaś ca kālaśabdenocyate | vīpsāyāṃ dviruktiḥ || bhavataḥ saṃyogaṃ samparkam etya ciravirahajam uṣṇaṃ bāṣpam ūṣmāṇaṃ netrajalaṃ ca || "bāṣpo netrajaloṣmaṇoḥ" iti viśvaḥ || muñcato yasya śalasyaḥ snehavyaktiḥ premāvirbhāvo bhavati | snigdhānāṃ hi ciravirahasaṅgatānāṃ bāṣpapāto bhavatīti bhāvaḥ ||

pañcagatisaṃsārajātyādiduḥkhaṃ prahātuṃ tatprahāṇe nirvāṇasukham adhigantuṃ te sattvā mudhā nirarthakā eva bhramanty ambare kāsīpuṣpam iva niṣphalaṃ saṃsāre. yad anuṣṭhitaṃ kvacid api na lagnam iti tad eva mam idhīyate pañcāgnisevāśiroluñcanādivratam. ke punar evaṃ bhramanti? yaiḥ saṃsārabhayabhīrubhiḥ sukhārthibhiś ca dharmasarvasvaṃ sarvalaukikalokottarakarmanidānabhūtaṃ cittaṃ bālānām agocarasvabhāvatayā guhyaṃ na bhāvitaṃ tattvacittatayā punaḥ punaḥ sthirīkṛtam. tasmād iyam atitarāṃ cittam eva. yathopavarṇitam āryagaṇḍavyūhe-

	svacittādhiṣṭhānaṃ sarvabodhisattvacaryā. svacittādhiṣṭhānaṃ sarvasattvaparipākavinayaḥ. peyālam. tasya mama kulaputra evaṃ bhavati-svacittam evopastambhayitavyaṃ sarvakuśalamūlaiḥ. svacittam eva parisyandayitavyaṃ dharmameghaiḥ. svacittam eva pariśodhayitavyam āvaraṇīyadharmebhyaḥ. svacittam eva dṛḍhīkartavyaṃ vīryeṇa |

ityādi.

commentary: channeti || he megha, pariṇataiḥ paripakvaiḥ phalair dyotanta iti tathoktaiḥ | āṣāḍhe vanacūtāḥ phalanti pacyanteḥ ca meghavātenety āśayaḥ | kānanāmrair vanacūtaiś channopānta āvṛtapārśve 'cala āmrakūṭādriḥ snigdhaveṇīsavarṇe masṛṇakeśabandhacchāye | śyāmavarṇaṃ ity arthaḥ || "veṇī tu keśabandhe jalasrutau" iti yādavaḥ | tvayi śikharaṃ śṛṅgam ārūḍhe sati || "yasya ca bhāvena bhāvalakṣaṇam" iti saptamī || madhye śyāmaḥ śeṣe madhyād anyatra vistāre paritaḥ pāṇḍur hariṇaḥ || "hariṇaḥ pāṇḍuraḥ pāṇḍuḥ" ity amaraḥ || bhuvaḥ stana iva | amaramithunānām | khecarāṇām iti bhāvaḥ | prekṣaṇīyāṃ darśanīyām avasthāṃ nūnaṃ yāsyati | mithunagrahaṇaṃ kāminām eva stanatvenotprekṣā sambhavatīti kṛtam | yathā pariśrāntaḥ kaścit kāmī kāminīnāṃ kucakalaśe viśrāntaḥ sansvapiti tadvad bhavān api bhuvo nāyikāyāḥ stana iti dhvaniḥ ||

commentary:

tarhi mahāmudrāyāṃ dānapāramitādīnāṃ kim abhāva eva | na | tasyā eva sarvapāramitādyātmakapuṇyajñānasambhāradvayarūpatvāt | tad uktaṃ viśeṣacintibrahmaparipṛcchāmahāyānasūtre—

etenāpratiṣṭhānāprapañcarūpaiva prajñāpāramiteti sthitam | tad uktaṃ saptaśatikāyām—

ityādi ||

tad evam upāyamātrāpekṣitayā cāśeṣalaukikalokottarasamādhisvabhāvatvād bhagavato jñānasattvasya tathāgatajñānakāyasya ||

ākārair nīlapītasukhaduḥkhādibhiś citrarūpaiḥ śūnyaṃ nirākāram. ata eva gaganasyeva nirākāratvenendor iva prabhāsvaratvena rūpaṃ svabhāvo yasya tat tathā. pratyātmavedyam iti svasaṃvedanaikavedyam. karuṇā duḥkhād duḥkhahetor vā sakalajagadabhyuddharaṇakāmatā. saiva rasaḥ svabhāvo yasya tat tathoktam. etad uktaṃ bhavati—nīlapītādicitrākāraśūnyaṃ nirābhāsaṃ nirañjanaṃ gaganopamaṃ svacchaṃ sakalajagadarthakāri mahākaruṇāyuktaṃ pratyātmavedyaṃ pāramitopadeśaśabdābhidheyaṃ sādhyam iti pāramitānaye prathamaṃ sādhyam.

śobhanāni ca tāni lakṣaṇāni ca dvātriṃśallakṣaṇasaṃjñakāni, tair bhūṣitam. arthaṃ janānāṃ prayojanaṃ kartuṃ śīlaṃ svabhāvo yasya tad arthakāri. dānādīnāṃ daśapāramitānāṃ niṣyandaṃ tatprakarṣaprabhavatvena sadṛśaṃ phalam. duḥkhasya pūrvam eva prahīṇatvāt, sākṣātkaraṇāvasthāyāṃ saukhyasyāpy abhāvāt, upekṣārūpatvenāpetasaukhyam apagatasaukhyam. etad uktaṃ bhavati—dvātriṃśallakṣaṇadharāśītyanuvyañjanavirājitaśarīraṃ sakalajagadarthakāri dānādipāramitābhyāsabalenotpannaṃ samyaksaṃbuddharūpaṃ sukhaduḥkharahitatvenopekṣārūpaṃ dvitīyaṃ sādhyam.

ācāraḥ śikṣaṇīyam. aprameyaḥ asaṃkhyeyaḥ bodhisattvaprātimokśādiṣu pradarśitaḥ. tatsaṃgraharūpaṃ prathamataḥ cittaśodhanam eva ācāram ācaret. niyatam avaśyaṃtayā.

root:
sarva eva bhavallābhaheturbhaktimatāṃ vibho |
saṃvinmārgo 'yamāhlādaduḥkhamohaistridhā sthitaḥ || 1.10 ||
commentary: sarva eva bhallābha iti | vyākhyātaprakṛṣṭabhaktiśālinām ayamāhlādaduḥkhamohairūpalakṣito loke yaḥ saṃvinmārgaḥ nīlapītādibodharūpaḥ panthāḥ sthitaḥ sa sarva eva tvatprāptihetuḥ | vedyasopānanimajjanakrameṇa paramavedakabhūmilābhāt |

root:

ratnapuram idaṃ devi kiñjalke jalatāṃ vrajet |
rudro yugme śivaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ śaktiḥ saiva parātparā || Seni 7 ||
lakṣyalakṣaṇanirmuktaṃ vāgudāhāravarjitam |
śivaśaktisamāyogāj jāyate cādbhutaṃ sukham || SeNi 8 ||
commentary: tatsvarūpam āha—lakṣyetyādi | subodham ||

root:
karasphoṭo bhaven mudrā aṅgulyāmoṭanaṃ tathā |  
tad dhyeyaṃ cintitaṃ yac ca dhyānaṃ yasmād vicintanam || 20 ||
commentary: anantaram etajjñānakāraṇalalanāpraśaṃsām āha—priyetyādi | priyaiva darśanaṃ dṛśyate 'nayābhimato mokṣa iti kṛtvā | śeṣaṃ subodham | etena teṣām apy anyavyākhyāparihāreṇa lalanaiva drṣṭāntanidarśanārtham abhimatety uktaṃ bhavati |

root:
atha bhagavān vajrasattvaḥ kṛṣṇācalasamādhiṃ samāpadyedam udājahāra |
bhāvābhāvavinirmuktaś caturānandaikatatparaḥ |
niṣprapañcasvarūpo ‘haṃ sarvasaṃkalpavarjitaḥ ||1.2||
commentary:
atiguptatvāt | nanu tadā tvayā katham śrutam iti ced āha || 
athetyādi | ayam arthaḥ | tena vihāreṇa yadā caturānandasukham anubhūya tadanantaraṃ sarvapuruṣeṣu mahākaruṇām āmukhīkṛtyāt | evaṃ kṛṣṇācalasamādhiṃ samāpadyedaṃ vakṣyamāṇam udājahāra udāhṛtavān | tadā śrutam ity arthaḥ | saṅgītikārasya mama vajrapāṇeḥ śrotrendriyarūpatvād bhagavadbhagavatīdeha eva sthitvā mayā śrutam iti bhāvaḥ ||
kim udāhṛtavān | bhāvābhāvetyādi | bhāva ānandaparamānandavikalpaḥ | abhāvo viramānandavikalpaḥ | tābhyāṃ vinirmuktas tyaktaḥ | catvāra ānandās tatra prajñopāyābhyām anyonyānurāgalakṣaṇam āliṅganacumbanastanamardananakhadānādinā yantrārūḍhabandhena vajrapadmasaṃyogaṃ yāvad ānandaḥ | etena kiṃcit sukham utpadyate | tataḥ padmāntargatavajracālanena yāvan maṇimūlaṃ bodhicittam āyāti tāvat paramānandaḥ | etena tadadhikaṃ sukham utpadyate | maṇimūlād yāvat padmodarāntargatam aśeṣaṃ na bhavati tāvat sahajānandaḥ | etena grāhyagrāhakagrahaṇābhimānarahitaṃ paramaṃ sukham utpadyate | ataḥ paraṃ yāvan niśceṣṭībhūya sukhaṃ bhuktaṃ mayeti vikalpayati tāvad viramānandaḥ | virameṇa trividhasukhavisargeṇa ānando harṣo yatra sa tathā | etena sukhānubhavasmaraṇarūpaṃ sukham utpadyate | tair ekam ānandādivikalparahitaṃ sukhajñānamātraṃ tena tatpara āsakta ity arthaḥ || 
niḥśabdo niṣedhe prapañca ādhārādheyacakrabhāvanārūpaḥ tena svasya rūpaṃ yasya sa tathā | saṃkalpaḥ svarganarakādihetukarmasukhaduḥkhādiphalavikalpaḥ ||

root:
yadātmotkarṣaṇābhāsaṃ parapaṃsanam eva ca |
sādhikṣepaṃ sasaṃrambhaṃ sthātavyaṃ kāṣṭhavat tadā || 5.50 ||
commentary: ātmotkarṣaṇaṃ svaguṇātiśayaprakāśanam. tadābhāsaṃ tatpratibhāsaṃ tadvikalpanāt. parapaṃsanaṃ paravigrahaḥ doṣāviṣkaraṇaṃ vā, tadyuktam. adhikṣepaḥ parasya vacanatiraskāraḥ. saṃrambhaḥ sadākalivivādanimittacittapradoṣaḥ. ubhayatra saha tena vartata iti vigrahaḥ. evaṃ yadā paśyet svakaṃ manaḥ, sthātavyaṃ kāṣṭhavat tadeti sāmānyoktam abhisaṃbadhyate.

root:
sādhakena vaktavyam |
kiṃ cāhaṃ notsahe mātas tvadīyāśucibhakṣaṇam |
kāryā bhaktir mayā strīṇāṃ yāvad ābodhimaṇḍataḥ || 3.26 ||
commentary: yāvad ābodhimaṇḍata iti uktalakṣaṇabhaktim antareṇa prajñāyāḥ kṛpābhāvāt sukhalakṣaṇasya bodhimaṇḍasya bodhisārasyānutpattir iti bhāvaḥ ||

root:
tathatāṃ ye tu paśyanti madhyamārthānusārataḥ |
te vai tattvavido dhanyāḥ pratyakṣaṃ yadi saṃvidā || SeNi 31 ||
commentary:
idānīṃ vijñānavādāśaṅkāṃ tadapagame cocchedāśaṅkāṃ ca nirākartum āha—

tathatām ityādi | tathatāṃ bhūtakoṭīṃ ye paśyanti sākṣāt kurvanti madhyamārthānusārataś catuḥkoṭivirahatas te dhanyās tattvavidaḥ | tat kim ucchedena | naiva | saṃvidā saṃvedanena yady aśeṣollekhaparihārāt tat tattvaṃ pratyakṣam anubhūtaṃ syāt |

etac caivaṃvidhaṃ satyadvayātmakam ubhayāntarahitaṃ śūnyatākaruṇābhinnaṃ prajñopāyasvarūpaṃ sadgurupādaprasādavitter jñeyam ||

root:
jayanti bhaktipīyūṣarasāsavavaronmadāḥ |
advitīyā api sadā tvaddvitīyā api prabho || 5 ||
commentary: samprati matsarā nūnaṃ dūṣayiṣyanti mannibandhanam | atas taddoṣodbhāvanena śuśrūṣūṇām utsāhabhaṅgo mā bhūd ity evam artham āha nirdoṣatveti | prasiddhātiśayāv api mokṣasvargau prati nāstikā vivadante | vadanti ca sukhaduḥkhe laukike svarganarakau iti | mokṣe ca sadbhāvataḥ prabhṛti vivādaḥ | eke hi nāsti mokṣa iti vadanti | anye punaḥ sakalaviṣayoparāgarahitaṃ saṃvedanapravāham apavargam āhuḥ | anye taduparamam | apare sakalavaiśeṣikātmaguṇocchedalakṣaṇaṃ niratiśayam aviṣayapariṣvaṅgajam anavasānam ānandasandoham | apare ca pūrve ca bhrāntisamutthair nānāvikalpaiḥ pāramārthikamokṣasvarūpam apalapanty eveti ||

root:
kāpi kapolatale militā lapituṃ kimapi śrutimūle |
cāru cucumba nitambavatī dayitaṃ pulakairanukūle ||
commentary: tathā kāpi nitambavatī gopī śrutimūle karṇamūle kimapi lapituṃ bhāṣituṃ militā satī dayitaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ cāru yathā syāttathā cucumba | kva sthāne | kapolatale | kimbhūte | anukūle | kaiḥ | pulakaiḥ romāñcaiḥ |

root:
vācaḥ pallavayatyumāpatidharaḥ saṃdarbhaśuddhiṃ girāṃ jānīte jayadeva eva śaraṇaḥ ślāghyo durūhadrute |
śṛṅgārottarasatprameyaracanairācāryagovardhanaspardhī ko 'pi na viśrutaḥ śrutidharo dhoyī kavikṣmāpatiḥ ||
commentary: kiṃ kṛtvā | smitam ityādi | lokānāṃ sattvānām apāyatrayaśodhanaṃ narakatiryakpretasaṃśodhanaṃ smitaṃ darśayitvā vajrapāṇiṃ pratyabhāṣateti saṃbandhaḥ || tathāgatānāṃ dharmadeśanāyās triliṅgāni | tad yathā | smitaṃ vyavalokitaṃ raśmisaṃcodanaṃ ca | kvacid ekaṃ kvacid dve kvacit trīṇi vā yugapad bhavanti | tad yathā śrīmāyājālatantre dvayaṃ paṭhyate | smitaṃ vyavalokitaṃ ca | kvacit trīṇi yathā pañcaviṃśatisāhasryāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ maitreyavyavalokanaṃ smitaṃ mukhena raśmispharaṇaṃ ceti | kvacid ekaṃ yathātraiva nāmasaṃgītau smitaṃ saṃdarśya lokānām iti || tac ca smitaṃ caturvidhaṃ | aṅgapratyaṅgaspharaṇena romakūpaspharaṇena prakṛtiprabhāvispharaṇena jihvendriyaraśmispharaṇena ca | tad atra jihvāprātihāryaṃ | deśanāyāḥ pūrvaliṅgaṃ || trailokyābhāsakaraṇam ityādinā darśayati bhūr bhuvaḥ svar iti trayāṇāṃ lokānām ābhāsakaraṇaṃ prakāśanakaraṇaṃ smitaṃ darśayitvā vajrapāṇiṃ pratyabhāṣateti saṃbandhaḥ || punar api kiṃviśiṣṭaṃ smitam ity āha caturmārāriśāsanam iti | catvāro mārāḥ skandhakleśamṛtyudevaputrāḥ | ta evārayas teṣāṃ śāsanam anuśāsanaṃ nigrahaḥ ||

root:
vibuddhapuṇḍarīkākṣaḥ protphullakamalānanaḥ |
prollālayan vajravaraṃ svakareṇa muhur muhuḥ || 2 ||
commentary: tata iti prajñāvacanāvasānāt ||

root:
etad eva samāsena saṃprajanyasya lakṣaṇam |
yat kāyacittāvasthāyāḥ pratyavekṣā muhur muhuḥ || 5.108 ||
commentary:
yaduktam—sadā smṛtisaṃprajanyacāriṇā bhavitavyam iti, tataḥ smṛteḥ svanāmnaiva svarūpaṃ pratītam. saṃprajanyasya tu na jñāyate kīdṛśam iti tatsvarūpapratipattaye prāha.

yatkāyāvasthāyāḥ cittāvasthāyāś ca sarveryāpatheṣu pratyavekṣā nirūpaṇaṃ sarvavāraṃ yathā pratipāditaṃ prāk.

root:
dambholibījasrutidhautaśuddha-
pāthojabhūtāṅkurabhūtapuṣṭi|
turīyasasyaṃ paripākam eti
sphuṭaṃ caturthaṃ viduṣo 'pi gūḍham || 17 ||
commentary:
kiṃ kṛtvā | praṇamya | kaṃ | nātham iti | anāthānāṃ lokānām anuśāsanāt nāthaḥ svāmī | taṃ || punar api kiṃviśiṣṭam nātham ity āha saṃbuddham iti samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ na śrāvakaṃ pratyekabuddhaṃ vā || bhūyo 'pi nāthaṃ viśinaṣṭi bhagavantam iti bhagasaṃpannatvād bhagavān | caturmārabhaṅgād vā | tathā cāha |

	kleśakarma tathā janma kleśajñeyāvṛtī tathā |
	yena vaipakṣikā bhagnās teneha bhagavān smṛtaḥ || iti ||

anena nairuktena vidhinā kleśādikaṃ bhagnavān iti bhagavān | aiśvaryādiguṇayogād vā | tathā cāha |

	aiśvaryasya samgrasya rūpasya yaśasaḥ śriyaḥ |
	jñānasyātha prayatnasya ṣaṇṇām bhaga iti smṛtiḥ || iti ||

punar api kiṃbhūtaṃ nātham ity āha tathāgataṃ iti | tathatāṃ śūnyatāṃ gataḥ tathāgataḥ | atha vā yathā te tathāgatā gatā gacchanti gamiṣyanti tathā gacchatīti tathāgataḥ | taṃ tathāgataṃ praṇamyeti pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ |

root:
pūrvaṃ tāvad idaṃ cittaṃ sadopasthāpyam īdṛśam |
nirindriyeṇeva mayā sthātavyaṃ kāṣṭhavat sadā || 5.34 ||
commentary:
evaṃ tāvad anayor anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ guṇadoṣāv abhidhāya, anarthavivarjanārthaṃ niṣphalaspandavarjanam āha.

prathamaṃ tāvad idaṃ cittam ity adhyātmani cintayati. sarvakālam īdṛśam uktakramayuktam upasthāpayitavyam. tataḥ paraṃ niṣphalaspandavarjanārtham apagatakaraṇagrāmeṇeva niṣphalarūpādiviṣayagrahaṇasarvavikalpopasaṃhārān mayā sthātavyam. kim iva? kāṣṭhavat, cakṣurādivyāpāraśūnyatvāt.

root:
saṃpūrya dānādiguṇān aśeṣān
saṃbuddhakṛtyaṃ sakalaṃ ca kṛtvā |
yad bhūtakoṭeḥ karaṇaṃ ca sākṣāt
sādhyaṃ tad apy asti nirodharūpam || 7 ||
commentary: saṃpūryetyādi. dānādipāramitā eva guṇā, guṇyante 'bhyasyanta iti kṛtvā. tān saṃpūrya paripūrṇān kṛtvā, yat saṃbuddhānāṃ kṛtyaṃ sakalam avaśyakartavyaṃ kṛtsnaṃ tad api kṛtvā, bhūtakoṭeḥ śūnyatālakṣaṇāyāś cittacaittanirodhātmikāyā yat sākṣāt karaṇaṃ tad api sādhyam astīti pāramitānayasthā evaṃ bruvate caturthaṃ sādhyam iti.

root:
śrījayadevabhaṇitamidamadhikaṃ yadi manasā naṭaṇīyam |
harivirahākulavallavayuvatisakhīvacanaṃ paṭhanīyam ||
commentary: idaṃ gītam | śrījayadevabhaṇitam adhikaṃ yathā syāttathā manasā hṛdayena naṭanīyamasti | tarhi bhaktajanaiḥ paṭhanīyam | kiṃ harivirahākulaballavayuvatisakhī | tasyāḥ vacanam | śeṣamarthaṃ ślokena saṃpādayati |

root:
kaścit kāntāvirahaguruṇā svādhikārāt pramattaḥ  
śāpenāstaṅgamitamahimā varṣabhogyeṇa bhartuḥ |  
yakṣaś cakre janakatanayāsnānapuṇyodakeṣu  
snigdhacchāyātaruṣu vasatiṃ rāmagiryāśrameṣu ||
commentary: "āśīrnamaskriyā vastunirdeśo vāpi tanmukham" iti śāstrāt kāvyādau vastunirdeśāt kathāṃ prastauti—kaścid iti || svādhikārāt svaniyogāt pramatto 'navahitaḥ || "pramādo 'navadhānatā" ity amaraḥ | "jugupsāvirāmapramādārthānām upasaṅkhyānam" ity apādānatvam | tasmāt pañcamī || ata evāparādhād dhetoḥ | kāntāviraheṇa guruṇā durbhareṇa | dustareṇety arthaḥ || "gurus tu gīṣpatau śreṣṭhe gurau pitari durbhara" iti śabdārṇave || varṣabhogyeṇa saṃvatsarabhogyeṇa || "kālādhvanoratyantasaṃyoge" iti dvitīyā | "atyantasaṃyoge ca" iti samāsaḥ | "kumati ca" iti ṇatvam | bhartuḥ svāminaḥ śāpena | astaṅgamito mahimā sāmarthyaṃ yasya so 'staṅgamitamahimā || astam iti makārāntam avyayam | tasya "dvitīyā-" iti yogavibhāgāt samāsaḥ | kaścid anirdiṣṭanāmā yakṣo devayoniviśeṣaḥ || "vidyādharāpsaroyakṣarakṣogandharvakinnarāḥ | piśāco guhyakaḥ siddho bhūto 'mī devayonayaḥ" ity amaraḥ || janakatanayāyāḥ sītāyāḥ snānaravagāhanaiḥ puṇyāni pavitrāṇy udakāni yeṣu teṣu | pāvaneṣv ity arthaḥ || chāyāpradhānās taravac chāyātaravaḥ || śākapārthivāditvāt samāsaḥ || snigdhāḥ sāndrāś chāyātaravo nameruvṛkṣā yeṣu teṣu | vasatiyogyeṣv ity arthaḥ || "snigdhaṃ tu masṛṇe sāndre" iti, "chāyāvṛkṣo nameruḥ syāt" iti ca śabdārṇave || rāmagireś citrakūṭasyāśrameṣu vasatim || "vahivasyartibhyaś ca" ity auṇādiko 'tipratyayaḥ || cakre kṛtavān || atra raso vipralambhākhyaḥ śṛṅgāraḥ | tatrāpy unmādāvasthā | ata evaikatrānavasthānaṃ sūcitam āśrameṣv iti bahuvacanena || sītāṃ prati rāmasya hanumatsandeśaṃ manasi nidhāya meghasandeśaṃ kaviḥ kṛtavān ity āhuḥ || atra kāvye sarvatra mandākrāntāvṛttam | tad uktam-"mandrākrāntā jaladhiṣaḍagairmbhau natau tādgurū cet" iti ||

root:
evam anviṣya yatnena na dṛṣṭaṃ sāram atra te |
adhunā vada kasmāt tvaṃ kāyam adyāpi rakṣasi || 5.64 ||
commentary:
ahaṃ caināṃ dhārayiṣyāmy ā niryāṇād nirvāṇaṃ yāvat | kiṃbhūto dṛḍhāśayaḥ | ḍṛḍho 'vicala āśayo 'bhiprāyo yasyāsau dṛḍhāśaya iti || anetaitad uktaṃ bhavati | tryadhvavartibhis tathāgatair yā bhāṣitā sā nāmasaṃgītiḥ | ato 'sya dharmaparyāyasyākāśatulyatāṃ saṃdarśayati | tathā coktaṃ |

utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmateti pradarśitaṃ bhavatīti || 

yathā bhavāmy ahaṃ ityādi | he nātha yathā sarvasaṃbuddhaguhyadhṛg bhavāmy ahaṃ tathā prakāśayatv iti pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ | dhṛg ity ayaṃ śuddhapāṭhaḥ ||

root:
ānandarūpaṃ svavid aprakampyaṃ
vedāntinaḥ sādhyam uṣanti śāntam |
saśrāvakāḥ khaḍgajināś ca sādhyam
icchanti rūpādyupadher virāmam || 4 ||
commentary: śivotbhūtvā iti | "śivo bhūtvā śivaṃ yaje" iti yadāmnāyeṣūcyate tatra dehapāta eva śivateti ye manyante teṣāṃ sati dehe śivībhāvābhāvādyajamānatānupapatteḥ svasvarūpaśivasamāveśabhaktiśāly eva yajanaṃ jānātīti tātparyam | anenaivāśayenāha tvameva yataḥ sāram utkṛṣṭaṃ vapuḥ svarūpaṃ advayena bhedaśaṅkāśaṅkuśataśātinā śodhitaṃ nirmalīkṛtaṃ bhaktairiti |

root:
yathaiva karmamudrāyām ānandādivyavasthitiḥ |
tathā samayamudrāyāṃ vajrācāryaprasādataḥ || SeNi 37 ||
commentary: prajñetyādi. prajñājñānād uttarakālaṃ yāḥ prāptā yathāmilitā rāmāḥ striyas tāsāṃ samāpattidvāreṇa ya āsvādaḥ, taṃ turyaṃ sekam. tad apy adhamam. śeṣaṃ gatārtham.

root:
prajñājñānād uttaraṃ prāptarāmā-
svādaṃ turyaṃ sekam āhādhamaṃ tat |
yasmāt sarvo bhāvanādau prayatno
buddhoddiṣṭo niṣphalaḥ saṃprasaktaḥ || 16 ||
commentary: sā rādhā nayananalinaṃ locanakamalaṃ diśi diśi kirati kṣipati | kimbhūtam | sajalakaṇajālam | saha jalakaṇajālena vartata iti sa tathā | nanu punaḥ kimbhūtam | vigalitaṃ nālaṃ yasya sa tathā | nanu pratidiśaṃ rudatī mṛgayatītyarthaḥ | anena kimuktam | bhavato lābhāya kajjalābhāvānnayanakamalasajalakusumairdigdevatāmarcayati | ayamāśayaḥ |

root:
vedāntavādino 'pi—
atīnidriyam avittiś ca jñānaṃ bhāskarasammatam |
vittir ānandamātraṃ ca bhagavadvādisammatam || SeNi 12 ||
commentary: aṣṭāṅgam ity aṣṭaprakāram uktalakṣaṇam eva ||

root:
satsukhatvena tattvaṃ ca vibuddho bodhanād rateḥ |  
dehe sambhavatīty asmād devateti nigadyate || 14 ||
commentary: satsukhatvenety anāsravadhruvottamasukhatvena. bodhanād rater iti tasyaiva niruttarasya sukhasya vedanād yo hi taṃ na vedayate, nidrāṇa evāsau. brahmāditvaṃ yad uddiṣṭaṃ tad iyatā nirdiṣṭam—deha ityādinā. anyad apy āha sa eva devatā dehasambhavād ity arthaḥ. pūrvapade halopaḥ, uttarapade sambhalopaḥ. svārthe talā deva eva devatā. dehasambhavatvena sulabhatvam asya sūcayati.

root:

commentary:
kṛtvetyādi. kṛtvā sākṣān maṇḍalaṃ sātasaṃvalitam, tasya svecchayā nirvṛtir nirodhaḥ.

nanu yadi sākṣāt kṛtvāpi paścāt svecchayā nirodhayitavyam, tadā karuṇāyā anekakālābhyastāyā abhāvaḥ syāt. tasyāś cābhāvāt sattvārthābhāvaḥ syād ity āśaṅkyāha—sattvārthasyāpy asty abhāvo na cetyādi. asmin pakṣe sattvārthābhāvo nāsti, yasmān nirvṛtāc cakrāt karuṇāsaṃvalitāt sattvārthasya prādurbhāvo 'sti.

etenaitad evāha—sātasaṃpūrṇacakraṃ sākṣāt kṛtvā, yāvadiṣṭaṃ kālaṃ vyavasthāpya, paścāt tasya sarvathaiva pradīpavan nirodhaṃ kṛtvā sthātavyam. yadā punaḥ sattvārthābhilāṣo bhavati, tadā niruddhād eva cakrāntaram utpādya sattvārthaḥ kartavyaḥ. cakrāntarotpāde 'pi ciraniruddhād eva cakrād yathābhavyatayā vineyānāṃ yathābhilaṣitaprāptir bhavatīti ṣaṣṭham.

nanu lokaprasiddhibādhāyā abādhakatvāt katham "ālocanaṃ vimardaś cet" ityādinā bādhā darśitā | tad etad api bhavato 'asmadabhiprāyāparijñānaphalam | yato "viramānandaṃ jagac caiva" iti vimardasya jagadrūpatayā prastutabādhanena yathoktasarvāgamavighaṭanāt | ālocanam ityādigrantho 'pi vighaṭata evety ata ālocanam ityādinā bādhā darśitā | ata evāryanāgārjunapādair api caturmudrānvaye—

root:
bhaktānāṃ bhavadadvaitasiddhyai kā nopapattayaḥ |
tadasiddhyai nikṛṣṭānāṃ kāni nāvaraṇāni vā || 1.15 ||
commentary:
ato vaktavyaṃ kā tasya bhāvanā, kiṃ vā tasya dhyānam ity ata āha—pitari ityādi. pitā vajradharo guruś ca. pañcamyarthe saptamī. pituḥ sakāśāt prāptam. laukikasukhena dṛṣṭāntena pitrā yad upadiṣṭaṃ mahāmokṣasukham ity arthaḥ. anupadiṣṭānāṃ devamanuṣyādīnāṃ śrutir api tasya durlabhā, kiṃ punar anubhava iti bhāvaḥ.

tat sukhaṃ bhujyate svayam iti tad eva nirābhāsam anantaṃ niruttaram akṣayāvyayaṃ mahāmokṣasukhaṃ bhujyate. svayam iti sākṣād iva. kutaḥ? bhujyamāne laukikasukhe tad eva yathālakṣaṇam adhimucya, tathādhimokṣād ālambanīkṛte tasmin ālambanāntarasaṃcāraprasāraniṣedhena niścalasūkṣmīkṛtasya cetasas tathaiva nirantaram ādareṇa sābhogam anābhogaṃ ca vahanāt. iyatī yat tasya bhāvanā.

dhyānam ākhyātum āha—maraṇam ityādi. tathaiva ciraṃ bhāvyamānena mahāsukhena yena iti yadavastheneha maraṇaṃ bhavati, tad iti tadavasthaṃ tan mahāsukhadhyānam ucyate bhāvanāpariniṣpatteḥ.

iha maraṇam iti ko 'rthaḥ? iheti tato mahāsukhād anyasmin bahir adhyātmaṃ cālambane maraṇam apratisaṃvedanaṃ bhavati. ekadvaubahūn vā praharān divasān māsān varṣān vā daṃśamaśakādikṛtair api capeṭamuṣṭikaśābhighātair api paṭupaṭahaśaṃkhabherīmahāmeghasvanair api tāvantaṃ kālam apratibodhanād iti.

athavā na yuktā sahajā bhāvanā, dṛṣṭāntasahajasya pratyakṣatvena dārṣṭāntikasahajasya cānubhūtatvena dhyeyatvāyogāt. ata āha—pitarītyādi. pitari prāptaṃ dṛṣṭāntasahajaṃ bhujyate svayam iti sākṣādanubhūyate. maraṇaṃ mokṣaḥ. yena sukheneti dārṣṭāntikasahajena. iha tat sukhaṃ dhyānam iti dṛṣṭāntasukhe tādātmyena bhāvyamānaṃ dārṣṭāntikasukhaṃ dhyeyam ucyate. anubhūyamānetarayoḥ sādharmyasukhena ekarasībhāvagamanād iti bhāvaḥ.
