commentary: sa mādhavaḥ anaṅgabāṇavraṇakhinnamānasaḥ kandarpaśarāghātāvasannahṛdayaḥ kṛtānutāpaḥ | tadekagatacittatvāt | itastataḥ tāṃ rādhām anusṛtya parimṛgya kalindanandinītaṭāntakuñje niṣasāda niṣaṇṇo 'bhavat | kalindanandinī yamunā tasyā staṭaṃ tasyāntaḥparisaraḥ tatra kuñjaṃ tasmin | kaliṃ pāpaṃ dyati khaṇḍayatīti kalindaḥ sūryaḥ tasya nandinī putrī| anaṅgasya kāmasya bāṇāḥ taiḥ vraṇāni kṣatāni tairyuktaṃ khinnaṃ khedasahitaṃ mānasaṃ yasya | punaḥ kimbhūtaḥ | kṛtaḥ anupaścāttāpo yena saḥ |

commentary: evaṃ kathitanayena. sādhūktam iti cet, adhunā vada kasmāt tvam adyāpi sarvaguṇavikalam api kāyaṃ rakṣasi? evaṃ vidvān api.

ratnacchāyāvyatikara iva prekṣyam etat purastād   
valmīkāgrāt prabhavati dhanuṣkhaṇḍam ākhaṇḍalasya |  
yena śyāmaṃ vapur atitarāṃ kāntim āpatsyate te  
barheṇeva sphuritarucinā gopaveśasya viṣṇoḥ ||
commentary: tathatāyāṃ gata iti suviśuddhatathataikarase dharmakāye sthitaḥ. śrīmān iti sarvabuddhadharmeśvaraḥ, na tu śrāvakādiḥ. āgataś ceti tasyā eva tathatāyāḥ sakāśād āgatas tanniṣyandābhyāṃ sambhoganirmāṇakāyābhyāṃ jagadarthakaraṇāya. evaṃ tathatāgataśabdayor ekaśeṣo madhyatakārasya nairukto lopaḥ. evaṃ tāvat sarve tathāgatāḥ. teṣām ādarśajñānādīni pañcakulāni.

root:
mahāvidyottamo nātho mahāmantrottamo guruḥ |
mahāyānanayārūḍho mahāyānanayottamaḥ || 41 ||
commentary:
mahāvidyetyādi | tatra mahāvidyottamo nātha iti candraprabhaḥ | mahatyaś ca tā vidyāś ca mahāvidyāś catasro dhāraṇyo granthārthamantramudrātmikāḥ | tāsām uttamaḥ | ata eva nāthaḥ sarvāpāyebhyaḥ sarvasattvānām aśeṣakāyavāṅmanaḥsamudācārasaṃśodhanāt || mahāmantrottamo gurur iti amitaprabhaḥ | mahāṃś cāsau mantraś ca mahāmantro mahāmudrātmakas tasyottamaḥ śreṣṭha ity arthaḥ | ata eva guruḥ sarvasattvānāṃ yathāśayānuśayajñatayābhisamayopadeśāt | mahāyānanayārūḍha iti gaganagañjaḥ | mahāyānaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ tasya nayo mārgas tasminn ārūḍhaḥ sthita ity arthaḥ ||

mahāyānanayottama iti sarvanivaraṇaviṣkambhī | saṃsāranirvāṇayor anabhilāpyadharmatādhigamān nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ mahāyānam iti | atha vā trividhānuttaryeṇa saṃbhāropāyagocarādhārasvabhāvo mahāyānasya saṃgṛhīta iti | yady evaṃ katham asya mahattvam | sarvalokahitā buddhā bhagavantaḥ | tena te mahāntaḥ | teṣām idaṃ yānaṃ niṣpattaye niryāṇāya vā | tasmāt tatsahitānāṃ yānaṃ mahāyānam | mahatāṃ vā yānaṃ mahāyānam || atha vā saptavidhamahattvāt | ālambanapratipattijñānavīryopāyakauśalyasamudāgamakarmamahattvān mahāyānaṃ | mahac ca tad yānaṃ ceti mahāyānam | anyatra yāne tadabhāvād iti | tad etat saṃsārena trividhaṃ mahāyānam | hetugocarasvabhāvaparidīpanārthaṃ veditavyam iti ||

tad evam upāyamātrāpekṣitayā cāśeṣalaukikalokottarasamādhisvabhāvatvād bhagavato jñānasattvasya tathāgatajñānakāyasya ||

root:
durālokastokastavakanavakāśokalatikāvikāśaḥ kāsāropavanapavano 'pi vyathayati |
api bhrāmyadbhṛṅgīraṇitaramaṇīyā na mukulaprasūtiścūtānāṃ sakhi śikhariṇīyaṃ sukhayati ||
commentary: he daivata iṣṭadeva | he vaidyakṛtya vaidyānāṃ kṛtyaṃ kāryaṃ yasmin sa tathā tasya sambodhanam | athavā | daivataṃ devavaidyayoḥ | tasya saṃbodhanam, he dhanvantare he upendra śrīkṛṣṇa vajrādapi dāruṇo 'si | niṣṭhuro 'si | yato vimuktabādhāṃ rādhāṃ na kuruṣe | kimbhūtām | smarāturām | smareṇa kandarpeṇa āturāṃ pīḍitām | kimbhūtām | tvadaṅgasaṅgāmṛtamātrasādhyām | tava aṅgaṃ śarīraṃ tasya saṅgaḥ sa eva amṛtam | tanmātreṇa sādhyāṃ rakṣaṇīyām | vṛttamapi upendravajrā |

root:
yathā kathañ cid ārabdhā trayīmārgānusāriṇī | 
vāgvṛttiralpasārāpi śraddadhānasya śobhate || 1.8 ||
commentary: katham ity āha—brahmetyādi. yata eva suviśuddhabodharūpatvād asau buddhas tad eva paraṃ brahma. tasmāt sa eva brahmā. nirvṛttita iti mokṣarūpatvād ity arthaḥ. nirvṛtir nirvāṇaṃ mokṣo niḥśreyasaṃ buddha iti paryāyāḥ. viṣaṇād iti tādātmyena praveśāt. kva? paramagambhīre dharmakāye. viśateḥ ktapratyayaḥ ṣatvaṇatve ca. sadā sukalyāṇād iti dhruvakalyāṇatvāt paramakalyāṇatvāc ca. sarvar ityādi. yasmād asau sarveṣām ātmani dharmadhātau vedakatvena sthitaḥ, tasmāt sarvaḥ.

commentary: iyaṃ rādhā māṃ śrīkṛṣṇaṃ vilokya dṛṣṭvā calitā nirgatā | kimbhūtam | vṛtaṃ parivṛtam | kena | vadhūnicayena | gopavadhūnāṃ nicayaḥ samūhastena | mayā na nivāritā atibhayena | kayā | sāparādhatayā | saha aparādhena vartata iti sāparādhastasya bhāvaḥ sāparādhatā tayā | sā rādhikā kupiteva kruddheva gatā yātā | kayā | hatādaratayā | hato vinaṣṭo ādaraḥ satkārastasya bhāvastayā | hari hari śiva śiva khede 'rthe dvau śabdau bhavataḥ |

antataḥ svayamāhārādikriyayā parapreraṇayāparāparadūtapreraṇayā vā, sākṣāt svayam evāmiṣadānādinā vā, yat sattvānāṃ hitasukhahetur na bhavati, tan na kuryāt kārayed vā. na caitad eva kevalam. kiṃcit sattvānām eva saṃsāraduḥkhapatitānāṃ tato niḥsaraṇāya sarvaṃ kuśalamūlam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet.

atha bhagavān āha |
maṇḍalasya bhaven mānaṃ caikahastaṃ dvihastakam |
trihastaṃ vā catuḥpañca pañcamānaṃ na cādhikam || 2.2 ||
commentary: asau sakhī rādhāṃ prati punarāha abravīt | kiṃ kurvatī satī | ārāt samīpe samakṣaṃ sakhīnāmagre pratyakṣaṃ yathā syāttathā murāriṃ śrīkṛṣṇam upadarśayantī | kiṃbhūtam | anekanārīparirambhasaṃbhramam anekāśca tāḥ nāryaśca tāsāṃ parirambhaḥ āśleṣaḥ tatra saṃbhramo yasya sa tathā | punaḥ kimbhūtam | sphuranmanohārivilāsalālasam mano hartuṃ śīlamasya sa tathā | vilāso hāsaḥ tatra lālasaḥ kāmo yasya sa tathā sphuraṃścāsau manohārī vilāsalālasaśca tam anekanārīparirambhasaṃbhramasphuranmanohārivilāsalālasam |

root:
mandaṃ mandaṃ nudati pavanaś cānukūlo yathā tvāṃ  
vāmaś cāyaṃ nadati madhuraṃ cātakas te sagandhaḥ |  
garbhādhānakṣaṇaparicayān nūnam ābaddhamālāḥ  
seviṣyante nayanasubhagaṃ khe bhavantaṃ balākāḥ ||
commentary: nimittāny api te śubhāni dṛśyanta ity āha-mandaṃ mandam iti || anukūlaḥ pavano vāyustvāṃ manda mandam | atimandam ity arthaḥ || atra kathañcid vīpsāyām eva dviruktir nirvāhyā | "prakāre guṇavacanasya" ity etad āśrayaṇe tu karmadhārayavad bhāve subluki mandamandam iti syāt | tad evāha vāmanaḥ-"mandamandam ity atra prakārārthe dvirbhāvaḥ" iti | yathā sadṛśam | bhāviphalānurūpam ity arthaḥ || "yathā | sādṛśyayogyatvavīpsārthānatikrame" iti yādavaḥ || nudati prerayati | ayaṃ sagandhaḥ sagarvaḥ | sambandhīti kecit || "gandho gandhaka āmode leśe sambandhagarvayoḥ" ity ubhayatrāpi viśvaḥ || te tava vāmo vāmabhāgasthaḥ || "vāmas tu vakre ramye syāt savye vāmagate 'pi ca" iti śabdārṇave || cātakaḥ pakṣiviśeṣaś ca madhuraṃ śrāvyaṃ nadati vyāharati || idaṃ nimittadvayaṃ vartate | vartiṣyate cāparaṃ nimittam ity āha—garbheti || garbhaḥ kukṣistho jantuḥ || "garbhopakārake hy agnau sukhe panasakaṇṭake | kukṣau kukṣisthajantau ca" iti yādavaḥ || tasyādhānam utpādanaṃ tad eva kṣaṇa utsavaḥ | sukhahetutvād iti bhāvaḥ || "nirvyāpārasthitau kālaviśeṣotsavayoḥ kṣaṇaḥ" ity amaraḥ || tasmin paricayād abhyāsād dhetoḥ khe vyomni | ābaddhamālāḥ || garbhādhānasukhārthaṃ tvatsamīpe baddhapaṅktaya ity arthaḥ || uktaṃ ca karṇodaye-"garbhaṃ balākā dadhate 'bhrayogān nāke nibaddhāvalayaḥ samantāt" iti || balākā balākāṅganā nayanasubhagaṃ dṛṣṭipriyaṃ bhavantaṃ nūnaṃ satyaṃ seviṣyante || anukūlamārutacātakaśabditabalākādarśanānāṃ śubhasūcakatvaṃ śakunaśāstre dṛṣṭaṃ tadvistarabhayān nālekhi ||

vicitraṃ karmamudraiva dharmamudrā vipākajā |

commentary:
anantaroktam evaikaikamudrāyā ekaikānandatvaṃ sphuṭayati—vicitram ityādi | gatārtham ||

nanu caturmudrānvayānugato 'yaṃ granthaḥ | sa ca yoginītantrānusāreṇa na yogatantrānusāreṇeti cet | tan na | ucyate—

	āryanāgārjunair uktaṃ śrīsamājānusārataḥ |
	pañcabhiś ca kramair yat tac caturmudrāsu kathyate || (1)

	kramayor mantramūrtitvacinnidhyaptī yathākramam |
	te caikamudrayokte 'tra mantramūrtimanaḥsthiteḥ || (3)

	dharmamudrāsukhaṃ yasmāt saṃvṛteḥ satyadarśanam |
	satyasya bhūtakoṭitvaṃ mahāmudrārtha ucyate || (3)

	phalaṃ samayamudrāyā dvayor advayavedanam |
	kramāṇāṃ mīlanaṃ divyaṃ buddhatvaphaladāyakam || (4) 

tathā ca pradīpoddyotanaṣaṭkoṭivyākhyāyām ācāryacandrakīrtipādair uktam—

	utpattikrama ādau syān mantramūrtiprasādhakaḥ |
	cittanidhyaptimātraṃ tu dvitīyaḥ krama ucyate ||

	tṛtīyas tu kramo ramyaḥ saṃvṛteḥ satyadarśanam |
	satyasya saṃvṛteḥ śuddhiś caturthaḥ krama ucyate ||

	pañcamo yuganaddhākhyo yat satyadvayayojanam | 
	sādhanāṅgam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sarvatantrārthasaṅgrahaḥ ||

	eṣāṃ kramāṇāṃ bhedāṃs tu prastāravidhinā bahūn |
	sammīlanaṃ ca teṣāṃ vai yo vetti sa hi tantravit ||

tathā cāryadevapādair api sūtakamelāpake mantratattvamudrātattvātmatattvadharmatattvadevatātattvanāmabhiḥ pañcakramāṇām uddeśaḥ kṛtaḥ | tatra mantratattvam iti hūṃkārādimantrotthitā hevajrādimūrtiḥ | mudrātattvam iti saṅkhyāgaṇanākrameṇa neyārthatayā cittanidyaptimātraṃ nītārthatas tu karmamudrāyām | ātmatattvam iti jagataś ciccitraniḥsvabhāvatā | dharmatattvam iti dharmānutpādaḥ | devatātattvam ity ātmatattvadharmatattvayos tādāmīkaraṇam abhinnateti yāvat | 

	etāni pañca tattvāni gurūṇām upadeśataḥ |
	caturmudrāsu yojyāni pañcakrama iva kramāt ||

nanu—

	kramam utpattikaṃ caiva utpannakramam eva ca ||
	kramadvayaṃ samāśritya vajriṇāṃ dharmadeśanā |

iti tantre pāṭha | tat kathaṃ pañca kramāḥ | ucyate | utpattikrame piṇḍīkramavajrajāpau bāhyotpattigambhīrotpattyaparanāmakau | utpanne ca svādhiṣṭhānābhisambodhiyuganaddhakramā utpannapariniṣpannasvābhāvikakramāparanāmakā iti |

etāsāṃ caturmudrāṇāṃ sadbhāvaḥ svabhāvaś ca sarvarahasyatantrokto vijñeyaḥ | tad uktaṃ tatra—

	mānasikā mahāmudrā samayamudrā tu sarvagā |
	vācasī dharmamudrā tu karmamudrā tu kāyikī ||

commentary: athedānīṃ vajradhātumahāmaṇḍaladvāreṇa bodhicittavajrasya spharaṇādikam ity āha | tad yathā bhagavān ity ādi | bhagavān buddhaḥ saṃbuddha iti gatārthaḥ | akārasaṃbhava iti akārajanitaḥ | bhagavato jñānasattvasya pariśuddhatathāgatajñānakāyasvabhāvatvāt | tasya hṛccandramaṇḍalopari yo 'sāv akāras tasyedānīṃ viśeṣaṇam āha | sarvavarṇāgrya iti | agrebhavo 'gryaḥ sarvavarṇānāṃ sarvākṣarāṇām | agryaḥ śreṣṭhas tanmukhatvāt || mahārtha iti mahāṃś cāsāv arthaś ca mahārthaḥ | mahārthatvaṃ sakalajagaddhitādhānahetutvāt || paramākṣara ity aparaparyāyeṇa na kṣaratīty akṣaraḥ | bhūtakoṭirūpeṇāvicalitatvāt | paramaś cāsāv akṣaraś ceti paramākṣara iti | anena krameṇa jñānasattvādyakṣarayoḥ svarūpābhidhānam uktaṃ ||

commentary: tathā hi sa eva vairocanaḥ, prakāśamātratayā prakhyānāt. sa eva akṣobhyaḥ, nirābhāsatvāt. sa eva amoghaḥ, viśvārthakaraṇāt. sa eva ratnaḥ, sarvabuddhadharmāṇāṃ lābhāt. sa eva ārolikaḥ, teṣām ātmani samyak paricchedāt. evaṃ pañcajñānamayatvāt sa eva sāttvikaḥ, vajrasattva ity arthaḥ. brahmetyādi. sa eva brahmādir ucyate.

na sthāsyatīti bhṛtyāya na vastrādi pradīyate |

commentary: he keśava | dhṛtanaraharirūpa | naraharinṛsiṃhaḥ | dhṛtaṃ narahareḥ rūpaṃ yena sa tathā | tava karakamalavare nakhaṃ tiṣṭhati | kara eva kamalavaraṃ padmaśreṣṭhaṃ tasmin | kiṃbhūtaṃ nakham | adbhutaśṛṅgam | adbhutamāścaryajanakaṃ śṛṅgaṃ agrabhāgo yasya tat | adṛṣṭapūrvamityarthaḥ | punaḥ kiṃbhūtam | dalitahiraṇyakaśiputanubhṛṅgam | hiraṇyakaśipostanuḥ śarīraṃ saiva śyāmatvād bhṛṅgaḥ | dalito vidārito hiraṇyakaśipostanubhṛṅgo yena sa tathā tat |

root:
prajñājñānād uttaraṃ prāptarāmā-
svādaṃ turyaṃ sekam āhādhamaṃ tat |
yasmāt sarvo bhāvanādau prayatno
buddhoddiṣṭo niṣphalaḥ saṃprasaktaḥ || 16 ||
commentary:
kṛtvetyādi. kṛtvā sākṣān maṇḍalaṃ sātasaṃvalitam, tasya svecchayā nirvṛtir nirodhaḥ.

nanu yadi sākṣāt kṛtvāpi paścāt svecchayā nirodhayitavyam, tadā karuṇāyā anekakālābhyastāyā abhāvaḥ syāt. tasyāś cābhāvāt sattvārthābhāvaḥ syād ity āśaṅkyāha—sattvārthasyāpy asty abhāvo na cetyādi. asmin pakṣe sattvārthābhāvo nāsti, yasmān nirvṛtāc cakrāt karuṇāsaṃvalitāt sattvārthasya prādurbhāvo 'sti.

etenaitad evāha—sātasaṃpūrṇacakraṃ sākṣāt kṛtvā, yāvadiṣṭaṃ kālaṃ vyavasthāpya, paścāt tasya sarvathaiva pradīpavan nirodhaṃ kṛtvā sthātavyam. yadā punaḥ sattvārthābhilāṣo bhavati, tadā niruddhād eva cakrāntaram utpādya sattvārthaḥ kartavyaḥ. cakrāntarotpāde 'pi ciraniruddhād eva cakrād yathābhavyatayā vineyānāṃ yathābhilaṣitaprāptir bhavatīti ṣaṣṭham.

root:

agupte kriyate duḥkhaṃ vyāḍacaurāgnibhūcaraiḥ || 3 ||
commentary:
prayatneneti guptau yatnaḥ prayatnaḥ. tam eva āha—yathā bhedo na jāyata iti. bheda udbhedaḥ svayam eva pareṣāṃ yuktibalād abhyūhaḥ. mantrabhedaś ca bhedaḥ. madauddhatyakopādibhiḥ svayaṃ tayā sahāyena vā parasmai kathanaṃ mantrabhedaḥ. 

aguptau narakapātādir adṛṣṭadoṣaḥ prasiddha eva. dṛṣṭadoṣam apy āha—agupta ityādinā. vyāḍādibhiḥ duḥkhaṃ kriyata iti sambandhaḥ. vyāḍāḥ sarpavyāghrādayaḥ. bhūcarāḥ śāsakā narapiśācādayaḥ.

root:
praṇamya nāthaṃ saṃbuddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatam |
kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhūtvā idam āha sthito 'grataḥ || 6 ||
commentary:
kiṃ kṛtvā | praṇamya | kaṃ | nātham iti | anāthānāṃ lokānām anuśāsanāt nāthaḥ svāmī | taṃ || punar api kiṃviśiṣṭam nātham ity āha saṃbuddham iti samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ na śrāvakaṃ pratyekabuddhaṃ vā || bhūyo 'pi nāthaṃ viśinaṣṭi bhagavantam iti bhagasaṃpannatvād bhagavān | caturmārabhaṅgād vā | tathā cāha |

	kleśakarma tathā janma kleśajñeyāvṛtī tathā |
	yena vaipakṣikā bhagnās teneha bhagavān smṛtaḥ || iti ||

anena nairuktena vidhinā kleśādikaṃ bhagnavān iti bhagavān | aiśvaryādiguṇayogād vā | tathā cāha |

	aiśvaryasya samgrasya rūpasya yaśasaḥ śriyaḥ |
	jñānasyātha prayatnasya ṣaṇṇām bhaga iti smṛtiḥ || iti ||

punar api kiṃbhūtaṃ nātham ity āha tathāgataṃ iti | tathatāṃ śūnyatāṃ gataḥ tathāgataḥ | atha vā yathā te tathāgatā gatā gacchanti gamiṣyanti tathā gacchatīti tathāgataḥ | taṃ tathāgataṃ praṇamyeti pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ |

candrakacārumayūraśikhaṇḍakamaṇḍalavalayitakeśam |

commentary: punaḥ kathambhūtam | candra kacārumayūraśikhaṇḍakamaṇḍalavalayitakeśam | candrakāśca candrākārāsteścāravaḥ sundarāḥ te ca mayūraśikhaṇḍakā mayūrapicchāni teṣāṃ maṇḍalaṃ nikaraḥ tena valayitā veṣṭitāḥ keśā yasya sa tathā | punaḥ kimbhūtam | pracurapurandaradhanuranurañjitameduramudirasuveśam | pracuraṃ vistīrṇaṃ ca tat purandaradhanuśca tenānurañjito bhūṣitaḥ sa cāsau meduraḥ snigdhaḥ mudiro nīlameghaśca tasyeva veṣo yasya sa tathā tam | ayaṃ śyāmaḥ pītavasanena śakracāpayuktanīlameghavatpratīyate |

root:
māṃ na jānanti ye mūḍhāḥ sarvapumvapuṣi sthitam |
teṣām ahaṃ hitārthāya pañcākāreṇa saṃsthitaḥ ||1.3||
commentary: hariṇadvayaveṣṭitāṃ kuryāt | tadadhaḥ kramaśīrṣapaṭṭikāṃ dadyāt | toraṇapārśvadvaye tu yathāśobhaṃ vajrāradvayaṃ dadyāt | cihnadvayaṃ koṇacchatraṃ ca | evaṃ yathāśobhaṃ darpaṇacāmarādikaṃ likhet | maṇḍalasya catuḥkoṇebhyo niḥśaṅka nānārūpān kalpavṛkṣān saṃlikhet ||

root:
viśvastavinyastapadaṃ vispaṣṭārthaṃ manoramam |
śrutisaukhyaṃ kṛpāmūlaṃ mṛdumandasvaraṃ vadet || 5.79 ||
commentary:
mahāmudrām uktvā caturānandasvarūpāṃ sarvagāṃ samayamudrām āha—yathaivetyādi | vajrācāryaprasādata iti sadgurūpadeśata ity arthaḥ | tatrāyam upadeśaḥ | mahāmudrātas tatpuruṣakāraphalarūpe saprajñe bhagavati sambhogarūpeṇotthite ā ghṛṣṭer ānandaḥ | maṇeḥ puraḥ paramaḥ | mahārāgād drutāpattau prajñopāyarūpacandrārkasampuṭasaṃlagnamadhyasthordvādhobindudvayarūpeṇa bindudvayarūpatā sahajaḥ | tad uktam—

	āi anta na majjha tahiṃ naü bhava naü nivvāṇa |
	ehu so paramamahāsuha naü para naü appāṇa ||

asya ca neyanītatayā dvividho 'rthaḥ | tatra nītārthaḥ | tasmin tathāvidhe vilakṣaṇe nirvikalpaṃ vedanam | neyārthaś ca | ǟi na prathamo bindur na | anta na antyo na | majjha tahiṃ nirantaratvān madhyābhāve madhyas tatra na | naü bhava na bhavarūpaḥ | upāyārkasaṃlagno bindur bhavaḥ | sa na tattvam | naü nivvāṇa na nirvāṇarūpaḥ prajñācandrasaṃlagnaḥ | kas tarhi | ucyate—ubhaikarasasvabhāva eṣa eva sa paramamahāsukhaḥ | nātra parasyātmano vā vittiḥ | atra ca prāg uktaḥ karmamudrāsahajavyavasthāpita iva vajrasattvādivyapadeśo jñeyaḥ | 

tataḥ pukkasyādicaturdevīgītikācodanānantaraṃ svapnaprabuddhavat sambhogarūpeṇa bhagavadutthāne sattvārthāya śuddhalaukikavikalpāmukhībhāvena yad ālocanaṃ tad viramaḥ | atrāpi "caturthaṃ tat punas tathā" iti caturthatvam | tad iti sahajopalabdham | punar iti sarvākāram | tatheti sahajavad boddhavyam iti kṛtvā | "eka eva suratānandaś catuḥsaṅkhyāvacchinnaḥ" iti vacanāt | yadā sarvam eva sahajarūpaṃ tadā samayamudrā caturānandarūpā | eka eva viramānandaḥ |

nanv atra bindurūpatayā nirākāravedanaṃ sphuṭam eva darśitam | na | tadāpy avācyasukharūpatayā sakalajagadākārasphuraṇe nirākārapratihateḥ |

tarhi bindurūpotpattiḥ kimarthaṃ karmamudropalabdhasukhavad atrāpi bhujamukhādyākāraprajñopāyātmakatāyā eva yuktatvāt | ucyate | sātabindurūpatvena mṛdākārād ghaṭākāravad āśrayaparāvṛttyā sākārakhyātyartham | yad uktam—"bhagavān bindurūpeṇāvasthitaḥ" iti |

athaivaṃ vācyam—

	saṃvṛtaṃ kundasaṅkāśaṃ vivṛtaṃ sukharūpiṇam |

iti | karmamudropalabdhaṃ saṃvṛtam aparamārtham | vivṛtam anāvṛtaṃ nirvāṇam | itthaṃ sukhaṃ bhinnam eva | tad api na | "sukhaṃ hitvā bhaven na saḥ" iti bindusukhayos tādāmyena bhinnasukhābhāvāt | etac ca—

	tasmāt saukhyaṃ na tattvākhyaṃ mahābhūtaṃ yataḥ sukham |

iti vacanāj jñeyam |

athaivaṃ matiḥ | vicitrasya bindurūpāpattyā nirākāratvam eva | tad api na saṅgacchate | nirākārābhiprāyeṇa yadīttham abhidhīyate tadā nirākārabodhasandehakāraṇaṃ bindum apahāya sātamātram eva param abhihitaṃ syāt | kim anena yathoktaprayāsabahulena binduneti | tasmān nirākāraṃ nāsty eva ||

commentary: kiṃ kṛtvā | smitam ityādi | lokānāṃ sattvānām apāyatrayaśodhanaṃ narakatiryakpretasaṃśodhanaṃ smitaṃ darśayitvā vajrapāṇiṃ pratyabhāṣateti saṃbandhaḥ || tathāgatānāṃ dharmadeśanāyās triliṅgāni | tad yathā | smitaṃ vyavalokitaṃ raśmisaṃcodanaṃ ca | kvacid ekaṃ kvacid dve kvacit trīṇi vā yugapad bhavanti | tad yathā śrīmāyājālatantre dvayaṃ paṭhyate | smitaṃ vyavalokitaṃ ca | kvacit trīṇi yathā pañcaviṃśatisāhasryāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ maitreyavyavalokanaṃ smitaṃ mukhena raśmispharaṇaṃ ceti | kvacid ekaṃ yathātraiva nāmasaṃgītau smitaṃ saṃdarśya lokānām iti || tac ca smitaṃ caturvidhaṃ | aṅgapratyaṅgaspharaṇena romakūpaspharaṇena prakṛtiprabhāvispharaṇena jihvendriyaraśmispharaṇena ca | tad atra jihvāprātihāryaṃ | deśanāyāḥ pūrvaliṅgaṃ || trailokyābhāsakaraṇam ityādinā darśayati bhūr bhuvaḥ svar iti trayāṇāṃ lokānām ābhāsakaraṇaṃ prakāśanakaraṇaṃ smitaṃ darśayitvā vajrapāṇiṃ pratyabhāṣateti saṃbandhaḥ || punar api kiṃviśiṣṭaṃ smitam ity āha caturmārāriśāsanam iti | catvāro mārāḥ skandhakleśamṛtyudevaputrāḥ | ta evārayas teṣāṃ śāsanam anuśāsanaṃ nigrahaḥ ||

root:
mahāprāṇo hy anutpādo vāgudāhāravarjitaḥ |
sarvābhilāpahetvagryaḥ sarvavāksuprabhāsvaraḥ || 29 ||
commentary:
padārthas tv adhunā vyākhyāyate || atheti vajradharam adhikṛtyāha tasyādhyeṣakatvena prastutatvāt | āryamāyājālaṣoḍaśasāhasrikamahāyogatantrāntaḥpātisamādhijālapaṭalād bhagavacchākyamunibhāṣitā bhagavato mañjuśrījñānasattvasya paramārthā nāmasaṃgītir yā tasyā adhyeṣaṇārthaṃ bhagavān vajradharo mṛdvindriyasattvānugrahārthaṃ | punar apy athety āha | athaśabda ānantarye | atha vajradharo bhṛkuṭītaraṅgapramukhaiḥ sārdham nāthaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgataṃ praṇamya kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhūtvā agrataḥ sthita idam āheti saṃbandhaḥ || vajraṃ dhārayatīti vajradharaḥ | anena padena gāmbhīryam abhidhīyate | śriyo devatyas tā vidyante yasyāsau śrīmān | anena caudāryaṃ sūcitaṃ | tataś ca kim uktaṃ bhavati | prajñopāyātmako bhagavān vajradhara iti | ata evoktaṃ śrīsaṃvare |

	sarvākāśāvakāśe śrīvajrasattvas tathāgataḥ |

iti | duḥkhena dāmyanta iti durdāntā īśvarādayas teṣāṃ damakaḥ śāsako vajradharavineyakatvāt teṣām īśvarādīnām | utkṛṣṭatvāṭ paro vajradharaḥ | bhūrlokabhuvarlokasvarlokā iti trayo lokāḥ | tān vijetuṃ śīlam asyeti trilokavijayī || atha vā jayakaramadhukarasarvārthasiddhikarās trayo bhrātaras trilokāḥ | tān vijetuṃ śīlam asyeti trilokavijayī | ata eva vīro bhagavān vajradharaḥ arair anabhibhavanīyatvāt || śrītattvasaṃgrahe pañca guhyāni paṭhyante | tathā hi |

	yathā yathā hi vinayaṃ yānti sattvāḥ svabhāvataḥ |
	tathā tathā hi sattvārthaṃ kuryād rāgādibhiḥ śuciḥ ||
	sarvasattvahitārthāya buddhaśāsanahetutaḥ |
	mārayan sarvasattvāṃs tu na sa pāpena lipyate ||
	sarvasattvahitārthāya buddhakāyaprayogataḥ |
	haraṃs tu paravittāni na sa pāpena lipyate ||
	rāgatulyaṃ sukhaṃ nāsti taj jinebhyaḥ samādadat |
	sattvārthāt paradārāṇi sevayan puṇyam āpnuyāt ||
	sarvasattvahitārthāya buddhaśāsanahetutaḥ |
	sarvakarmāṇi kurvaṃs tu bahu puṇyam avāpnuyāt ||

iti ||

teṣāṃ pañcānāṃ guhyānāṃ rājā guhyarāṭ | guhyair vā rājata iti guhyarāṭ || kuliśo vajras tasyeśvaraḥ kuliśeśvaraḥ || bhagavān vajradharo 'grataḥ sthito bhūtvā kṛtāñjalipuṭa idaṃ vakṣyamānam āheti kriyāpadaṃ sarvatra yojanīyam ||

root:
kelikalākutukena ca kācidamuṃ yamunājalakūle |
mañjulavañjulakuñjagataṃ vicakarṣa kareṇa dukūle ||
commentary: he daivata iṣṭadeva | he vaidyakṛtya vaidyānāṃ kṛtyaṃ kāryaṃ yasmin sa tathā tasya sambodhanam | athavā | daivataṃ devavaidyayoḥ | tasya saṃbodhanam, he dhanvantare he upendra śrīkṛṣṇa vajrādapi dāruṇo 'si | niṣṭhuro 'si | yato vimuktabādhāṃ rādhāṃ na kuruṣe | kimbhūtām | smarāturām | smareṇa kandarpeṇa āturāṃ pīḍitām | kimbhūtām | tvadaṅgasaṅgāmṛtamātrasādhyām | tava aṅgaṃ śarīraṃ tasya saṅgaḥ sa eva amṛtam | tanmātreṇa sādhyāṃ rakṣaṇīyām | vṛttamapi upendravajrā |

root:
kṣamyatāmaparaṃ kadāpi tavedṛśaṃ na karomi |
dehi sundari darśanaṃ mama manmathena dunomi ||
commentary:
syād etat—kim anyasminn asann api doṣa ucyate ity atrāha.

carmam ayaṃ puṭam. svamativiśeṣeṇa pṛthak kuru svakāyād apasāraya. asthighaṭitapañjarād yantrāt prajñātmakena śastreṇa māṃsakartanena.

root:
vyādhyākulo naro yadvan na kṣamaḥ sarvakarmasu |
tathābhyāṃ vikalaṃ cittaṃ na kṣamaṃ sarvakarmasu || 5.24 ||
commentary:
tattvajijñāsoḥ kimetābhirityāha—mudretyādi |
pañcakulāni mudreti kathyate | mokṣahetunā mokṣahetutvena | sarvāvaraṇavigamo mokṣaḥ | nanu yadi nāmāsāṃ pañcakulānāṃ mudrātvaṃ mokṣahetutvena pratipādyate kimiyatā tathā pūjanīyatvamāsāṃ sidhyatītyāha—vajreṇetyādi | vajramudraṇīyatvena mudrātvametāsāṃ mokṣahetutayā pratipādyata ityarthaḥ | vajramudrāḥ satyaḥ sarvāvaraṇavimokṣalakṣaṇaṃ mokṣamāvahantīti yāvat |

root:
māṃ na jānanti ye mūḍhāḥ sarvapumvapuṣi sthitam |
teṣām ahaṃ hitārthāya pañcākāreṇa saṃsthitaḥ ||1.3||
commentary: yathāvat tāṃ aham adhigamya sarvasattvānāṃ yathāśayaviśeṣāt prakāśayiṣye || kimartham ity āha | tatra aśeṣakleśā iti kleśopakleśā gṛhyante teṣāṃ nāśāya | aśeṣājñānahānaya iti aśeṣeṣu padārtheṣv ajñānaṃ aśeṣājñānam aśeṣājñānahānis tadarthaṃ prakāśayiṣye ||

root:
prakāśayiṣye sattvānāṃ yathāśayaviśeṣataḥ |
aśeṣakleśanāśāya aśeṣājñānahānaya iti || 15 ||
commentary: evam ākṣipya samādadhāti nirmūletītyantena | ayam arthaḥ prasiddhir hi prajñānam | tac ca jñānadraḍhimā | na ca nirmūlaṃ jñānam ātmānaṃ labhate prāg eva jñānadraḍhimā | tad evaṃ nirmūlāyāḥ prasiddher abhāvāt kutaḥ sā pravṛtteti pramāṇair anviṣyata iti | nanu ca kāryadraḍhimnā mūlaṃ kalpayiṣyate smṛtidraḍhimneva śrutir ata āha pratyakṣādīti | satyam | samūlā prasiddhiḥ pratyakṣādimūlatayā pratyakṣasūtre nivāritā codanā mūlaṃ bhaviṣyaty eveti ||

root:
anābhogaṃ hi yaj jñānaṃ tac cācintyaṃ pracakṣate |
sañcintya yad acintyaṃ vai tad acintyaṃ bhaven na hi || SeNi 30 ||
commentary: aṣṭāṅgam ity aṣṭaprakāram uktalakṣaṇam eva ||

root:
citraṃ tato vipākaḥ syāt tṛtīye tu vilakṣaṇam |
vimardaś ca tato jñeyo haṭhayoganirākṛteḥ || SeNi 2 ||
commentary: sa mādhavaḥ anaṅgabāṇavraṇakhinnamānasaḥ kandarpaśarāghātāvasannahṛdayaḥ kṛtānutāpaḥ | tadekagatacittatvāt | itastataḥ tāṃ rādhām anusṛtya parimṛgya kalindanandinītaṭāntakuñje niṣasāda niṣaṇṇo 'bhavat | kalindanandinī yamunā tasyā staṭaṃ tasyāntaḥparisaraḥ tatra kuñjaṃ tasmin | kaliṃ pāpaṃ dyati khaṇḍayatīti kalindaḥ sūryaḥ tasya nandinī putrī| anaṅgasya kāmasya bāṇāḥ taiḥ vraṇāni kṣatāni tairyuktaṃ khinnaṃ khedasahitaṃ mānasaṃ yasya | punaḥ kimbhūtaḥ | kṛtaḥ anupaścāttāpo yena saḥ |

root:
bhāvayet sthiracittena siddho 'haṃ caṇḍaroṣaṇaḥ |
tato manthānayogena pūrve śvetācalaṃ sṛjet || 4.23 ||
commentary:
dṛṣṭāntoktam arthaṃ prakṛte yojayan nāha.

śatruprabhṛtayo bhāvā mayā vārayitum aśakyāḥ. tadvat medinīcarmacchādanavad apakārakriyāyāḥ. ataḥ svacittam eva śakyaṃ vārayiṣyāmi. anyavāraṇasyāpārthakatvāt, svacittavāraṇād eva tatsiddheḥ. tasmāt sā cittam eva.

root:
sambhrāntabodhā nikhilā hi tīrthyās
tattvasya sādhyasya ca rūpavittau |
tebhyaḥ prakṛṣṭaḥ kila tattvavettā
vedāntavādīti janapravādaḥ || 3 ||
commentary:
tad eva dauṣprajñavikṣepāsamyakpraṇidhivipakṣābhibhūtirahitatvenāha mahādhyānetyādi |

tatrāsyāṃ gāthāyāṃ dhyānaprajñayor vyatyayo draṣṭavyaḥ | tataś cāyam arthaḥ | mahāprajñāśarīradhṛg iti vajradhūpā | mahati prajñā mahāprajñā saiva śarīraṃ tad dhārayatīti mahāprajñāśarīradhṛk || mahādhyānasamādhistha iti vajrapuṣpā | samādhiś cittasyaikāgratālakṣaṇas tasmiṃs tiṣṭhatīti samādhisthaḥ | mahac ca tad dhyānaṃ ca mahādhyānaṃ mahattvaṃ caturdhyānātmakatvāt | teṣu caturṣu dhyāneṣu samādhisthaḥ || praṇidhir iti vajradīpā | praṇidhīyata iti praṇidhiḥ | bodhisattvānāṃ praṇidhānavaśād utpatteḥ || mahopāya iti vajragandhā | mahāṃś cāsāv upāyaś ca mahopāyaḥ | tata evopāyabalenāśeṣānavaśeṣasya sattvadhātor yathāśayābhiprāyaparipūraṇāt || 

ata eva prajñādhyānapraṇidhyupāyapāramitālakṣaṇatayā bāhyapūjācatuṣṭayātmakam iti ||

sāmbhogikamārgaprītihetubhāvena balajñānayor dharmadhātvavatārasvabhāvatvāt tayor eva balajñānayoḥ pravibhāgaḥ | tatra balaṃ śraddhādipañca | jñānaṃ darśanamārge bhāvanāmārge ca | tatra darśanamārge bodhyaṅgeṣu | bhāvanāmārga āryāṣtāṅgeṣu || 

tataś ca śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhirūpatayā dvārapālacatuṣṭayātmakaṃ mahāyānābhisampratyayapravṛttitannairantaryasantuṣṭikāraṇatvāt ||

root: ity ekallavīrākhye śrīcaṇḍamahāroṣaṇatantre tantrāvatāraṇapaṭalaḥ prathamaḥ || 1.20 ||
commentary: pataṃ prabandhaṃ jayadevakaviḥ karoti | kiṃbhūtaṃ prabandham | śrīvāsudevaratikelikathāsametam | śrīḥ lakṣmī rādhārūpiṇī | vasudevasyāpatyaṃ vāsudevaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kaṃsadaityavināśāya ādyaḥ ajanmā mānavāvatāre manujarūpī | ratiśca prītiḥ | keliḥ krīḍā ca anubhūta karma ālaye śrīśca vāsudevaśca tayoḥ ratikelikathāstābhiḥ sametaṃ saṃyuktam | kathaṃbhūto jayadevakaviḥ | padmāvatīcaraṇacāraṇacakravartī | padmāvatī lakṣmīḥ tasyāḥ caraṇau | tayoścāraṇaṃ śuśrūṣārādhanaṃ tatra cakravartī sevakādhirājaḥ | athavā padmāvatī tasya brāhmaṇī tasyāḥ nṛtyakalācakravartī | punaḥ kiṃbhūtaḥ | vāgdevatācaritacitritacitrasadmā | vāk cāsau devatā ceti | tasyāścaritaṃ tena citritaṃ vicitrīkṛtaṃ cittameva sadma gṛhaṃ yasya sa tathā | anena lakṣmī sarasvatyorjayadevo niṣṇātaḥ śṛṅgārī ca sūcitaḥ |

root:
smarāturaṃ daivata vaidyakṛtya tvadaṅgasaṅgāmṛtamātrasādhyam |
vimuktabādhāṃ kuruṣe na rādhāmupendra vajrādapi dāruṇo 'si ||
commentary: teṣāṃ nirāsārtham āha—ratnetyādi | śivasyedaṃ śaivam | vedasyedaṃ vedam ||

root:
ṛju paśyet sadā sattvāṃś cakṣuṣā saṃpibann iva |
etān eva samāśritya buddhatvaṃ me bhaviṣyati || 5.80 ||
commentary:
avakramakuṭilaṃ paramaprītirasabharāvanatena cakṣuṣā tṛṣita iva śītalajala paramāhlādakaraṃ saṃpivanniva sattvān vyavalokayan. na raktena na duṣṭena mugdhena. paramopakārakā hy ete. kutaḥ? yasmād etān sattvān samāsādya durlabhalābhaṃ buddhatvaṃ me bhaviṣyaty utpatsyate. evaṃ ca viharan adyatve 'pi sattvārthasamartho bhavatyeva. yad uktam—

	sarvatrācapalo mandam itasnigdhābhibhāṣaṇāt |
	āvarjayej janaṃ bhavyam ādeyaś cāpi jāyate || (Śikṣāsamuccaya 10)

iti |

etad eva ca bodhisattvasya kṛtyaṃ yad uta sattvāvarjanaṃ nāma. yathā dharmasaṃgītisūtre āryāpriyadarśanena bodhisattvena paridīpitam-

	tathā tathā bhagavan bodhisattvena pratipattavyaṃ yat sahadarśanena sattvāḥ prasīdeyuḥ. tat kasmād dhetoḥ? na bhagavan bodhisattvasyānyat karaṇīyam asty anyatra sattvāvarjanāt. sattvaparipāka eveyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya dharmasaṃgītiḥ.

iti.

evamakriyamāṇe ko doṣa iti cet-

	anādeyaṃ tu taṃ lokaḥ paribhūya jināṅkuram |
	bhasmacchannaṃ yathā vahniṃ pacyeta narakādiṣu || (Śikṣāsamuccaya 11)

iti.

tasmāt sattvārādhanam eva bodhisattvasya karma upakārikṣetram asādhāraṇaṃ puṇyaprasūtihetur iti.

root:
śvasitavapanamanupamapariṇāham |
madanadahanamiva vahati sadāham ||
commentary: sā rādhikā sadāhaṃ yathā bhavati tathā śvasitaṃ pavanaṃ vahati | śvasitameva pavanastam | kamiva | madanadahanamiva | kāmāgnimiva | kimbhūtam | anupamapariṇāhaṃ na vidyate upamā dṛṣṭānto yasya sa tathā anupamaḥ pariṇāho viśālatā yasya sa tathā |

root:
yadātmotkarṣaṇābhāsaṃ parapaṃsanam eva ca |
sādhikṣepaṃ sasaṃrambhaṃ sthātavyaṃ kāṣṭhavat tadā || 5.50 ||
commentary:
ānandarūpam iti sadā sukhamayatvāt. svavid iti jyotīrūpatvena svayaṃ prakāśamānatvāt. aprakampyam ity anityatayā kampayitum aśakyatvāt. śāntam iti kleśopakleśaśūnyatvena parikalpitatvāt. evaṃvidhaṃ sādhyam uṣanti kāmayante.

saha śrāvakair vartante ye khaḍgajināḥ khaḍgaviṣāṇakalpā ekacāriṇo vargacāriṇaś ca pratyekabuddhās te sādhyam icchanti. kīdṛśam? rūpādyupadher virāmaṃ rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānalakṣaṇānām upadhīnāṃ skandhānāṃ virāmaṃ vicchedam, nirodham iti yāvat. etad uktaṃ bhavati—sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhāḥ sopadhiśeṣanirupadhiśeṣabhedena bhinne 'pi nirvāṇe nirupadhiśeṣam eva nirvāṇaṃ sākṣātkartavyatve-na sādhyaṃ pratipannāḥ.

root:
pramādāyatanaṃ madyaṃ na pāsyāmi kadācana | 
nṛtyagītavibhūṣāṃ ca varjayiṣyāmi sotsavām | 
uccaiḥśayyāṃ mahāśayyāṃ vikāle 'pi ca bhojanam || 3.7 ||
commentary: sotsavām iti sānandām | uccaiḥśayyām iti hastordhvocchrayām | mahāśayyām iti dantādibaddhāṃ | vikāla iti madhyāhnāt sūryodayakālaṃ yāvat ||

root:
nacaitāni parityajya pṛthag loke pramāṇatā |
saṃsāramocakādeśca hiṃsā puṇyatvasammatā || 5 ||
na paścāt puṇyamicchanti kecidevaṃ vigānataḥ |
mlecchāryāṇāṃ prasiddhatvaṃ na dharmasyopapadyate || 6 ||
commentary:
kāni punastānyādibhūtāni kulāni yatkulānyaparāṇi bhaviṣyanti | kathaṃ ca tāni kulamityucyanta ityāha—kulānāmityādi |
pañca bhūtāni skandhā vā kulāni tadviśuddhirūpatvādeva buddhānām | tadrūpatvena vajradharasya | teṣāṃ ca tadanantaramaparimitena rūpeṇa | yattveṣāṃ kulamityabhidhīyate tattadrūpeṇa | pañca bhūtāni pṛthivyāptejovāyuvijñānāni | pañca skandhā rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāra |

root:
saṃprajanyaṃ tadāyāti na ca yātyāgataṃ punaḥ |
smṛtir yadā manodvāre rakṣārtham avatiṣṭhate || 5.33 ||
commentary:
saṃprajanyasya utpattisthairyayoḥ smṛtireva kāraṇamiti kathayann āha.

yadā smṛtir manogṛhadvāri kleśataskarasaṃghātānupraveśanivāriṇī dauvārikavadavasthitā bhavati, tadā saṃprajanyam ayatnata evotpadyate. utpannaṃ ca sat sthirībhavati.

root:
jñānajñeyāsamārope manyanā tatra nānyathā |
sarvaṃ tathā yathā pūrvaṃ yathā buddhis tathā na hi || SeNi 33 ||
commentary:
smitaṃ saṃdarśyeti trilokam āpūrayantyā vajrapāṇiṃ girā vācā pratyabhāṣata | kiṃbhūtayā | madhurayā | mādhuryaṃ śrutisukhatvāt brāhmyeti brahmasvaropetatvāt | brahmasvara iti brahmaśabdo mahato mahāguṇasyādhivacanaṃ yathoktaṃ |

	brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasūyate 'nekasāhasraparṣadi ||

iti || sāhasraśabdena trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur avagantavyaḥ | anekasāhasramayyāṃ parṣadīty arthaḥ || yathā coktaṃ |

	lokadhātuṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ śabdena spharatīti |
	yathābhyantarāḥ śṛṇvanti tathā bāhyā api ||

iti | tatrābhyāntarā ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre sthitāḥ | bāhyā iti ye lokadhātvantaritāḥ | tena mahattvād brahma | tasya svaro brahmasvaraḥ ||

atha vā brahmā bhagavān śākyamuniḥ | tasya brahmaṇa iyaṃ brāhmī vāk | tayā brāhmyā ekayaiva girā trilokam āpūrayantyā vyāpnuvantyā vajrapāṇiṃ pratyabhāṣata | tathā coktaṃ |

	ekāpi vāṇi bhavasūdanasya nānābhidhānaiḥ pratideśabhinnaiḥ |
	yathā tathā sarvajanaprabodhahetur bhavaty askhalitā vibhaktā ||

iti ||

root:
īrṣyāvajrīṃ sṛjet paścāt sa prajñodgatim āvahet |
codayanti tato devyaḥ svakaṇṭhoditagītibhiḥ || 4.26 ||
commentary: codayantīti sambodhayanti ||

root:
karasphoṭo bhaven mudrā aṅgulyāmoṭanaṃ tathā |  
tad dhyeyaṃ cintitaṃ yac ca dhyānaṃ yasmād vicintanam || 20 ||
commentary:
ito 'pi cittam eva rakṣaṇīyam ity āha.

aparikarmitā mattavaravāraṇā na janayanti tāṃ pīḍām iha loke. paraloke avīcyādau yāṃ karoti svacchandatayāvasthitaṃ cittam eva mataṅgaja eva, tathāgatājñāṅkuśena kathaṃcid vaśīkriyamāṇatvāt.

root:
na khāditavyam aśuci tvayā peyaṃ na śoṇitam |
nāntrāṇi cūṣitavyāni kiṃ kāyena kariṣyasi || 5.65 ||
commentary:
anantaroktam evaikaikamudrāyā ekaikānandatvaṃ sphuṭayati—vicitram ityādi | gatārtham ||

nanu caturmudrānvayānugato 'yaṃ granthaḥ | sa ca yoginītantrānusāreṇa na yogatantrānusāreṇeti cet | tan na | ucyate—

	āryanāgārjunair uktaṃ śrīsamājānusārataḥ |
	pañcabhiś ca kramair yat tac caturmudrāsu kathyate || (1)

	kramayor mantramūrtitvacinnidhyaptī yathākramam |
	te caikamudrayokte 'tra mantramūrtimanaḥsthiteḥ || (3)

	dharmamudrāsukhaṃ yasmāt saṃvṛteḥ satyadarśanam |
	satyasya bhūtakoṭitvaṃ mahāmudrārtha ucyate || (3)

	phalaṃ samayamudrāyā dvayor advayavedanam |
	kramāṇāṃ mīlanaṃ divyaṃ buddhatvaphaladāyakam || (4) 

tathā ca pradīpoddyotanaṣaṭkoṭivyākhyāyām ācāryacandrakīrtipādair uktam—

	utpattikrama ādau syān mantramūrtiprasādhakaḥ |
	cittanidhyaptimātraṃ tu dvitīyaḥ krama ucyate ||

	tṛtīyas tu kramo ramyaḥ saṃvṛteḥ satyadarśanam |
	satyasya saṃvṛteḥ śuddhiś caturthaḥ krama ucyate ||

	pañcamo yuganaddhākhyo yat satyadvayayojanam | 
	sādhanāṅgam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sarvatantrārthasaṅgrahaḥ ||

	eṣāṃ kramāṇāṃ bhedāṃs tu prastāravidhinā bahūn |
	sammīlanaṃ ca teṣāṃ vai yo vetti sa hi tantravit ||

tathā cāryadevapādair api sūtakamelāpake mantratattvamudrātattvātmatattvadharmatattvadevatātattvanāmabhiḥ pañcakramāṇām uddeśaḥ kṛtaḥ | tatra mantratattvam iti hūṃkārādimantrotthitā hevajrādimūrtiḥ | mudrātattvam iti saṅkhyāgaṇanākrameṇa neyārthatayā cittanidyaptimātraṃ nītārthatas tu karmamudrāyām | ātmatattvam iti jagataś ciccitraniḥsvabhāvatā | dharmatattvam iti dharmānutpādaḥ | devatātattvam ity ātmatattvadharmatattvayos tādāmīkaraṇam abhinnateti yāvat | 

	etāni pañca tattvāni gurūṇām upadeśataḥ |
	caturmudrāsu yojyāni pañcakrama iva kramāt ||

nanu—

	kramam utpattikaṃ caiva utpannakramam eva ca ||
	kramadvayaṃ samāśritya vajriṇāṃ dharmadeśanā |

iti tantre pāṭha | tat kathaṃ pañca kramāḥ | ucyate | utpattikrame piṇḍīkramavajrajāpau bāhyotpattigambhīrotpattyaparanāmakau | utpanne ca svādhiṣṭhānābhisambodhiyuganaddhakramā utpannapariniṣpannasvābhāvikakramāparanāmakā iti |

etāsāṃ caturmudrāṇāṃ sadbhāvaḥ svabhāvaś ca sarvarahasyatantrokto vijñeyaḥ | tad uktaṃ tatra—

	mānasikā mahāmudrā samayamudrā tu sarvagā |
	vācasī dharmamudrā tu karmamudrā tu kāyikī ||

root:
parasparaviruddhābhir bālecchābhir akheditam |
kleśotpādād idaṃ hy etad eṣām iti dayānvitam || 5.56 ||
commentary:
ānandarūpam iti sadā sukhamayatvāt. svavid iti jyotīrūpatvena svayaṃ prakāśamānatvāt. aprakampyam ity anityatayā kampayitum aśakyatvāt. śāntam iti kleśopakleśaśūnyatvena parikalpitatvāt. evaṃvidhaṃ sādhyam uṣanti kāmayante.

śikṣāḥ sūtreṣu dṛśyante tasmāt sūtrāṇi vācayet |
ākāśagarbhe sūtre ca mūlāpattīr nirūpayet || 5.104 ||
commentary:
etad eva darśayati.

śikṣā bodhisattvānāṃ heyopādeyalakṣaṇāḥ. sūtreṣu mahāyānasūtrānteṣu ratnameghādiṣu. yata evaṃ tasmāt. idaṃ tu viśeṣanirdeśam āha. āryākāśagarbhasūtre kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya pañca mūlāpattayo nirdiṣṭāḥ—

	tathā sāmānyena ekā mūlāpattiḥ. tathādikarmikasya bodhisattvasya aṣṭau mūlāpattayaḥ.

iti. tathā ca tatroktam—

	pañca kulaputra kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya mūlāpattayaḥ yābhirmūlāpattibhiḥ kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ sarvāṇi pūrvāvaropitāni kuśalamūlāni jhoṣayati. vastupatitaḥ parājitaḥ sarvadevamanuṣyasukhebhyaḥ apāyagāmī bhavati. katamāḥ pañca? yaḥ kulaputra kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ staupikaṃ vastu apaharati sāṃghikaṃ vā cāturdiśasaṃghe niryātitaṃ vā, svayaṃ vā apaharati hārayati vā. iyaṃ prathamā mūlāpattiḥ. evaṃ triyānabhāṣitadharmapratikṣepāt dvitīyā. pravrajitasya śīlavato duḥśīlasya vā kāṣāyāpaharaṇāt, gṛhasthakaraṇāt, kāyaprahārāt, cārake prakṣepāt, jīvitaviyojanādvā tṛtīyā. pañcānantaryeṣvanyatamakaraṇāccaturthī. mithyādṛṣṭeḥ, daśākuśalakarmapathasamādānāt, parasamādāpanādvā pañcami.

iti. tathā grāmabhedādikaraṇāt sarveṣāṃ sādhāraṇī caikā. tatraivoktam—

	ādikarmikāṇāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca aṣṭau mūlāpattayaḥ, yābhir mūlāpattibhiḥ skhalitā ādikarmikā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ sarvāṇi pūrvāropitānītyādi pūrvavat. katamā aṣṭau? ye sattvāḥ pūrvaduścaritahetunā asmin kliṣṭe pañcakaṣāye loke utpannāḥ, te itvarakuśalamūlāḥ. yāvat, teṣām idaṃ paramaṃ gambhīraṃ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktaṃ sūtrāntaṃ yāvad vistareṇāgrataḥ smārayanti prakāśayanti. te hi akṛtaśramā bālapṛthagjanāḥ śṛṇvanta utrasyanti, yāvad vivartayanti anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheścittam, śrāvakayāne cittaṃ praṇidadhati. eṣā ādikarmikasya bodhisattvasya mūlāpattiḥ prathamā, yayā mūlāpattyā ityādi pūrvavat. tasmād bodhisattvena parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānām āśayānuśayaṃ prathamaṃ jñātvā yathāśayānāṃ sattvānām anupūrveṇa dharmadeśanā kartavyeti. sopāyāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhervinivartya hīnayāne parasya cittamutpādayato dvitīyā. prātimokṣaśikṣāsaṃvaraṃ vihāya mahāyāne cittotpādamātreṇa tatpaṭhanena cāsya śuddhiprakāśanāt tṛtīyā. śrāvakādiyānasya tatphalasya gopananindāprakāśanāt, mahāyāne sarvaśuddhiprakāśanāt, pareṣāṃ tadvacanakaraṇāccaturthī. kīrtilābhādihetoḥ mahāyānapaṭhanādinā, tathā tatpratyayāt pareṣāṃ kutsānindādibhāṣaṇāt, ātmotkarṣaṇāt, uttaramanuṣyadharmopagamāt pañcamī. pāṭhamātreṇa gambhīradharmādhigamaprakāśanāt, pareṣāṃ tathaiva samādāpanāt ṣaṣṭhī. kṣatriyasya purohitāmātyacaṇḍālairye bhikṣavo daṇḍitā arthadaṇḍena sāṃghikaṃ staupikaṃ vā cāturdiśasāṃghikaṃ vā dravyamapahṛtya tebhya evopanāmayanti. te ca kṣatriyā ubhaye 'pi mūlāpattim āpadyante. iyaṃ saptamī. dharmādharmavivādanāpūrvaṃ śikṣāpraṇayanāt, tanmūlācāravipannānāṃ satkārāt, prahāṇikānāmupabhogaparibhogāṇyanyatra pariṇāmanāt ubhaye 'pi mūlāpattim āpadyante. iyamaṣṭamī.

commentary: śrījayadevabhaṇitamidaṃ vitanotu vistārayatu | kim | śrotṝṇāṃ sukham | idamiti kim | atiśayamadhuripunidhuvanaśīlam | vyavāyo grāmyadharmaḥ syānmaithunaṃ nidhuvanaṃ rataṃ ityamaraḥ | nidhuvane śīlaṃ svabhāvaḥ | atiśayena madhuripoḥ kṛṣṇasya nidhuvanaśīlam | kimbhūtam | salīlam saha līlayā vartata iti | punaḥ kimbhūtam | utkaṇṭhitagopavadhūkathitam | utkaṇṭhā āsaktiviśeṣaḥ | sā jātā yasyāṃ sā gopavadhū rādhā tayā kathitam |

root:

commentary:
ajñānapaṅkamagnānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ hitāya ca | tatrājñānam avidyā saivāsaṅgasthānatvād duruttaratvāc ca paṅka iva paṅkaḥ | tasmin magnā ye satvās teṣām hitāya || punar api kiṃviśiṣṭās te sattvā ity āha kleśavyākulacetasaḥ | kleśā ṣaṭ | tathā cāhābhidharme |

	mānadṛgvicikitsāś ca rāgapratighamūḍhayaḥ |

iti || taiḥ kleśair vyākulāni cetāṃsi yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ te kleśavyākulacetasaḥ | atas teṣām || anuttaraphalaprāptaye bhagavān prakāśayatv iti tadarthaṃ tatprāptaya iti ||

root:
ratnaṃ caṇḍālinī jñeyā pañcamudrā viniścitā |  
tathāgatānāṃ kulaṃ caitat saṃkṣepeṇābhidhīyate || 7 ||
commentary: kulaṃ caitad iti vajrapadmādikam.

root:
tathā ca devīparipṛcchāśivanirnādatantra— 
ratnapuram idaṃ devi kiñjalke jalatāṃ vrajet |
rudro yugme śivaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ śaktiḥ saiva parātparā || Seni 7 ||
commentary: nanu śaivādīnāṃ kim etad asti | ata āha—ratnapuram ityādi | ratnaṃ maṇiḥ | tad eva puraṃ sthānaṃ yasya sukharūpābhimatasya tad ratnapuram | kiñjalke patitam | jalatāṃ niḥsāratām | rudro bhagavān | yugme samāpattau | śivaḥ kalyāṇāvāhakaḥ | ata eva śreṣṭhaḥ | saiva tattvaṃ śaktiś cidrūpā | parāc chreṣṭhāt parā śreṣṭhā tad eva ||

root:
māyājālamahātantre yā cāsmin saṃpragīyate |
mahāvajradharair hṛṣṭair ameyair mantradhāribhiḥ || 13 ||
commentary:
tad eva lakṣaṇavyañjanātmani rūpakāye 'nabhisaṃskārāl lakṣaṇaśūnyatā || balavaiśāradyādisvabhāvadharmakāyānabhisaṃskārāt sarvadharmaśūnyatā || pudgaladharmāsamāropaṇād abhāvaśūnyatā || yathoktaśūnyatālakṣaṇāpavādānabhisaṃskaraṇāc ca abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā | ataś cāha mahāmāyetyādi |

tatra mahāmāyādharo vidvān iti vajraviśvaḥ | māyeti sarvatathāgatavicitravipulodārapūjānirmāṇaṃ tad dhārayatīti māyādharaḥ | mahāṃś cāsau māyādharaś ceti mahāmāyādharaḥ | ata eva vidvān paṇḍitas tena pūjākarmaṇā puṇyasaṃbhāropārjanāt || mahāmāyārthasādhaka iti vajrarakṣaḥ | māyārtheti nirmāṇārthaḥ | tena kusīdasattvāni sādhayati protsāhayatīti māyārthasādhakaḥ | mahāṃś cāsau mayārthasādhakaś ceti mahāmāyārthasādhakaḥ | mahāmāyāratirata iti vajrayakṣaḥ | māyāyāṃ ratir māyāratiḥ | tathāgatapūjānirmāṇaratir ity arthaḥ | māyāratau rataḥ sakto māyāratirataḥ | mahāṃś cāsau māyāratirataś ca mahāmāyāratirataḥ || mahāmāyendrajālika iti vajramuṣṭiḥ | māyendrajālaṃ nirmāṇasamūhaṃ kāyavākcittavajrāṇām ekībhāvaḥ | tad vettīti māyendrajālikaḥ | mahāṃś cāsau māyendrajālikaś ca mahāmāyendrajālikaḥ || vṛddhyabhāvo 'tra draṣṭavyaḥ saddharmapāṭhāt || 

tataś ca kṛtyānuṣṭhānajñānāśrayavajrakarmādicatuṣṭayātmakaṃ cakṣurādivijñānaparāvṛttyātmani kṛtyānuṣṭhānajñāne sati | uktaviparyāsāpahrāsamukhena samastasugatapūjābhisaṃrakṣaṇavighnopaśamakāyādiśūnyatājñānakāraṇatvāt | ata eva caiṣāṃ vajraviśvādīnāṃ krama iti ||

root:
kimarthaṃ niyamenaitad deśakair atha deśyate |
idaṃ tathāgatāśvāsadhiyā pūrvaṃ prakāsyate || SeNi 20 ||
commentary: yady evaṃ kimarthaṃ tarhīdaṃ deśyate | ata āha—kimartham ityādi | tathāgatasyāśvāsas tathāgatāśvāsaḥ | tathāgataś ca vairocanaḥ | tasyopalakṣaṇārthatvena ratnasambhavādigrahaṇād ratnasambhavāmitābhāmoghasiddhayo gṛhyante | teśām āśvāso 'kṣobhyamudritānāṃ vijñānīkaraṇam | taddhiyā tadbuddhyā ||

root:
bhago 'syāstīti buddhasya bhagavānn iti kathyate |  
bhagāni ṣaḍvidhāny āhur aiśvaryādiguṇākhilāḥ |  
athavā kleśādimārāṇāṃ bhañjanād bhagavānn iti || 15 ||
commentary: śrīkṛṣṇābhiprāyaṃ uttarīyagītārthaṃ ślokābhyāṃ prakaṭayati kaṃsārirapītyādi | kaṃsāriḥ śrīkṛṣṇo 'pi saṃsāravāsanābandhaśṛṅkhalāṃ rādhāṃ hṛdaye ādhāya saṃcintya vrajasundarīḥ aparagopīstatyāja jahau | saṃsārasya vāsanā jagataḥ sthititatparatā vigatarūpā pūrvajanmakṛtasukṛtasaṃskārātiśayaprāptasarvasundarījanādhikasubhagatā | tayā baddhā viṣayāsaktirūpaśṛṅkhalā śṛṅkhalāsthānaṃ yā dṛḍhahetustām |

pañcapradīpāmṛtabinducandra-
bhrūmadhyabindūdbhavamaṇḍalāni |
vāyoḥ svarūpaṃ galaśuṇḍikādyam
atattvarūpaṃ svayam ūhanīyam || 18 ||
commentary:
etad eva darśayati.

raktaṃ dviṣṭaṃ vā svacittaṃ yadā paśyet, tadā hastapādādicalanamātram api na kartavyam, nāpi vacanodīraṇam. anyathā tadutthāpite kāyavāgvijñapty api saṃkliṣṭe syātām. ato bahirindriyavyāpāravikalpāv upasaṃhṛtya sthātavyaṃ kāṣṭhavat tadā. sarvavyāpāravirahān nirvyāpārāḥ sarvadharmā iti manasi nidhāya.

root:
pakṣaṃ cāpi tathā vedīhārārdhahārapaṭṭikām |
mūlasūtrabahis tasyās tu ardhenaiva rajobhuvam || 2.5 ||
commentary: hārārdhahārapaṭṭikāyāḥ | rajobhuvam iti | maṇḍalapradhānarekhātaḥ pañcarekhābhuvaṃ | hārārdhahārapaṭṭikānantaraṃ ca māṇikyapaṭṭikādibhuvaṃ | vedikāhārārdhahārapaṭṭikāyās tu madhyaṃ yathāśobhaṃ kuryāt ||

gṛdhrair āmiṣasaṃgṛddhaiḥ kṛṣyamāṇa itas tataḥ |
na karoty anyathā kāyaḥ kasmād atra pratikriyām || 5.59 ||
commentary:
punas tad ekāntam avadhārayituṃ kāyapratyavekṣām āha.

kāyasya sarvathā kvacid api vyāpāro nāsti, svātmany api sāmarthyābhāvāt. anyathā cittarahito mṛtasya kāyaḥ. gṛdhrādibhir vipralujyamāna itastataḥ pratikāram ātmarakṣaṇārthaṃ kim iti na karotīti pṛcchati sarvasāmarthyavikalatvāt. ata eva cittaparikarmaiva sādhyam. tasmin parikarmite kāyasyāyatnata eva parikarmasiddheḥ, tatparatantratvāt tasyety uktaṃ bhavati.

root:
hṛdi biśalatāhāro nāyaṃ bhujaṅgamanāyakaḥ kuvalayadalaśreṇī kaṇṭhe na sā garaladyutiḥ |
malayajarajo nedaṃ bhasma priyārahite mayi prahara na harabhrāntyānaṅga krudhā kimu dhāvasi ||
commentary: channeti || he megha, pariṇataiḥ paripakvaiḥ phalair dyotanta iti tathoktaiḥ | āṣāḍhe vanacūtāḥ phalanti pacyanteḥ ca meghavātenety āśayaḥ | kānanāmrair vanacūtaiś channopānta āvṛtapārśve 'cala āmrakūṭādriḥ snigdhaveṇīsavarṇe masṛṇakeśabandhacchāye | śyāmavarṇaṃ ity arthaḥ || "veṇī tu keśabandhe jalasrutau" iti yādavaḥ | tvayi śikharaṃ śṛṅgam ārūḍhe sati || "yasya ca bhāvena bhāvalakṣaṇam" iti saptamī || madhye śyāmaḥ śeṣe madhyād anyatra vistāre paritaḥ pāṇḍur hariṇaḥ || "hariṇaḥ pāṇḍuraḥ pāṇḍuḥ" ity amaraḥ || bhuvaḥ stana iva | amaramithunānām | khecarāṇām iti bhāvaḥ | prekṣaṇīyāṃ darśanīyām avasthāṃ nūnaṃ yāsyati | mithunagrahaṇaṃ kāminām eva stanatvenotprekṣā sambhavatīti kṛtam | yathā pariśrāntaḥ kaścit kāmī kāminīnāṃ kucakalaśe viśrāntaḥ sansvapiti tadvad bhavān api bhuvo nāyikāyāḥ stana iti dhvaniḥ ||

a ā i ī u ū e ai o au aṃ aḥ sthito hṛdi |
jñānamūrtir ahaṃ buddho buddhānāṃ tryadhvavartinām || 26 ||
commentary: ullālayadbhir ity ūrdhvam utkṣipadbhiḥ | kaiḥ | svakaraiḥ || prasphuradvajrakoṭibhir iti prasphurantyo vajrāṇāṃ koṭayo 'grabhāgā yeṣāṃ te prasphuradvajrakoṭayaḥ | taiḥ || kimātmakāḥ | prajñopāyamahākaruṇayā jagatām arthaṃ kartuṃ śīlaṃ yeṣāṃ te prajñopāyamahākaruṇājagadarthakarāḥ | tatra sarvadharmāṇāṃ pravicayaḥ prajñā | upāyo 'bhilāṣo 'śeṣalaukikalokottaras samādbhipradarśanamukhena yathābhavyatayā sakalasattvārthakaraṇe | kam ruṇaddhīti karuṇā | kam iti sukhasyākhyā | kāruṇiko hi paraduḥkhaduḥkhī san ātmanaḥ sukham āvṛṇotīti karuṇā | mahatī cāsau karuṇā ca mahākaruṇā | anālambanātmikā || jagac ca jagac ca jagac ca jagaganti traidhātukāni | teṣām arthaḥ prayojanaṃ | ata āha prajñopāyamahākaruṇājagadarthakarair iti | ata eva te krodhāḥ parā utkṛṣṭās te ata āha parair iti ||

root:
atha maṇḍalādhiṣṭhānamantraṃ bhavati |
oṃ śrīcaṇḍamahāroṣaṇa sarvaparivārasahita āgaccha āgaccha jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ atra maṇḍale adhiṣṭhānaṃ kuru hūṃ phaṭ svāhā ||
anenākṛṣya praveśya baddhvā vaśīkṛtya pūjayet || 2.19 ||
commentary: maṇḍalādhiṣṭhānam iti jhaṭity ātmānaṃ bhagavadrūpeṇālambhya svahṛdaye viśvapadmacandrahūṃsūryoparihūṃkāraṃ dhyātvā tannirgataraśmibhir anādisaṃsiddhaṃ maṇḍalacakram akaniṣṭhabhuvanasthitaṃ jaḥkārapāṭhenākṛṣya purato dṛṣṭvā cetonirmitāsanaṃ ca dhyātvā huṃkārapāṭhena tatropaveśayet | tato vaṃkārapāṭhena tatraivābhiniveśena sthitaṃ cintayet | tato hoḥkārapāṭhena siddhidānonmukhaṃ parituṣṭaṃ cintayet | tato manonirmitānekapūjābhiḥ saṃpūjyaḥ | oṃ śrīcaṇḍetyādimantraṃ vāraṃ trayaṃ paṭhet | tatas tasmād ākṛṣtaṃ nirmitamaṇḍale praviṣṭam ekarūpatayā tadrūpeṇeva baddham atīvaparituṣṭaṃ dhyātvā pūjayed ity āmnāyaḥ ||

commentary:
idānīṃ vedāntavādino vakṣyamāṇāmnāyakramāgatasya kadācid evaṃ varṇanaṃ syāt | atas tatpratipattyā sukhena tattyāgārthaṃ pūrvārdham āha—atīndriyam ityādi |

ity ukte śeṣaṃ subodham ||

commentary:
pūrvam eva ciraṃ svīkṛta iti ced āha.

he mūḍha, mohavijṛmbhitam etad bhavataḥ. śuciṃ pavitram. ayaṃ ca aśuciḥ. idam evāha— amedhyeti. pūtikaṃ śatanadharmakam.

commentary:
dṛṣṭāntoktam arthaṃ prakṛte yojayan nāha.

śatruprabhṛtayo bhāvā mayā vārayitum aśakyāḥ. tadvat medinīcarmacchādanavad apakārakriyāyāḥ. ataḥ svacittam eva śakyaṃ vārayiṣyāmi. anyavāraṇasyāpārthakatvāt, svacittavāraṇād eva tatsiddheḥ. tasmāt sā cittam eva.

commentary:
asamādhānasya ca rakṣaṇām āha.

kāle kāle bhavati bhavato yasya saṃyogam etya  
snehavyaktiś ciravirahajaṃ muñcato bāṣpam uṣṇam ||
commentary: mukhaṃ pūritaṃ kṛtvā mahatkavalagrahaṇāt. saśabdaṃ sukasunikādiśabdena. prasṛtānanaṃ dūraṃ vidāritamukham. pralambapādaṃ bhūmyādyalagnapādaṃ khaṭvādyārohaṇe sati nāsīta. dvāv api bāhū samamekasmin kāle na mardayet. kramamardane na doṣaḥ. sati pratyaye.

commentary: prakāśayatu bhagavān ity āha | saṃbuddha iti śāśvatadvāreṇa || jagadanuśāsanāc chāstety akṣobhyadvāreṇa || jagatāṃ gurur jagadgurur iti ratnasaṃbhavadvāreṇa || samayo bhagavān śrīvajrasattvaḥ | mahāś cāsau samayaś ca mahāsamayaḥ | tasya tattvaṃ mahāsamayatattvaṃ | taj jānātīti mahāsamayatattvajña iti | amitābhadvāreṇa || indriyāṇi mṛdumadhyādhimātrāṇi | teṣām āśayo 'bhiprāyaḥ | taṃ vettīti indriyāśayavid ity amoghasiddhidvāreṇa || evaṃ pañcatathāgatāmako bhagavān para utkṛṣṭaḥ prakāśayatv ity arthaḥ ||

munijanamānasahaṃsa jaya jaya deva hare ||
commentary: kiṃbhūta | he dinamaṇimaṇḍalamaṇḍana | dinasyāhno maṇiḥ sūryaḥ tasya maṇḍalaṃ tad maṇḍayatīti tasya saṃbodhane | punaḥ kiṃbhūta | he bhavakhaṇḍana | ātmabhaktānāṃ sevakānāṃ bhavo janma khaṇḍayatīti tasya saṃbodhane | muktiṃ dadātītyarthaḥ | punaḥ kiṃbhūta | hai munijanamānasahaṃsa | munayaśca te janāśca teṣāṃ mānasāni tatra haṃsaḥ tasya saṃbodhane | svacchatayā śuddhabhāvena hṛdayasya mānasasarovarasya śabdacchalena tulyatā | jaya jaya deva hare pratipad‌ayojaneyamityarthaḥ |

commentary: praṇidhānaṃ saṃsārikasukhasaṃgam | bodhicittaṃ pāralaukikasukhāya cittaniyojanam | buddho bhaveyaṃ jagato hitāyeti kṛtvā namaskāram iti trividhaṃ kāyikaṃ vācanikaṃ mānasikaṃ ceti | tadraśmibhir iti svahṛdayasthitahūṃkāradīptibhiḥ ||

commentary: he keśava | dhṛtanaraharirūpa | naraharinṛsiṃhaḥ | dhṛtaṃ narahareḥ rūpaṃ yena sa tathā | tava karakamalavare nakhaṃ tiṣṭhati | kara eva kamalavaraṃ padmaśreṣṭhaṃ tasmin | kiṃbhūtaṃ nakham | adbhutaśṛṅgam | adbhutamāścaryajanakaṃ śṛṅgaṃ agrabhāgo yasya tat | adṛṣṭapūrvamityarthaḥ | punaḥ kiṃbhūtam | dalitahiraṇyakaśiputanubhṛṅgam | hiraṇyakaśipostanuḥ śarīraṃ saiva śyāmatvād bhṛṅgaḥ | dalito vidārito hiraṇyakaśipostanubhṛṅgo yena sa tathā tat |

commentary:
aparam āha.

uddhatam iti saddharmādiśravaṇapramādād api uddhatam, vikṣepabahulam ity arthaḥ. sopahāsaṃ vāgviheṭhanārambhakaṃ tayā yuktaṃ vā. mānaś cittasyonnatiḥ. madaḥ svadharme cittasyābhiniveśaḥ. tābhyām anvitaṃ tatsaṃprayuktam. utprāsaḥ kāyikī viheṭhanā. tena sahotkaṭam. vakraṃ kuṭilaṃ śaṭhaṃ vā. vañcakaṃ pratārakaṃ māyāvi vā. yadi mano bhavet, sthātavyaṃ kāṣṭhavat tadeti saṃbandhaḥ.

commentary:
paraguṇāmarṣaṇaṃ vārayann āha-

sarveṣāṃ hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭānāṃ sattvānām, sarve vopakramāḥ duḥkhaparihāreṇa tuṣṭayarthāḥ. sarvārambhapariśrameṇa tuṣṭir evotpādayitavyety arthaḥ. sā ca tuṣṭir dhanavisargair api durlabhā, syād vā na veti. iha punar ayatnasiddhopasthitā kasmāt parihīyata iti matvā bhokṣya anubhaviṣyāmi saṃtoṣasukham anyayatnaniṣpāditair guṇair upanāmitam. na hi priyaputraguṇair akṣamāyuktā. iti bhāvanayā paraguṇaśravaṇāc cittakārkaśyam apakuryāt.

commentary: kiṃbhūta | he madhumuranarakavināśana | madhuśca muraśca narakaśca madhumuranarakāḥ daityaviśeṣāstān vināśayatīti tasya saṃbodhane | punaḥ kiṃbhūta | garuḍāsana | garuḍa eva āsanaṃ yānaṃ yasya tasya saṃbodhanam | punaḥ kiṃbhūta | surakulakelinidāna | surāṇāṃ kulaṃ samūhaḥ tasya keliḥ krīḍā tasyāḥ anugrahadvāreṇa nidānam ādikāraṇaṃ tasya saṃbodhane |

root:
āpṛcchasva priyasakham amuṃ tuṅgam āliṅgya śailam  
vandyaiḥ puṃsāṃ raghupatipadair aṅkitaṃ mekhalāsu |  
kāle kāle bhavati bhavato yasya saṃyogam etya  
snehavyaktiś ciravirahajaṃ muñcato bāṣpam uṣṇam ||
commentary: āpṛcchasveti | priyaṃ sakhāyaṃ priyasakham || "rājāhaḥsakhibhyaṣ ṭac" iti ṭac samāsāntaḥ || tuṅgam unnataṃ puṃsāṃ vandhair narārādhanīyai raghupatipadai rāmapādanyāsair mekhalāsu kaṭakeṣu || "atha mekhalā | śroṇisthāne 'drikaṭake kaṭibandhebhabandhane" iti yādavaḥ || aṅkitaṃ cihnitam | itthaṃ saṅkhitvān mahattvāt pavitratvāc ca sambhāvanārham | amuṃ śailaṃ citrakūṭādrim āliṅganyāpṛcchasva sādho yāmīty āmantraṇena sabhājaya || "āmantraṇasabhājane | āpracchannam" ity amaraḥ || "āṅi nupracchacor upasaṅkhyānam" ity ātmanepadam || sakhitvaṃ nirvāhayati—kāla iti || kāle kāle pratiprāvṛṭkālam | suhṛtsamāgamanakālaś ca kālaśabdenocyate | vīpsāyāṃ dviruktiḥ || bhavataḥ saṃyogaṃ samparkam etya ciravirahajam uṣṇaṃ bāṣpam ūṣmāṇaṃ netrajalaṃ ca || "bāṣpo netrajaloṣmaṇoḥ" iti viśvaḥ || muñcato yasya śalasyaḥ snehavyaktiḥ premāvirbhāvo bhavati | snigdhānāṃ hi ciravirahasaṅgatānāṃ bāṣpapāto bhavatīti bhāvaḥ ||

commentary: tathā ca | kusumaśayanīyaṃ puṣpaśayanīyaṃ puṣpaśayyāṃ karoti | kimbhūtaṃ tat | kusumaviśikhaśaratalpamanalpavilāsakalākamanīyam | analpā yā vilāsasya kalāḥ tābhiḥ kamanīyaṃ manoharam | tatkimiva | vratamiva | kasmai | tava parirambhasukhāya | parirambhaṇasyāliṅganasya sukhaṃ tasmai | anyo 'pi yaḥ kaścidabhīṣṭaphalākāṅkṣī bhavati so 'pi duṣkaravratādikaṃ karoti | anena kimuktam | nārāyaṇavirahasaṃtāpāt kusumaśayanīye 'pi duḥkhaṃ na jahātītyarthaḥ |

commentary: punaḥ kimbhūtayā | alasanimīlitalocanayā | alasaṃ yathā syāt tathā nimīlite locane yayā sā tathā tayā | punaḥ kimbhūtam | pulakāvalilalitakapolam | pulakānāṃ āvaliḥ paṅktiḥ tayā lalitau manojñau kapolau yasya tam | vīthyālirāvaliḥ paṅktiḥ śreṇī rekhāstu rājayaḥ ityamaraḥ | punaḥ kimbhūtayā | śramajalasakalakalevarayā | śramajalaṃ svedaḥ sa eva sakale kalevare sarvāṅge yasyāḥ sā tathā tayā | kathambhūtaṃ tam | atilolaṃ cañcalaṃ taralam | kasmāt | varamadanamadāt | madanena varaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ madanamadaśceti | tasmāt |

root:
pitari prāptaṃ yat saukhyaṃ tat sukhaṃ bhujyate svayam |  
maraṇaṃ yena sukhena tat sukhaṃ dhyānam ucyate || 21 ||
commentary:
tasmin baddho 'pi punaḥ punar nirūpaṇīya ity āha.

kva punar idaṃ mano mama vartate, pūrvasminn ālambane anyatra vā gatam. gatam avagamya tato nirvatya tatraiva yojayitavyam. svarasavāhitāyām upekṣaṇīyam iti śamathadhuram ekam api kṣaṇaṃ yathā na parityajati tathā dhārayitavyam. etāvatā śīlaṃ hi samādhisaṃvartanīmam ity uktaṃ bhavati. yathoktaṃ candrapradīpasūtre-

	kṣipraṃ samādhiṃ labhate niraṅgaṇaṃ
	viśuddhaśīlasya mi ānuśaṃsāḥ || (Samādhirāja 27.6)

iti. ato 'vagamyate—ye kecit samādhihetavaḥ prayogāḥ, te śīle 'nugatā iti. tasmāt samādhyarthinā smṛtisaṃprajanyaśīlena bhavitavyam. tathā śīlārthināpi samādhau yatnaḥ kārya iti.

root:
āgamapravaṇaścāhaṃ nāpavādyaḥ skhaliteṣv apy |
nahi sadvartmanā gacchan skhaliteṣvapyapodyate || 1.7 ||
commentary:
sāṃprataṃ pratikāranirdeśam āha.

upadarśitakrameṇa saṃkliṣṭaṃ saṃkleśasaṃprayuktaṃ niṣphalavyāpāraṃ vā jñātvā svacittaṃ sarvapravṛttinigedhena prabhāvamandatāṃ vidhāya nigṛhṇīyād abhibhavet. dṛḍhaṃ yathā punar api samudācāradharmakaṃ na bhavati. kleśādisaṃgrāme vijayāya kṛtaparikaraḥ śuro bodhisattvaḥ. pratipakṣeṇa yo yasmin pratipakṣa uktaḥ yathā rāgādāv aśubhādi, tena tadviparītavidhānenety arthaḥ. sadā sarvakālam, yadā yadā saṃkliṣṭaṃ pratīyate. ugraparipṛcchāyāṃ gṛhiṇaṃ bodhisattvamadhikṛtyoktam—

	tena surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānāt prativiratena bhavitavyam, amattena anunmattena acapalena acañcalena abhrāntena amukhareṇa anunnatena upasthitasmṛtināsasaṃprajanyena.

iti. atraiva ca—

	pravrajitaṃ bodhisattvam adhikṛtyoktam. smṛtisaṃprajanyasyāvikṣepaḥ.

iti. tathā āryatathāgataguhyasūtre darśitam—

	na khalu punaḥ kulaputra bodhisattvasya vāg raktā vā duṣṭā vā mūḍhā vā kliṣṭā vā kṣaṇavyākaraṇī vā svapakṣotkarṣaṇavacanā vā parapakṣanigrahavacanā vā ātmavarṇānunayavacanā vā paravarṇapratighātavacanā vā pratijñottāraṇavacanā vā ābhimānikavyākaraṇavacanā vā ||

iti. evaṃ niṣphalaspandavarjanenānarthād ātmabhāvasya rakṣā pratipāditā bhavati. tasmān mayā śīlasusthitenāprakampenāśithilena bhavitavyam iti.

etac ca samāhitacittasya sidhyati. ata idaṃ śamathamāhātmyam avagamya tātparyeṇa bhāvayitavyam. anena tīvra ādaro bhavati śikśāsu. tenāpi smṛtir upatiṣṭhate. upasthitasmṛtir niṣphalaṃ varjayati. tasyānarthā na saṃbhavanti. tasmād ātmabhāvaṃ rakṣitukāmena smṛtimūlam anviṣya nityam upasthitasmṛtinā bhavitavyam. etad evāha—

	tatrātmabhāve kā rakṣā yadanarthavivarjanam |
	kena tallabhyate sarve niṣphalaspandavarjanāt ||

	etatsidhyetsadā smṛtyā smṛtistīvrādarādbhavet |
	ādaraḥ śamamāhātmyaṃ jñātvātāpena jāyate || (Śikṣāsamuccaya 7–8)

iti |

śamathamāhātmyaṃ tu yathāvasaram ihaiva kathayiṣyate.

root:
maṇḍalaṃ pariveṣṭyaiva yoginīṃ yogisaṃpuṭām |
bhojayen madyamāṃsaiś ca vandayec ca muhur muhuḥ || 2.24 ||
commentary: madhusūdanasya murāreḥ uro vakṣo vo yuṣmākaṃ priyam apekṣitam anupūrayatu | karotvityarthaḥ | kiṃbhūtam uraḥ | padmāpayodharataṭīparirambhalagnakāśmīramudritam | padmāyāḥ lakṣmyāḥ payodharau tayostaṭī parisaraḥ pārśvabhāgaḥ tasyāḥ parirambhaḥ upagūhanaṃ tena lagnaṃ ca tat kāśmīraṃ kuṅkumaṃ ca tena mudritam | tatstanākāramaṇḍalākṛticihnitam | mamedaṃ murāreruro na tvanyasyāḥ ityabhiprāyeṇa mudritaṃ cihnitam | anyo 'pi svavastuni dravye vā granthimudrāṅkalakṣaṃ karotītyarthaḥ | kiṃbhūtamiva | vyaktānurāgamiva | antaḥsthitaḥ san bahirniḥsṛtya vyaktaḥ āvirbhūtaḥ anurāgaḥ prema yasmin tattathā tadiva | punaḥ kiṃbhūtam | khelavanaṅgakhedasvedāmbupūram | khelat krīḍaṃścāsau anaṅgaśca tena khedaḥ prayāsaḥ tena svedāmbu svedarūpaṃ nīraṃ tasya pūraḥ pravāhaḥ samūho yatra tattathā tasmin tat | gītārthaṃ ślokena sūcayati |

root:
satsukhatvena tattvaṃ ca vibuddho bodhanād rateḥ |  
dehe sambhavatīty asmād devateti nigadyate || 14 ||
commentary:
atha bhagavan jñānakāyasyetyādi || he bhagavn mañjuśrījñānasattvasya saṃbandhinī yā nāmasaṃgītis tāṃ cāhaṃ dhārayiṣyāmīti vakṣyamāṇena kriyāpadena saṃbandhaḥ || kiṃviśiṣṭasya jñānakāyasyeti | jñānam eva kāyo jñānakāyas tasya jñānakāyasyety ādarśajñānadvāreṇa || mahoṣṇīṣasyeti | mahān uṣṇīṣo 'syeti mahoṣṇīṣas tasya mahoṣṇīṣasyeti samatājñānadvāreṇa || mahoṣṇīṣatvaṃ sarvatathāgatabhiṣekātmakatvāt || giṣpater iti | girāṃ śabdānāṃ patiḥ svāmī gīṣpatis tasya gīṣpateḥ pratyavekṣaṇājñānadvāreṇa || jñānamūrter iti | jñānam eva mūrtir jñānamūrtis tasya jñānamūrter iti kṛtyānuṣṭhānajñānadvāreṇa || svayaṃbhuva iti svayaṃ bhavatīti svayaṃbhūr bhāvanābalād bhavatīty arthaḥ | tathā coktaṃ śrīparamādye |

	samantabhadrajñānasya svayam evāvabhotsyate |

iti || atas tasya svayaṃbhuva iti suviśuddhadharmadhātujñānadvāreṇa || kim uktaṃ bhavati | pañcajñānātmako bhagavān mañjuśrījñānasattvaḥ | mañjuḥ komalā śrīr yasyāsau mañjuśrīḥ | jñānasattva iti | sarvatathāgatahṛdayavihāritvāt | mañjuśrīś cāsau jñānasattvaś ceti mañjuśrījñānasattvaḥ | nāyaṃ daśabhūmīśvaro bodhisattvaḥ kiṃ tarhy advayajñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā saiva mañjuśrījñānasattvaḥ || ata evāha dignāgapādaḥ |

	prajñāpāramitā jñānam advayaṃ sā tathāgataḥ ||

iti || tasya mañjuśrījñānasattvasya pañcajñānātmakasya saṃbandhinī yā nāmasaṃgītis tāṃ cāhaṃ dhārayiṣyāmīti ||

commentary: rajakītyādinā tisro mudrā uddiśya rañjanādityādinā nirdiśati | rañjanādityanurāgaṇāt | prajñayā hyāśayānuśayaṃ vijñāya yathāyogamanuṣṭhānātsarvasattvā anurāgitā bhavantīti prajñaiva tathocyate |

daravidalitamallīvallicañcatparāgaprakaṭitapaṭavāsairvāsayan kānanāni |

commentary: he rādhe | gandhavāhaḥ malayajo vāyuḥ iha vasante virahiṇīnāṃ ceto dahati | kiṃ kurvan | vāsayan sugandhayan | kāni | kānanāni | kaiḥ kṛtvā | daravidalitamallīvallicañcatparāgaprakaṭitapaṭavāsaiḥ | daravidalitā īṣadvikasitāśca tā mallīvallyaśca | tāsu cañcantaḥ itastato gacchantaḥ te ca te parāgāśca puṣpareṇavaśca sugandhivastucūrṇāni ca | athavā taiḥ parāgaiḥ prakaṭitapaṭuvāsāḥ prakaṭitāśca paṭavaḥ utkṛṣṭāśca te vāsāśca taiḥ | tanu virahiṇīnāṃ dahati | kimbhūtaḥ | prasaradasamabāṇaprāṇavat | prasaraṃścāsau asamabāṇaḥ kandarpaśceti tasya prāṇa iva samāna iva bhavatīti prāṇavat | punaḥ kimbhūtaḥ | ketakīgandhabandhuḥ | ketakīnāṃ gandhaḥ tasya bandhuḥ sahavāsī |

commentary: śaṭham iti duṣṭam ||

root:
pāramparyeṇa sākṣād vā sattvārthaṃ nānyad ācaret |
sattvānām eva cārthāya sarvaṃ bodhāya nāmayet || 5.101 ||
commentary:
tad eva prajñāpariśuddhimātrāpekṣayā yathoktaśūnyatāprabhedamukhena maitreyādiṣoḍaśasamādhyātmakam ity ata āha ||

tatra mahāmaitrīmayo 'meya iti maitreyaḥ | mitram asyāstīti maitraṃ | paścān ṅibantaṃ | tataḥ sarvasattveṣu maitrīmayo maitrīsvabhāvaḥ | mahāṃś cāsau maitrīmayaś ca mahāmaitrīmayaḥ | ata evāmeyaḥ sakalasattvadhātāv ekaputraprematvāt || mahākāruṇiko 'gradhīr iti mañjuśrīḥ | mahākaruṇā anālambanātmikā | sā yasyāsti sa mahākāruṇikaḥ | agradhīr iti suviśuddhadharmadhātujñānam | tataś caitad uktaṃ bhavati | audāryagāmbhīryātmako 'sau bhagavān iti || mahāprājño mahādhīmān iti gandhahastī | mahatī prajñā dharmapravicayalakṣaṇātmikā sā yasyāsti sa prājñaḥ | mahāṃś cāsau prājñaś ca mahāprājñaḥ | ata eva mahādhīmān || mahopāyo mahākṛtīti jñānaketuḥ | mahān upāyo yasyāsau mahopāyaḥ | tataś ca mahākṛtī mahāpaṇḍitaḥ sarvasattvāśayānuśayajñatayā saddharmaprakāśakatvāt ||

root:
avibhāvitasambandho vikalpo 'sau pratītyajaḥ |
tad eṣa eva nirvāṇaṃ mā mṛthāś citta vibhramam || SeNi 35 ||
commentary: prajñājñānetyādi. prajñājñānopadeśād uttarakālaṃ yat bodhicittasyāmṛtarūpasya rasanayā grahaṇam, tat turyaṃ caturthaṃ sekam āha kaścit. tac cāvaraṃ hīnam, vinikṛṣṭam iti yāvat. kasmād avaram? yasmāt sarvaprayāso mantramudrādevatādyākārabhāvanāsu punaḥpunaranuṣṭhānalakṣaṇas tathāgatokto vyarthaḥ prāptaḥ. kutaḥ? tatphalasya bhāvanāsādhyasya phalasya bodhicittāsvādakāla eva prasiddhatvāt prāptatvāt, anyasya viśiṣṭasya phalasyābhāvād iti yāvat.

root:
citraṃ tato vipākaḥ syāt tṛtīye tu vilakṣaṇam |
vimardaś ca tato jñeyo haṭhayoganirākṛteḥ || SeNi 2 ||
commentary:
catuḥkṣaṇakāraṇam iti namaskārahetur uktaḥ | tatra ke te catuḥkṣaṇāḥ | kīdṛśī ca tatparipāṭiḥ | ata āha—citram ityādi |

nanu tantroktakramam ullaṅghya kim iti tṛtīye vilakṣaṇam iṣyate | tadartham āha—haṭhayoganirākṛteḥ | tatrāyaṃ haṭhayogaḥ—vicitraṃ vividhaṃ grāhyagrāhakabhāvād āliṅganādau | vipākas tadviparīto 'vicitro grāhyābhāvāt sukho jñānabhogo ghṛṣṭau | vimardo nirvikalpaṃ darśanaṃ sukhaṃ ratnaṃ vyāpyāgraṃ yāvat | anyad vilakṣaṇaṃ rāgavarjitaṃ nirbharasukhābhāvāt | arāgavarjitaṃ sukhānubhavasmaraṇena virāgābhāvāt pāte | yad uktam—

   vicitraṃ vividhaṃ khyātam āliṅganacumbanādikam |
   vipākaṃ tadviparyāsaṃ sukhaṃ jñānasya bhuñjanam ||
   vimardam ālocanaṃ proktaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktaṃ mayeti ca |
   vilakṣaṇaṃ tribhyo 'nyad rāgārāgavivarjitam || 

iti | idaṃ nirākāravādimatena ratnānubhūtaṃ śaradamalamadhyāhnagaganāyamānaṃ samatalaṃ sātasaṃvinmātraṃ sarvanīlādyākāracakrakalaṅkāpagamād avatiṣṭhate | ākārabādhakaṃ tv ekānekaviyogādipramāṇaṃ vistarabhayān na vipañcitam | yad āhuḥ—

   tasmān nārtheṣu na jñāne sthūlābhāsas tadātmanaḥ |
   ekatra pratiṣiddhatvād bahuṣv api na sambhavaḥ ||
   paricchedo 'ntaranyo 'yaṃ bhāgo bahir iva sthitaḥ |
   jñānasyābhedino bhedapratibhāso hy upaplavaḥ || 

iti | idam eva dharmakāyaḥ | tatpṛṣṭhe maṇḍalacakrādyākāraṃ jñānaṃ sambhogaḥ | bhūtabhautikaḥ śākyamunyādyākāro nirmāṇam | eṣām ekasvabhāvatā svābhāvikaḥ kāyaḥ | evaṃ vimardo dharmaḥ | vipākaḥ sambhogaḥ | vicitraṃ nirmāṇam | vilakṣaṇaḥ svābhāvikaḥ kāyaḥ | yad uktam—"rūpakāyau tu paścimau"  iti |

"tāvad bhāvayed yāvad anupalabdhikaṃ kuryād" ity ukte etad eva dṛṣṭāntalakṣitaṃ sādaranirantaradīrghakālābhyāsena bhāvyamāno maṇḍalacakrādyākāro niṣpādayiṣyati, pūrvapraṇidhānavaśāt sambhoganirmāṇakāyāv iti |

yadvā sātam idam anubhūtaṃ sādarādibhāvanayā sphuṭatāṃ svayam eṣyati | yad āhuḥ—

   tasmād bhūtam abhūtaṃ vā yad yad evātibhāvyate |
   bhāvanābalaniṣpattau tat sphuṭākalpadhīphalam || 

iti | atrāpi pūrvapraṇidhānāvedhavaśād rūpakāyadvayam | ayam eva ca praveśopāyaḥ | yad uktam—

   maṇḍalacakrādyupāyena svādhiṣṭhānakrameṇa ca | 

iti | madhyamārthatayā cedam evodghuṣyate |

   anucchedāt svasaṃvitter nīlādīnām abhāsanāt |
   nimittānām anutpādān madhyamā pratipan matā || 

iti | atra nimittānutpādo 'bhiniveśābhāvo vivakṣitaḥ | tena sadasadādyabhiniveśābhāvāc catuḥkoṭirahitatvam | caturthatāpy atra "caturthaṃ tatpunas tathā" iti vacanāt | tat prajñājñāne 'nubhūtaṃ nirākāravedanaṃ punar iti nīlādyākāracakramalāpagame tatheti prajñājñānam iva boddhavyam ||

sākāravādinas tu nirākāraṃ jñānaṃ svapne 'pi nānubhūyata iti vadanti | tad āhuḥ—

   nākāracakram avadhūya dhiyo 'sti vṛttis
   tadbādhane balini madhyanaye jayaśrīḥ |
   no ced anindyam idam advayam eva citraṃ
   ceto nirākṛtimatasya tu ko 'vakāśaḥ || 

iti | na caivaṃ mantavyam—ākāraprakāśābhāvād ākāraḥ prāṅ nāstīti | tanniścayābhāve 'py aśakyāpahnavasyānubhūyamānasya pṛṣṭollekhaniścīyamānasya ca nīlādivedanasya bhāvāt | yad āhuḥ—
 
	yad yathā bhāsate jñānaṃ tat tathaivānubhūyate |
	iti nāmaikabhāvaḥ syāc citrākārasya cetasi || 

iti | tataś citrādvaitavedanam eva param asti | atrāpi ca granthavistarabhayāt sādhakabādhakapramāṇacintā na kṛtā | etad eva catuḥkoṭirahitatayā madhyamārthenāpi ghaṭayanti | tathā coktam—

	nāsat prakāśavapuṣā na ca sat tadanyair
		ekena na dvitayam advitayaṃ na tābhyām |
	ittathaṃ jagad yadi catuḥśikharīvimuktaṃ 
		ko bhāṣyakāramatamadhyamayor viśeṣaḥ || 

iti | vyāvṛttikṛtabhedena sambhogābhinno 'pi vimardo dharmaḥ | vipākaḥ sambhogaḥ | vicitraṃ nirmāṇam | vilakṣaṇaḥ svābhāvikaḥ kāyaḥ | lakṣaṇabhūtaṃ prajñājñānaṃ tathaivābhyasyamānaṃ punaḥśabdavācyaṃ sac caturthaṃ saptāṅgayuktaṃ sādhyaṃ syāt | tatra saptāṅgāni—sambhogaṃ vitteḥ | sampuṭaṃ samāpatteḥ | mahāsukhaṃ sātarūpatayā | niḥsvabhāvaṃ kalpitavirahāt | kāruṇyanirbharaṃ pūrvapraṇidhānāvedhavaśena sambhogādinā sattvārthakaraṇāt | nirantaraṃ madhye 'ntarābhāvāt | nirnirodhaṃ pravāhānucchedāt | tad uktam | 

	sambhogasampuṭamahāsukhaniḥsvabhāva-
		kāruṇyanirbharanirantaranirnirodhaiḥ | 
	aṅgair mameṣṭam iha saptabhir eva yuktaṃ
		sādhyaṃ pramāṇaparibhāvitabuddhiśastam || 

iti | yad vālam anena saptāṅgayoginā sādhanena | aniyama evātra | yato nairātmyāyoginīcakraṃ bhāvyamānaṃ buddhatvahetuḥ | atha cātra saptāṅgayogi sādhanaṃ na bhavati | sampuṭābhāvāt | tad uktam—

	sādhyaṃ saptāṅgasaṃyuktaṃ tad eva yadi sādhanam | 
	nairātmyāyoginīcakraṃ bodhaye kiṃ na sammatam || 

iti | athaivaṃ matir yat tatrāpi khaṭvāṅgopāyasampuṭatvam asti | yad uktam—

	khaṭvāṅgasampuṭā devī sambhogādisamānvitā |
	nairātmyāyoginī hanta bodhaye kiṃ na sādhanam || 

iti | tad apy asundaram | pāramitānaye 'pi vivakṣitasākṣāt sampuṭābhāve 'pi prajñopāyātmakabodhicittasampuṭasambhavena mantranayasyeva saptāṅgayuktasādhyasiddhiprasaṅgāt |

	viśiṣṭaṃ sampuṭaṃ hitvā anyathā yadi kalpyate |
	śūnyatetarasāmpuṭyāt prasaṅgaḥ syān nayāntare || 

athātra sādhane saptāṅgayuktāsty eva | yataḥ—

	stanau hṛtvā bhaved bolaṃ kakkolamadhyasaṃsthitam ||
	tīradvayaṃ bhaved ghaṇṭā kiñjalkaṃ bolakaṃ bhavet | 

iti | tad apy apeśalam | yataḥ siddhyavasthāyām idaṃ sarvaṃ na sādhanāvasthāyām | atas tathāvidhasādhanābhāve 'pi saptāṅgayuktasādhyasiddhiprasaṅgaḥ pāramitānaye 'pi durnivāraḥ |

	prāg asampuṭatā bhāvyā niṣpattau sā bhaviṣyati |
	etat sammatam asmākaṃ sādhanaṃ punar anyathā ||

iti | etad eva cānye māyopamādvaitam iti varṇayanti | yathā svapnānubhūtakāminīratisaṃvedanaṃ tatpṛṣṭhabhāvyaparasvapnasaṃvedanenānubhūyamānaṃ nātyantocchedena mṛṣānubhūteḥ | nāpi saj jāgraddaśopalabdhārthakriyākārisvaparavedyavastuvad avisaṃvādābhāvāt | tadāhuḥ—

	svapnāt svapnaṃ yadaiva syāc ciccitrālīkatā tadā |
	naiva satyam asadvitter na cocchedaḥ prakāśataḥ || 

iti | tathaitad api viśvaṃ nātyantocchedenālīkaṃ vitteḥ | nāpi paramārthasat "sadasator utpādāyogād" ityādinā pratītyasamutpannatvenādhyavasitasya paramārthato 'tyantājātatvenānutpannasya sattvāyogāt | yathoktam—

	yat pratītyasamutpannaṃ notpannaṃ tat svabhāvataḥ | 
	yat svabhāvena notpannam utpannaṃ nāma tat katham || 

atrāpi ca caturthatvadharmakāyādiyuktatvavyavasthā pūrvavad eva boddhavyā ||

commentary: hariṇadvayaveṣṭitāṃ kuryāt | tadadhaḥ kramaśīrṣapaṭṭikāṃ dadyāt | toraṇapārśvadvaye tu yathāśobhaṃ vajrāradvayaṃ dadyāt | cihnadvayaṃ koṇacchatraṃ ca | evaṃ yathāśobhaṃ darpaṇacāmarādikaṃ likhet | maṇḍalasya catuḥkoṇebhyo niḥśaṅka nānārūpān kalpavṛkṣān saṃlikhet ||

kiṃ ca grāhyādiśūnyaś cec cittam akṣobhya ucyate |
bādhā svāgamato vajrasattvamudrāviyogataḥ || SeNi 19 ||
commentary:
parāgamasāmyam uktvā svāgamavirodham āha—kiṃ cetyādi | iha hi madhyamakādivicārito 'rtho mantranaye phalena devatāyogena khyāpyate | tataś ca yad yena mudryate tat tatsvabhāvaṃ bhavatīti kṛtvā grāhyasya rūpādiskandhacatuṣṭayasvabhāvasya grāhyatvahānaye vairocanādayaś catvāro grāhakāḥ paratantrarūpāḥ kathyante | teṣāṃ ca mudrārthaṃ pariniṣpannarūpo grāhyagrāhakaśūnyo 'kṣobhyaś ced ucyate tad āgamoktā vajrasattvamudrā virudhyate | ratnagarbhādisthabodhicitte pariniṣpannarūpākṣobhyasadbhāvāt | vajrasattvamudrāṃ ca vinā na bauddhakṛtānto bhavatīti kathaṃ bāhyasiddhāntena na sāmyam | tathā ca kambalāmbarapādāḥ—

	sarvaḥ samānaḥ pravibhajyamānaḥ 
		sukṣmekṣikākṣāmadhiyā kṛtāntaḥ |
	bauddhasya bāhyasya vibhāgakartrī
		na syād ihaikā yadi śūnyatoktiḥ ||

	mā bhūt saṃvitpratiṣṭhānam ata eva munir bhayāt |
	bhinatti deśanādharmam uktvoktvā śūnyatātmanā ||

iti pravacanam api | 

	samastavedasiddhānāṃ kṛtānām īśvarādibhiḥ |
	bauddhānāṃ tantramantrāṇāṃ viśeṣaḥ śunyatāṃ prati ||

iti | paraparikalpitaśūnyatoktibhyas tathāgataśūnyatoktīnām abhisandhikṛto viśeṣaḥ sphuṭa iti na pratanyate ||

commentary:
iyam api śikṣāpadamudrāvadhārayitavyety āha.

antataḥ svayamāhārādikriyayā parapreraṇayāparāparadūtapreraṇayā vā, sākṣāt svayam evāmiṣadānādinā vā, yat sattvānāṃ hitasukhahetur na bhavati, tan na kuryāt kārayed vā. na caitad eva kevalam. kiṃcit sattvānām eva saṃsāraduḥkhapatitānāṃ tato niḥsaraṇāya sarvaṃ kuśalamūlam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet.

commentary: jayanti bhakti iti | bhaktipīyūṣarasa evāsavavaraḥ - utkṛṣṭaṃ pānaṃ, tena udgataharṣā ye te jayanti — sarvotkarṣeṇa vartante | kīdṛśāḥ | advitīyāḥ — addvitīyā asādhāraṇasvarūpā api tvaddvitīyāḥ — tvam eva dvitīyas tulyarūpo yeṣām | atha ca tvaddvitīyā api - bhaktisamāveśenātyantam abhedāsādhanatvāt tvam eva dvitīyaḥ - prabhutvena pariśīlito yeṣāṃ, tathābhūtā api advitīyāḥ—viśvābhedinaḥ | advitīyāś ca kathaṃ tvaddvitīyāḥ, tvaddvitīyāś ca katham advitīyā iti virodhacchāyā ||

commentary:

commentary: iti manasi nidhāya tathaiva saṃyatātmā tiṣṭhet. trapādarabhayānvitaḥ—apratirūpe karmaṇi trapā lajjā, śikṣāyām ādaraḥ, tadatikrame bhayam. buddhabodhisattveṣv eva vā trapādayaḥ. evaṃ sati aparo 'pi viśeṣaḥ syād ity āha—buddhetyādi. tad evaṃ viharatas tasya pratikṣaṇam akāmata eva buddhānusmṛtiḥ syāt.

commentary: tasminn iti || tasminn adrau citrakūṭādrau | abalāviprayuktaḥ kāntāvirahī | kanakasya valayaḥ kaṭakam || "kaṭakaṃ valayo 'striyām" ity amaraḥ || tasya bhraṃśena pātena riktaḥ śūnyaḥ prakoṣṭhaḥ kūrparādadhaḥ pradeśo yasya sa tathoktaḥ || "kakṣāntare prakoṣṭhaḥ syāt prakoṣṭhaḥ kūrparādadhaḥ" iti śāśvataḥ || virahaduḥkhāt kṛśa ity arthaḥ | kāmī kāmukaḥ sa yakṣaḥ | katicinmāsān | aṣṭau māsān ity arthaḥ | "śeṣān māsān gamaya caturaḥ" iti vakṣyamāṇatvāt || nītvā yāpayitvā | āṣāḍhānakṣatreṇa yuktā paurṇamāsyāṣāḍhī || "nakṣatreṇa yuktaḥ kālaḥ" ity aṇ | "ṭiḍḍhāṇañ-" ityādinā ṅīp || sāṣāḍhy asmin paurṇamāsīty āṣāḍho māsaḥ || "sāsmin paurṇamāsīti saṃjñāyām" ity aṇ || tasya prathamadivase āśliṣṭasānum ākrāntakūṭam | vaprakrīḍā utkhātakelayaḥ || "utkhātakeliḥ krīḍādyair vaprakrīḍā nigadyate" iti śabdārṇave || tāsu pariṇatas tiryag dantaprahāraḥ || "tiryagdantaprahāras tu gajaḥ pariṇato mataḥ" iti halāyudhaḥ || sa cāsau gajaś ca tam iva prekṣaṇīyaṃ darśanīyaṃ meghaṃ dadarśa || gajaprekṣaṇīyam ity atreva lopāluptopamā || kecit "āṣāḍhasya prathamadivase" ity atra "pratyāsanne nabhasi" iti vakṣyamāṇanabhomāsasya pratyāsasya "praśamadivase" iti pāṭhaṃ kalpayanti tad asaṅgatam | prathamātireke kāraṇābhāvāt | nabhomāsasya pratyāsatty artham ity uktam iti cen na | pratyāsattimātrasya māsapratyāsattyaiva prathamadivasasyāpy upapatteḥ | atyantapratyāsatter upayogābhāvenāvivakṣitatvāt | vivakṣitatve vā svapakṣe 'pi prathamadivasātikrameṇa meghadarśana kalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvena tadasambhavāt | pratyutāsmatpakṣa eva kuśala sandeśasya bhāvyanarthapratīkārārthasya purata evānumānamuktaṃ bhavatīty upayoga siddhiḥ || nanūnmattasya nāyaṃ viveka iti cen na | unmattasya nānarthasya pratīkārārthaṃ pravṛttir apīti sandeśa eva mā bhūt || tathā ca kāvyārambha evāprasiddhaḥ syād itv aho mūlacchedī pāṇḍityaprakarṣaḥ | kathaṃ tarhi "śāpānto" me bhujagaśayanād utthite śārṅgapāṇau" ityādinā bhagavatprabodhāv adhikasya śāpasya māsacatuṣṭayāvaśiṣṭasyoktiḥ | daśadivasādhikyād iti cet sapakṣe 'pi kathaṃ sā viṃśatidivasair nyūnatvād iti santoṣṭavyam | tasmād īṣadvaiṣamyam avivakṣitam iti suṣṭhūktaṃ "prathamadivase" iti ||
