commentary: kadācid iti | kadācit kasyāṃcit samādhidaśāyāṃ kvāpi hṛdayacakrādau yogena cittavṛttinirodhena, īśa svāmin, asi tvaṃ labhya ityeṣā vañcanā | anyathā samādhivyutthānādyabhimatāsu kakṣyāsu kathaṃ bhaktimatāṃ prakāśase |

root:
svadevatākāraviśeṣaśūnyaṃ
prāg eva sambhāvya sukhaṃ sphuṭaṃ sat |
mahāsukhākhyaṃ jagadarthakāri
cintāmaṇiprakhyam uvāca kaścit || 9 ||
commentary: svadevatetyādi. svadevatākāraviśeṣeṇa sveṣṭadevatākāreṇa śūnyam, nirākāram iti yāvat. prāg eva prathamataram upadeśānantaram eva devatākāranirapekṣaṃ sukhaṃ sambhāvya, bhāvanayā sākṣāt kṛtvā, sphuṭaṃ sphuṭīkṛtaṃ san mahāsukhasaṃjñakaṃ bhavati. tac ca jagadarthakāri cintāmaṇisamānarūpam. etad uktaṃ bhavati—upadeśānantaram eva mantramudrādevatākārarahitaṃ bhāvanayā sphuṭīkṛtaṃ mahāsukhasaṃjñakaṃ cintāmaṇivaj jagadarthakāri māyopamam āsaṃsārasthāyi dvitīyaṃ sādhyam.

root:
mahāmāyādharo vidvān mahāmāyārthasādhakaḥ |
mahāmāyāratirato mahāmāyendrajālikaḥ || 35 ||
commentary:
tad eva lakṣaṇavyañjanātmani rūpakāye 'nabhisaṃskārāl lakṣaṇaśūnyatā || balavaiśāradyādisvabhāvadharmakāyānabhisaṃskārāt sarvadharmaśūnyatā || pudgaladharmāsamāropaṇād abhāvaśūnyatā || yathoktaśūnyatālakṣaṇāpavādānabhisaṃskaraṇāc ca abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā | ataś cāha mahāmāyetyādi |

tatra mahāmāyādharo vidvān iti vajraviśvaḥ | māyeti sarvatathāgatavicitravipulodārapūjānirmāṇaṃ tad dhārayatīti māyādharaḥ | mahāṃś cāsau māyādharaś ceti mahāmāyādharaḥ | ata eva vidvān paṇḍitas tena pūjākarmaṇā puṇyasaṃbhāropārjanāt || mahāmāyārthasādhaka iti vajrarakṣaḥ | māyārtheti nirmāṇārthaḥ | tena kusīdasattvāni sādhayati protsāhayatīti māyārthasādhakaḥ | mahāṃś cāsau mayārthasādhakaś ceti mahāmāyārthasādhakaḥ | mahāmāyāratirata iti vajrayakṣaḥ | māyāyāṃ ratir māyāratiḥ | tathāgatapūjānirmāṇaratir ity arthaḥ | māyāratau rataḥ sakto māyāratirataḥ | mahāṃś cāsau māyāratirataś ca mahāmāyāratirataḥ || mahāmāyendrajālika iti vajramuṣṭiḥ | māyendrajālaṃ nirmāṇasamūhaṃ kāyavākcittavajrāṇām ekībhāvaḥ | tad vettīti māyendrajālikaḥ | mahāṃś cāsau māyendrajālikaś ca mahāmāyendrajālikaḥ || vṛddhyabhāvo 'tra draṣṭavyaḥ saddharmapāṭhāt || 

tataś ca kṛtyānuṣṭhānajñānāśrayavajrakarmādicatuṣṭayātmakaṃ cakṣurādivijñānaparāvṛttyātmani kṛtyānuṣṭhānajñāne sati | uktaviparyāsāpahrāsamukhena samastasugatapūjābhisaṃrakṣaṇavighnopaśamakāyādiśūnyatājñānakāraṇatvāt | ata eva caiṣāṃ vajraviśvādīnāṃ krama iti ||

root:
saddharmasevakaṃ kāyam itarārthe na pīḍayet |
evam eva hi sattvānām āśām āśu prapūrayet || 5.86 ||
commentary:
atityāgaṃ niṣedhayan punar ātmarakṣām upadarśayann āha.

satāṃ satpuruṣāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaḥ. laukikalokottaraparahitasukhavidhānam | tatsevakaṃ kāyam alpārthanimittaṃ na pīḍayet. anyathā mahato 'rtharāśer hāniḥ syāt. ata eva pūrvasmin hetupadam etat. kutaḥ punar evam? yasmād anenaiva sukumāropakrameṇa saṃvardhamānaḥ śīghram eva sattvānāṃ hitasukhasaṃpādanasamartho bhavati.

root:
bhagavan jñānakāyasya mahoṣṇīṣasya gīṣpateḥ |
mañjuśrījñānasattvasya jñānamūrteḥ svayaṃbhuvaḥ || 10 ||
commentary:
atha bhagavan jñānakāyasyetyādi || he bhagavn mañjuśrījñānasattvasya saṃbandhinī yā nāmasaṃgītis tāṃ cāhaṃ dhārayiṣyāmīti vakṣyamāṇena kriyāpadena saṃbandhaḥ || kiṃviśiṣṭasya jñānakāyasyeti | jñānam eva kāyo jñānakāyas tasya jñānakāyasyety ādarśajñānadvāreṇa || mahoṣṇīṣasyeti | mahān uṣṇīṣo 'syeti mahoṣṇīṣas tasya mahoṣṇīṣasyeti samatājñānadvāreṇa || mahoṣṇīṣatvaṃ sarvatathāgatabhiṣekātmakatvāt || giṣpater iti | girāṃ śabdānāṃ patiḥ svāmī gīṣpatis tasya gīṣpateḥ pratyavekṣaṇājñānadvāreṇa || jñānamūrter iti | jñānam eva mūrtir jñānamūrtis tasya jñānamūrter iti kṛtyānuṣṭhānajñānadvāreṇa || svayaṃbhuva iti svayaṃ bhavatīti svayaṃbhūr bhāvanābalād bhavatīty arthaḥ | tathā coktaṃ śrīparamādye |

	samantabhadrajñānasya svayam evāvabhotsyate |

iti || atas tasya svayaṃbhuva iti suviśuddhadharmadhātujñānadvāreṇa || kim uktaṃ bhavati | pañcajñānātmako bhagavān mañjuśrījñānasattvaḥ | mañjuḥ komalā śrīr yasyāsau mañjuśrīḥ | jñānasattva iti | sarvatathāgatahṛdayavihāritvāt | mañjuśrīś cāsau jñānasattvaś ceti mañjuśrījñānasattvaḥ | nāyaṃ daśabhūmīśvaro bodhisattvaḥ kiṃ tarhy advayajñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā saiva mañjuśrījñānasattvaḥ || ata evāha dignāgapādaḥ |

	prajñāpāramitā jñānam advayaṃ sā tathāgataḥ ||

iti || tasya mañjuśrījñānasattvasya pañcajñānātmakasya saṃbandhinī yā nāmasaṃgītis tāṃ cāhaṃ dhārayiṣyāmīti ||

root:
paracodanadakṣāṇām anadhīṣṭopakāriṇām |
pratīcchec chirasā vākyaṃ sarvaśiṣyaḥ sadā bhavet || 5.74 ||
commentary: he janakasutākṛtabhūṣaṇa | janakasya sutā sītā tasyāḥ kṛtaṃ śokanivṛttikādi bhūṣaṇamalaṅkaraṇaṃ yena sa tathā tasya saṃbodhanam | punaḥ kiṃbhūta | jitadūṣaṇa | jito dūṣaṇo rākṣaso yena sa tathā tasya saṃbodhanam | punaḥ kiṃbhūta | samaraśamitadaśakaṇṭha | samare saṃgrāme śamitaḥ śāntiṃ prāpito daśakaṇṭho rāvaṇo yena sa tathā tasya saṃbodhanam |

root:
evam adhyeṣya guhyendro vajrapānis tathāgatam |
kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhūtvā prahvakāyasthito 'grataḥ || 16 ||
commentary: evam ityādi | evam anena prakāreṇa bhagavān guhyendro vajrapāṇis tathāgatam adhyeṣya | tatra guhyā yakṣā aḍakavatīnivāsinas teṣām indro rājā | ata eva guhyendra ity ucyate || kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhūtvā prahvakāyaḥ praṇatakāyo 'grataḥ sthita iti || saṃskārapūrvikā prārthanā adhyeṣaṇā | saṃskāro 'tra praṇāmādi ||

root:
brahmā nirvṛtito buddho viśaṇād viṣṇur ucyate |  
śivaḥ sadā sukalyāṇāt sarvaḥ sarvātmani sthitaḥ || 13 ||
commentary: yad ekasya rucijanakaṃ tad anyasya viparītam. anyonyaviruddhābhiḥ pṛthagjanecchābhirakheditam avipratisāri. katham? dayānvitam. hetupadam etat. kutaḥ? yasmāt kleśotpādān na svātantryādidam etat parasparaviruddhacaritam eṣāṃ bālānām iti matvā.

root:
sarasamasṛṇamapi malayajapaṅkam |
paśyati viṣamiva vapuṣi saśaṅkam ||
commentary: sā rādhā vapuṣi svadehe lagnaṃ malayajapaṅka candanaṃ viṣaṃ kālakūṭamiva paśyati | kimbhūtam | sarasamasṛṇamapi | saha rasena vartata iti sarasaḥ | masṛṇaḥ ślakṣṇaḥ ghṛṣṭaḥ | kathaṃ yathā syāt tathā | saśaṅkaṃ śaṅkayā saha vartamānaṃ yathā bhavati |

root:
bhūmiṃ chādayituṃ sarvāṃ kutaś carma bhaviṣyati |
upānaccarmamātreṇa channā bhavati medinī || 5.13 ||
commentary:
atrāśakyatāyām apy upāyena pravṛttau dṛṣṭāntopadarśanena śakyatām āha.

kaṇṭakādyupaghātarakṣaṇārthaṃ pṛthvī chādayitum ucitā. na caitac chakyam, tāvataś carmaṇo 'bhāvāt, bhāve 'pi chādanasyāśakyatvāt. upāyena punaḥ śakyam. upānahaś carmaṇā kevalena sarvā bhūmiś chāditā bhavati.

root:
santaptānāṃ tvam asi śaraṇaṃ tat payoda priyāyāḥ  
sandeśaṃ me hara dhanapatikrodhaviśleṣitasya |  
gantavyā te vasatir alakā nāma yakṣeśvarāṇāṃ  
bāhyodyānasthitaharaśiraścandrikādhautaharmyā ||
commentary: santaptānām iti || he payoda, tvaṃ santaptānām ātapena vā pravāsaviraheṇa vā saṃjvaritānām || "santāpaḥ sañjvaraḥ samau" ity amaraḥ || śaraṇaṃ payodānenātapakhinnānāṃ proṣitānāṃ svasthānapreraṇayā ca rakṣako 'si || "śaraṇaṃ gṛharakṣitroḥ" ity amaraḥ || tat tasmāt kāraṇād dhanapateḥ kuberasya krodhena viśleṣitasya priyayā viyojitasya me mama sandeśaṃ vārtā priyāyā hara | priyāṃ prati nayety arthaḥ | sambandhasāmānye ṣaṣṭhī || sandeśaharaṇenāvayoḥ santāpaṃ nudety arthaḥ | kutra sthāne sā sthitā tatsthānasya vā kiṃ vyāvartakaṃ tatrāha—gantavyeti || bahir bhavaṃ bāhyam || "bahirdevapañcajanebhyaś ca" iti yañ || bāhya udyāne sthitasya harasya śirasi yā candrikā tayā dhautāni nirmalāni harmyāṇi dhanikabhavanāni yasyāṃ sā tathoktā || "harmyādi dhanināṃ vāsaḥ" ity amaraḥ || anena vyāvartakam uktam || alakā nāmālaketi prasiddhā yakṣeśvarāṇāṃ vasatiḥ sthānaṃ te tava gantavyā | tvayā gantavyety arthaḥ || "kṛtyānāṃ kartari vā" iti ṣaṣṭhī ||

root:
tadvidvāṃso 'nugṛhṇantu cittaśrotraiḥ prasādibhiḥ |
santaḥ praṇayivākyāni gṛhṇanti hy anasūyavaḥ || 1.3 ||
commentary:
smṛtim adhikṛtyādhunā prāha.

yataḥ smṛter abhāve dūṣaṇam evaṃ syāt. tasmād idam atra doṣaṃ paśyatā smṛtir ālabambhanāsaṃpramoṣalakṣaṇā manodvārān manogṛhapraveśamārgāt nāpaneyā nāpasāryā, sadāvasthāpayitavyety arthaḥ. atha kadācit pramādatas tato 'pagacchet, tadā gatāpi punar nirvartyopasthāpyā tatraivāropayitavyā. katham? saṃsmṛtya manasi nidhāya āpāyikīṃ narakādidurgativyathām.

tatra dvādaśemāḥ smṛtayo niṣphalaspandavarjanārthaṃ tathāgatājñānatikramānupālanavipākagauravasmṛtiprabhṛtayaḥ śikṣāsamuccaye pradarśitāḥ. tata eva vivekenāvadhāryāḥ.

sāpi smṛtis tīvrādarāt samutpadyate. ādaro 'pi śamathamāhātmyam avagamya ātāpena jāyate. etac ca yathāvasaraṃ vakṣyāmaḥ.

root:
tyaja dharmam adharmaṃ ca ubhe satyānṛte tyaja |
ubhe styānṛte tyaktvā yena tyajasi tat tyaja || SeNi 17 ||
commentary: itthaṃ praviṣṭasyedānīṃ sarvābhiniveśatyāgam āha—tyajetyādi | subodham ||

root:
jalpanaṃ japam ākhyātam ālikālyoḥ prajalpanāt |  
maṇḍalaṃ pādalekhaḥ syān malanān maṇḍalam ucyate || 19 ||
commentary:
utpannarūpāddevatāṃ pratipādya mantraṃ pratipādayannāha—jalpanamityādi |

ālikālyoḥ prajñopāyarūpayoḥ paramamantratvātsarva eva tadrūpatvājjalpo japa ityeṣa niṣprapañco mantraḥ |

root:
saṃkramet tatra yogīndras tasya mūrdhabilena ca |
tārāsaṃkrāntiyogena māmakībhagacetasā || 4.15 ||
tataḥ śukrarasībhūtaḥ patet tasyā bhagodare |
niṣpannaṃ caṇḍarūpaṃ tu niḥsarec ca bhagāt tataḥ || 4.16 ||
commentary: bhagacetaseti bhagopabhogāśaktiṃ kṛtvā bhagavato 'kṣobhyasya śiromārgeṇa mahāsukhena dravībhūyād avadhūtīnāḍīm adhiṣṭhāyākṣobhyaśukreṇa saha patet | vajrarandhreṇa devīpadme | tataḥ padmasuśireṇa dakṣiṇakukṣim adhiṣṭhāya hūṃkārarūpeṇa | bījaṃ dhyātvā tatpariṇatācalarūpeṇa devīpadmamārgeṇa niḥsṛtya tayor agrataḥ tiṣṭhed iti samudāyārthaḥ ||

root:
bhago 'syāstīti buddhasya bhagavānn iti kathyate |  
bhagāni ṣaḍvidhāny āhur aiśvaryādiguṇākhilāḥ |  
athavā kleśādimārāṇāṃ bhañjanād bhagavānn iti || 15 ||
commentary: he tanvi sūkṣme rādhe | tava hṛdayaṃ aham ākalayāmi jānāmi | kimbhūtam | khinnaṃ khedayuktam | kayā | asūyayā īrṣyayā | kutaḥ kutra tvaṃ gatāsi | tanna vedmi na jānāmi | tena kāraṇena te tubhyaṃ nānunayāmi parisāntvanaṃ karomi |

root:
baddhaś cec cittamātaṅgaḥ smṛtirajjvā samantataḥ |
bhayam astaṃgataṃ sarvaṃ kṛtsnaṃ kalyāṇam āgatam || 5.3 ||
commentary: nanu kimaṅgabhūtāyāṃ mīmāṃsāyāṃ vārttikaṃ praṇīyate vedā eva sākṣād vyākhyāyantām ata āha mīmāṃseti | vedā eva saṃśayapūrvottarapakṣakrameṇa vyākhyāyamānā mano harantitarāṃ na tu mantrabrāhmaṇabhāṣyaprasthānena | mīmāṃsayaiva tu te tathāvyākhyāyanta iti tatraiva vārttikaṃ kartuṃ me tṛṣṇā vardhata iti ||

root:
atha vadasi tadā | tasya śiṣyasya hṛdaye khaḍgam arpayitvedaṃ paṭhet |
atitīkṣṇo hy ayaṃ khaḍgaś caṇḍaroṣakare sthitaḥ |
bhedayet samayaṃ yas tu tasya chedanatatparaḥ || 3.19 ||
commentary: he keśava | dhṛtanaraharirūpa | naraharinṛsiṃhaḥ | dhṛtaṃ narahareḥ rūpaṃ yena sa tathā | tava karakamalavare nakhaṃ tiṣṭhati | kara eva kamalavaraṃ padmaśreṣṭhaṃ tasmin | kiṃbhūtaṃ nakham | adbhutaśṛṅgam | adbhutamāścaryajanakaṃ śṛṅgaṃ agrabhāgo yasya tat | adṛṣṭapūrvamityarthaḥ | punaḥ kiṃbhūtam | dalitahiraṇyakaśiputanubhṛṅgam | hiraṇyakaśipostanuḥ śarīraṃ saiva śyāmatvād bhṛṅgaḥ | dalito vidārito hiraṇyakaśipostanubhṛṅgo yena sa tathā tat |

root:
tathā ca devīparipṛcchāśivanirnādatantra—
ratnapuram idaṃ devi kiñjalke jalatāṃ vrajet |
rudro yugme śivaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ śaktiḥ saiva parātparā || Seni 7 ||
lakṣyalakṣaṇanirmuktaṃ vāgudāhāravarjitam |
śivaśaktisamāyogāj jāyate cādbhutaṃ sukham || SeNi 8 ||
commentary: etatsvarūpadarśanārtham āha—duḥkhānām ityādi | subodham ||

root:
mudrās tāvan na buddhyante catasraś ca catuḥkṣaṇāḥ |
yāvan na śabareśasya spṛśyante pādapāṃsavaḥ || SeNi 40 ||
commentary:
kaḥ punar evaṃ sati guṇaḥ syād ity āha.

yasmād evaṃ manasikāreṇa vicaran vanitājanamadhye 'pi prāsādapṛṣṭhe 'yam anivāryo 'tiśayena kāmarāgeṣu. tenedam uktaṃ yatir dhīra iti. asmin manasikāre nidhyaptacittaḥ. na khaṇḍayate śikṣārakṣaṇamanasikārān na skhalati.

root:
tasmāc ca maṇḍalaṃ cāru vartayen mantravidvratī |
praveśya tatra vai śiṣyān pūrvam eva parīkṣitān || 1.15 ||
commentary: hariṇadvayaveṣṭitāṃ kuryāt | tadadhaḥ kramaśīrṣapaṭṭikāṃ dadyāt | toraṇapārśvadvaye tu yathāśobhaṃ vajrāradvayaṃ dadyāt | cihnadvayaṃ koṇacchatraṃ ca | evaṃ yathāśobhaṃ darpaṇacāmarādikaṃ likhet | maṇḍalasya catuḥkoṇebhyo niḥśaṅka nānārūpān kalpavṛkṣān saṃlikhet ||

root:
ahaṃ caināṃ dhārayiṣyāmy ā niryāṇād dṛḍhāśayaḥ | 
yathā bhavāmy ahaṃ nātha sarvasaṃbuddhaguhyadhṛk || 14 ||
commentary:
yasya tasyaiveti | svarṇarūpyarājāvartapravālamaraktalakṣaṇasya pañcaratnasya kaṭhinīpiṣṭakagaurīsindūraharitālaharidrākaṭhinīmiśrakajjalakajjalamiśraharitālāder vā tatrāyaṃ vidhiḥ | yathecchayācāryaḥ ||
......
caturasram ityādi ||

root:
śrījayadevabhaṇitamidamadhikaṃ yadi manasā naṭaṇīyam |
harivirahākulavallavayuvatisakhīvacanaṃ paṭhanīyam ||
commentary: umāpatidharo vācaḥ pallavayati kevalaṃ komalāṃ vācaṃ vistārayatītyarthaḥ | na tu girāṃ vāṇīnāṃ saṃdarbhaśuddhiṃ jānīte | tathā śaraṇaḥ kaviḥ ślāghyaḥ praśastaḥ | kasmin viṣaye | durūhadrute | duḥkhena apyūhituṃ śakyata iti durūhaḥ | durūhaṃ ca drutaṃ ca taṃ tasmin | atiśīghraṃ vaktuṃ samartha ityarthaḥ | tathā ācāryo govardhanaḥ ślāghyaḥ | kaiḥ śṛṅgārottarasatprameyaracanaiḥ | śṛṅgārottarāṇi śṛṅgārapradhānāni ca satprameyāni utkṛṣṭaprameyāni ca teṣāṃ racanāni | śṛṅgārottarasatprameyaracanāni taiḥ | tathā dhoyī nāma kavikṣmāpatiḥ kavirājaḥ śrutidharaḥ śrutyā śravaṇena dhārayatītyarthaḥ | asya ślokasya kaviḥ kṣmāpatiḥ rājā lakṣmaṇasenaḥ |

root:
diśi diśi kirati sajalakaṇajālam |
nayananalinamiva vigalitanālam ||
commentary: sā rādhā nayananalinaṃ locanakamalaṃ diśi diśi kirati kṣipati | kimbhūtam | sajalakaṇajālam | saha jalakaṇajālena vartata iti sa tathā | nanu punaḥ kimbhūtam | vigalitaṃ nālaṃ yasya sa tathā | nanu pratidiśaṃ rudatī mṛgayatītyarthaḥ | anena kimuktam | bhavato lābhāya kajjalābhāvānnayanakamalasajalakusumairdigdevatāmarcayati | ayamāśayaḥ |

root:
karasphoṭo bhaven mudrā aṅgulyāmoṭanaṃ tathā |  
tad dhyeyaṃ cintitaṃ yac ca dhyānaṃ yasmād vicintanam || 20 ||
commentary:
adhunā pratyekaṃ mudrāṇāṃ caturānandasvabhāvatām āha—ānandā ityādi | mudrāṃ mudrāṃ pratyānandāś catvāro mahāmudrāṃ vihāya jñeyāḥ | etadartham eva cāgamād ityādinā hetutrayam āha | tathā hy āgamaḥ—

	vicitre prathamānandaḥ paramānando vipākake |
	viramānando vimarde ca sahajānando vilakṣaṇe || 

ityādinā hevajrādiṣu vicitrādīnām ānandāditvam uktam | tataś ca yatraiva vicitrādisambhavas tatraivānandādivyavasthā | tatsambhavaś ca mudrātraya eva na mahāmudrāyām | ayaṃ cārthaḥ svasaṃvedanarūpaḥ sphuṭa eva | sadgurūpadeśaś ca vicitretyādivakṣyamāṇa iti ||

commentary:
tadeva nirdiśati—vairocanetyādi |

sāttviko mūrtivānvajrasattvaḥ | vairocanādirūpeṇa niṣprapañcasvabhāvaṃ tattvamevocyata ityarthaḥ |

root:

adhunā vada kasmāt tvaṃ kāyam adyāpi rakṣasi || 5.64 ||
commentary: triśaraṇagamanam buddhadharmasaṃghānām āśrayaṇīyatvena cetobhajanam | yācanā buddhānām aparinirvāṇena saṃsārāvasthanārthaṃ vacanaviśeṣaḥ | adhyeṣaṇā buddhānām anavaratavad dharmadeśanārthaṃ cākṣaviśeṣodīraṇam | ātmaniryātanaṃ sarvabuddhabodhisattvebhya ātmadehaniryātanam | puṇyapariṇāmam | etat kriyākalāpaprasūtasya puṇyasya sarvasattvānāṃ buddhatvāya niryātanam ||

root:

svarūpeṇa nāsti rūpaṃ na draṣṭā ca na śabdo nāpi śrotā ca |  
na gandho nāpi ghrātā ca na raso nāpi rāsakaḥ |  
na sparśo nāpi spraṣṭā ca na cittaṃ nāpi caittikam || 1 ||
commentary: kiṃviśiṣṭāṃ nāmasaṃgītiṃ śrotum udyata iti | pavitrām iti māñgalyāṃ | aghanāśanīm iti pāpanāśanīṃ ||

root:

nāntrāṇi cūṣitavyāni kiṃ kāyena kariṣyasi || 5.65 ||
commentary: athetyādi | maṇḍalavyatirekeṇābhiṣekasyāsadbhāvāt tantraśravaṇādhikāro na syād ity abhiprāyaḥ | pañcamānam ity ekasyāpi pañcaprakāraṃ maṇḍalaṃ na tu pañcānāṃ yathā kramaṃ ||

root:
sarvārambhā hi tuṣṭyarthāḥ sā vittair api durlabhā |
bhokṣye tuṣṭisukhaṃ tasmāt paraśramakṛtair guṇaiḥ || 5.77 ||
commentary:
idānīṃ tasyādibuddhasya hṛdaye prajñācakraṃ vicintayet || kiṃviśiṣṭam ity āha pratītyasamutpādārthasūcakaṃ | tathā cāha |

	āraiḥ saṃdhāryate nābhir nābhau cārāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ |
	pratītyotpādayogāc ca cakram etat pravartate || iti ||

akāreṇa pariniṣpannaṃ ṣaḍvarṇopetaṃ sāraṣaṭkaṃ caturmekhalāsaṃ yuktaṃ suvibhaktanābhi || tasya nābhimadhye akāraṃ vicintya | bhagavato jñānasattvasya mūlamantrādayo mantrāś catasṛṣu mekhalāsu sitavarṇā eva bhāvanīyās || tatra prathamamekhalāyām oṃ sarvadharmābhāvasvabhāvaviśuddhavajra a ā aṃ aḥ || tasyaiva dvitīyamekhalāyāṃ dvādaśatathāgatabhūmyabhidhāyakān dvādaśasvarān cintayet || tataḥ prathamāram ārabhya yathāvat mantraṣaṭkavinyāsaṃ kulavarṇakrameṇa kuryāt || tad yathā | prathame | oṃ vajratīkṣṇāya namaḥ | dvitīye | oṃ duḥkhacchedāya namaḥ | tṛtīye | oṃ prajñājñānamūrtaye namaḥ | caturthe | oṃ jñānakāyāya namaḥ | pañcame oṃ vāgīśvarāya namaḥ | ṣaṭhe | oṃ arapacanāya namaḥ | cakrasya bahirnemyām bhagavataḥ sarvatathāgatajñānakāyasya mālāmantraṃ nyaset | aḥ āḥ sarvatathāgatahṛdaya hara hara oṃ hūṃ hṛīḥ bhagavan jñānamūrte vāgīśvara mahāvāca sarvadharmagaganāmalasupariśuddhadharmadhātujñānagarbha āḥ || bahir dvitīyāyāṃ mekhalāyāṃ kakārādihakāraparyantān niveśayet || ity ayaṃ cakrasya mantravinyāsaḥ ||

root:
śikṣāḥ sūtreṣu dṛśyante tasmāt sūtrāṇi vācayet |
ākāśagarbhe sūtre ca mūlāpattīr nirūpayet || 5.104 ||
commentary: sā rādhā ciraṃ cirakālaṃ yo virahaḥ tena kiṃ kariṣyati | kiñca | kiṃ vadiṣyati | ataḥ mama dhanena kiṃ prayojanam | sukhena kiṃ prayojanam | gṛheṇa janena vā kiṃ kāryam |

root:

śrutisaukhyaṃ kṛpāmūlaṃ mṛdumandasvaraṃ vadet || 5.79 ||
commentary: tāṃ rādhāṃ bhṛśamatyarthaṃ ramayāmi krīḍayāmi | kimbhūtām | hṛdi saṃgatām | hṛdaye saṃgatāṃ saṃlagnām | katham | aniśaṃ vāraṃvāram | kimiti vitarke | vane vanamadhye | anusarāmi | anugacchāmi | kimiha nikuñje vṛthā vilapāmi | mithyā paridevanaṃ karomi | kiṃ vitarke paripraśne kṣepe nindāprakāśayoriti vistaraḥ |

root:
suniścitaṃ suprasannaṃ dhīraṃ sādaragauravam |
salajjaṃ sabhayaṃ śāntaṃ parārādhanatatparam || 5.55 ||
commentary: suniścitaṃ saṃdehaviparyāsarahitam. suprasannaṃ sadā prītisaumanasyabahulam. dhīram acañcalam. ādaraḥ kathita eva. gauravaṃ ārādhyeṣu cittasya namratā. tābhyāṃ saha vartate. salajjaṃ pūrvavat. sabhayaṃ skhalitam ālokya bhītam. śāntaṃ saṃyatendriyam, sattvārādhanayatnavat.

root:
bhagavadgītāyām api—
nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ |
ubhayor api dṛṣṭo 'nto hy anayos tattvadarśibhiḥ || SeNi 18 ||
commentary:
nanu haṭhaseko balātkṛto niryuktika iti yāvat | niryuktikatvam asya katham iti cet | ucyate—āgamavirodhāt | taṃ darśayitum āha | ālocanam ityādi |

	paramaviramayor madhye lakṣyaṃ vīkṣya dṛḍhīkuru || 

ity atrobhayor madhyaṃ vivakṣitam | tac ca tvanmate nāsti |

tan na | anyārthatvād asya | tathā hi nirdhāraṇa eṣā ṣaṣṭhī | tenāyam arthaḥ | dvayor madhye yaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sa iha grāhyaḥ | śreṣṭhaś ca virama eveti na kiñcid asustham | 

tarhi

	viramādiḥ paramāt paraḥ śūnyāc chūnyaṃ tu herukam || 

iti na ghaṭate | atra hi viramasyādiḥ paramāt paro 'bhimataḥ | tad api na | yato 'trāpy anya evārthaḥ | viramaś cāsāv ādiś ca viramādiḥ | āditvaṃ ca sahajāpekṣayā | ata idam api sustham |

tarhi—

	viramādau lakṣayet tac ca ānandatrayavarjitam || 

iti katham | atrāpi viramaś cāsāv ādiś ceti pūrvavan neyam | 

tarhi—

	vimardam ālocanaṃ proktaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktaṃ mayeti ca | 

iti katham | atra hi vikalparūpatā vimardādipadānāṃ sphuṭam eva gamyate | athātra katham api yadi nirvikalpatvābhidhānaṃ syāt tad etad api lokaprasiddhibādhayaiva hatam | tathā hi lokā vimardo vivādaḥ kṣodanam ālocanaṃ tattatkāryādicintanam iti manyante | kiṃ ca—

	vicitre prathamānandaḥ paramānando vipākake |
	viramānando vimarde ca sahajānando vilakṣaṇe || 

ity atra virama eva vimarda iti niścitam | anyac ca—

	prathamānandaṃ jagadrūpaṃ paramānandaṃ jagat tathā |
	viramānandaṃ jagac caiva na vidyate sahajaṃ triṣu || 

iti viramasya jagadrūpatayā saṃsārarūpatvam ākhyātam | itthaṃ ca "vikalpamātraṃ saṃsāraḥ" ity ukter asya savikalpatvam abhihitaṃ syāt | nirvikalpatvaṃ ca sahajatayābhimatam itīdam api vighaṭate | tathā ca—

	sahajānandasvabhāvo 'haṃ paramāntaṃ viramādikam | 

ity etad api vighaṭate | tathā—

	tat sādhyaṃ yoginītantre sahajākhyaṃ mahāsukham |
	paramānte bhavel lakṣyaṃ viramādau ca yatnataḥ || 

ity ādikam api vighaṭate | tathā—

	prathamaṃ kalaśābhiṣekaṃ dvitīyaṃ guhyam uttamam |
	prajñājñānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vai caturthaṃ tat punas tathā || 

iti | prajñājñānābhiṣekas tu sahajābhiṣeko yata idam api pratihanyate | ata evamādigranthavighaṭanenāgamavirodhāt tṛtīye vikalparūpo vimardo naiṣitavyaḥ | yatas tatra nirvikalpakavedanam evāste |

root:
anupamasukharūpī śrīnivāso 'nivāso
nirupamadaśadevīrūpavidyaḥ savidyaḥ |
tribhuvanahitasaukhyaprāptikāro 'vikāro
jayati kamalapāṇir yāvad āśāvikāśāḥ || 1 ||
commentary: pariharati śāstram iti | yadaivāsya śāstrasyedaṃ prayojanam ity uktaṃ tadaiva tayor upāyopeyalakṣaṇaḥ sambandho 'rthād ukta eva | na caivam arthaprāptam arthaṃ sūtrakārā akṣarair nibadhnanti asūtratvaprasaṅgād iti ||

ānando brahmaṇo rūpaṃ tac ca mokṣe 'bhhivyajyate || SeNi 14 ||
commentary: maṇḍala ityādi | etat tantroktamaṇḍala iti bhāvaḥ | samāhito 'nuddhatakāyavāṅmanovyāpārāt | śraddhā abhisampratyayaḥ | yatna udyogaḥ ||

root:

commentary: paṭarūpeṇeti | paṭaṃ lekhayet iti bhāvaḥ ||

root:
pratipadamidamapi nigadati mādhava tava caraṇe patitāham |
tvayi vimukhe mayi sapadi sudhānidhirapi tanute tanudāham ||
commentary: sā rādhikā pratipadaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ nigadati vakti | kim idam | idamiti brūte | sapadi tatkṣaṇādeva | sudhānidhirapi candro 'pi tanudāhaṃ dehasaṃtāpaṃ tanute vistārayati | anena kimuktam | svāmini viparīte sati sajjano 'pi duḥkhadāyako bhavatītyarthaḥ |

root:
vraṇaduḥkhalavād bhīto rakṣāmi vraṇam ādarāt |
saṃghātaparvatāghātād bhītaś cittavraṇaṃ na kim || 5.20 ||
commentary:
yathāprasiddhita idam udāharaṇam, na tu punar manāg api sādṛśyam astīty āha.

īṣanmātraṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhalavo vraṇakṛtaḥ. tasmād bhīto rakṣāmi vraṇam. prakṛtānurodhe rakṣatīti pāṭho yuktaḥ. ādarāt tātparyeṇa. saṃghātanarakaprabhavād anekavarṣasahasrānubhūyamānaduḥkhāt parvatāghātāt sarvato vyāptiprahārāt bhītaḥ cittavraṇaṃ na kiṃ rakṣed iti prakṛtena saṃbandhaḥ. yadi vā, ahaṃ tu kiṃ na rakṣāmīti pariṇāmena yojanīyam. athavā, evam utpāditabodhicittena manasā cintayitavyam ity avatāryate. tadā rakṣāmīti.

root:
dhūmajyotiḥsalilamarutāṃ saṃnipātaḥ kva meghaḥ  
sandeśārthāḥ kva paṭukaraṇaiḥ prāṇibhiḥ prāpaṇīyāḥ |  
ity autsukyād aparigaṇayan guhyakas taṃ yayāce  
kāmārtā hi prakṛtikṛpaṇāś cetanācetaneṣu ||
commentary: nanu cetana sādhyam arthaṃ katham acetanena kārayituṃ pravṛtta ity apekṣāyāṃ kaviḥ samādhatte—dhūmeti || dhūmaś ca jyotiś ca salilaṃ ca marudvāyuś ca teṣāṃ sannipātaḥ saṅghāto meghaḥ kva | acetanatvāt sandeśānarha ity arthaḥ | paṭukaraṇaiḥ samarthendriyaiḥ || "karaṇaṃ sādhakatamaṃ kṣetragātrendriyeṣv api" ity amaraḥ || prāṇibhiś cetanaiḥ || "prāṇī tu cetano janmī" ity amaraḥ || prāpaṇīyāḥ prāpayitavyāḥ | sandiśyanta iti sandeśāsta evārthāḥ kva | ity evam autsukyād iṣṭārthodyuktatvāt || "iṣṭārthodyukta utsukaḥ" ity amaraḥ || sampradānatvāt kuśalapraśnenābhimukhīcakārety arthaḥ | aparigaṇayann avicārayan guhyako yakṣas taṃ meghaṃ yayāce yācitavān || "yācṛ yācñāyām" || tathā hi | kāmārtā madanāturāś cetanāścācetanāś ca teṣu viṣaye prakṛtikṛpaṇāḥ svabhāvadīnāḥ | kāmāndhānāṃ yuktāyuktavivekaśūnyatvād acetanayācñā na virudhyata ity arthaḥ || atra meghasandeśayor virūpayor ghaṭanād viṣamālaṅkāraḥ | tad uktaṃ—"viruddhakāryasyotpattir yatrānarthasya vā bhavet | virūpaghaṭanā cāsau viṣamālaṅkṛtis tridhā" || iti | sā cārthāntaranyāsānuprāṇitā tatsamarthakatvenaiva caturthapāde tasyopanyāsāt ||

root:
maddhitāya mamārthāya anukampāya me vibho |
māyājālābhisaṃbodher yathā lābhī bhavāmy aham || 7 ||
commentary:
aparam āha.

uddhatam iti saddharmādiśravaṇapramādād api uddhatam, vikṣepabahulam ity arthaḥ. sopahāsaṃ vāgviheṭhanārambhakaṃ tayā yuktaṃ vā. mānaś cittasyonnatiḥ. madaḥ svadharme cittasyābhiniveśaḥ. tābhyām anvitaṃ tatsaṃprayuktam. utprāsaḥ kāyikī viheṭhanā. tena sahotkaṭam. vakraṃ kuṭilaṃ śaṭhaṃ vā. vañcakaṃ pratārakaṃ māyāvi vā. yadi mano bhavet, sthātavyaṃ kāṣṭhavat tadeti saṃbandhaḥ.

commentary: aṣṭāṅgam ity aṣṭaprakāram uktalakṣaṇam eva ||

root:

tad dhyeyaṃ cintitaṃ yac ca dhyānaṃ yasmād vicintanam || 20 ||
commentary: sphoṭo vikāśaḥ. moṭanaṃ saṅkocaḥ. te ubhe mudre, hevajreṇa kṛtatvād iti mahān saṃkṣepaḥ. tad dhyeyam ityādi. hevajrāhaṃkāriṇo yā kācit cintā tad eva dhyānam ity arthaḥ. yasmād iti dhyai cintāyām iti dhātupāṭhād ity abhiprāyaḥ. ukto mahāmokṣasukhalakṣaṇaḥ paramārtho yaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ, tasya sākṣātkaraṇaṃ bhāvanayā. bhāvanāpariniṣpattir mukhyaṃ dhyānam.

samaraśamitadaśakaṇṭha jaya jaya deva hare || 1.22 ||
commentary: he janakasutākṛtabhūṣaṇa | janakasya sutā sītā tasyāḥ kṛtaṃ śokanivṛttikādi bhūṣaṇamalaṅkaraṇaṃ yena sa tathā tasya saṃbodhanam | punaḥ kiṃbhūta | jitadūṣaṇa | jito dūṣaṇo rākṣaso yena sa tathā tasya saṃbodhanam | punaḥ kiṃbhūta | samaraśamitadaśakaṇṭha | samare saṃgrāme śamitaḥ śāntiṃ prāpito daśakaṇṭho rāvaṇo yena sa tathā tasya saṃbodhanam |

commentary: anenaiva jagadekarūpatām āha—yad yad ityādi | sugamam ||

root:
alasanimīlitalocanayā pulakāvalilalitakapolam |
śramajalasakalakalevarayā varamadanamadādatilolam ||
commentary:
nanv apratiṣṭhānam acintyatā | sā cintyamānā āvaraṇatayā malam eveti śaṅkānirāsārtham āha—anābhogam ityādi | tac cāpratiṣṭhānam acintyaṃ jñānaṃ na tadvicārāgataṃ kim tarhy anābhogaṃ svarasābhyāgatam | kutaḥ | sañcintya vimṛśya yad acintyaṃ tad yasmād acintyaṃ na bhavati | tad uktaṃ jñānasiddhau—

	bauddhaṃ jñānam anābhogaṃ nirvikalpam ataḥ smṛtam |
	sañcintya kāraṇābhāvān na tu niścintyatā bhavet || 

iti ||

commentary: mudrāṇāṃ bodhārthaṃ sveṣṭadevatāprabhāvaṃ darśayann āha—mudrās tāvad ityādi | śabareśasyeti siddhaśrīśabarapādasya | śeṣaṃ subodham ||

prajñājñānād uttaraṃ prāptarāmā-

commentary: he paṇḍitajana śrījayadevakaveḥ uditaṃ udāraṃ sundaraṃ tvaṃ śṛṇu | kiṃbhūtam | sukhadaṃ śrutimātreṇa | punaḥ kiṃbhūtam | śubhadaṃ kalyāṇadam | punaḥ kiṃbhūtam | bhavasāram | bhave saṃsāre sārabhūtam |

root:

commentary:
ahaṃ caināṃ dhārayiṣyāmy ā niryāṇād nirvāṇaṃ yāvat | kiṃbhūto dṛḍhāśayaḥ | ḍṛḍho 'vicala āśayo 'bhiprāyo yasyāsau dṛḍhāśaya iti || anetaitad uktaṃ bhavati | tryadhvavartibhis tathāgatair yā bhāṣitā sā nāmasaṃgītiḥ | ato 'sya dharmaparyāyasyākāśatulyatāṃ saṃdarśayati | tathā coktaṃ |

utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmateti pradarśitaṃ bhavatīti || 

yathā bhavāmy ahaṃ ityādi | he nātha yathā sarvasaṃbuddhaguhyadhṛg bhavāmy ahaṃ tathā prakāśayatv iti pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ | dhṛg ity ayaṃ śuddhapāṭhaḥ ||

root:

commentary:
atityāgaṃ niṣedhayan punar ātmarakṣām upadarśayann āha.

commentary: pāṇḍv iti || he megha, tvayy āsanne sanikṛṣṭe sati daśārṇo nāma janapadāḥ sūcibhinnaiḥ sūciṣu mukulāgreṣu bhinnair vikasitaiḥ || "ketakīmukulāgreṣu sūciḥ syāt" iti śabdārṇave || ketakaiḥ ketakīkusumaiḥ pāṇḍucchāyā haritavarṇā upavanānāṃ vṛtayaḥ kaṇṭakaśākhāvaraṇā yeṣu te tathoktāḥ || "prākāro varaṇaḥ sālaḥ prācīraṃ prāntato vṛtiḥ" ity amaraḥ || tathā gṛhabalibhujāṃ kākādigrāmapakṣiṇāṃ nīḍārambhaiḥ kulāya nirmāṇaiḥ || "kulāyo nīḍam astriyām" ity amaraḥ || cityāyā imāni caityāni rathyāvṛkṣāḥ || "caityam āyatane buddhavandye codeśapādape" iti viśvaḥ || ākulāni saṅkīrṇāni grāmeṣu caityāni yeṣu te tathoktāḥ | tathā pariṇataiḥ pakvaiḥ phalaiḥ śyāmāni yāni jambūvanāni tair antā ramyāḥ || "mṛtāvavasite ramye samāptāvanta iṣyate" iti śabdārṇave || tathā katipayeṣv eva dineṣu sthāyino haṃsā yeṣu te tathoktā evaṃvidhāḥ sampatsyante bhaviṣyanti || "poṭāyuvatistokakatipaya-" ityādinā kavipayaśabdasyottarapadatve 'pi na tacchabdasyottaratvam asty asya śāstrasya prāyikatvāt ||

commentary:
kṛtvetyādi. svādhipaṃ sveṣṭadaivataṃ sākṣāt kṛtvāmukhīkṛtya sātarūpaṃ sukhaikasvabhāvam, paścād devatākāraṃ parityajya, sukhamātraṃ phalaṃ sādhyaṃ vyavasthitaṃ syāt.

nanu yadi sākṣāt kṛtvāpi devatākāras tyaktavyaḥ, tarhi prathamam eva kasmād vibhāvitaḥ? sukhamātram eva dvitīyasādhyavat kiṃ na vibhāvitam? kiṃ vṛthāprayāsenety āha—śuddham ityādi. śuddhaṃ kevalaṃ devatākāravirahitaṃ sukhamātraṃ naiva sākṣāt kartuṃ śakyate, ākārarahitasya sukhasyānupalambhāt. tasmāt tena kāraṇenākāro bhāvitaḥ svādhipasyeti tṛtīyam. ayam arthaḥ—devatākārasaṃvalitam eva sukhaṃ vibhāvya, sākṣātkṛte devatākāraṃ tyaktvā, sukhamātram eva sādhyam uktaguṇam.

commentary: iti manasi nidhāya tathaiva saṃyatātmā tiṣṭhet. trapādarabhayānvitaḥ—apratirūpe karmaṇi trapā lajjā, śikṣāyām ādaraḥ, tadatikrame bhayam. buddhabodhisattveṣv eva vā trapādayaḥ. evaṃ sati aparo 'pi viśeṣaḥ syād ity āha—buddhetyādi. tad evaṃ viharatas tasya pratikṣaṇam akāmata eva buddhānusmṛtiḥ syāt.

commentary: harismaraṇe śrikṛṣṇānucintane yadi mano hṛdayaṃ sarasaṃ sarāgaṃ tavāsti | yadi ca vilāsakalāsu tava kutūhalamasti | vipūrvo las kāntau dhātuḥ | vilāsānāṃ kalāḥ tāsu | kautūhalaṃ kautukaṃ ca kutukaṃ ca kutūhalam ityamaraḥ | tadā he budhajana jayadevasya kaveḥ sarasvatīṃ vāṇīṃ gṛṇu ākarṇaya | kathaṃbhūtāṃ sarasvatīm | madhurakomalakāntapadāvalīm | madhuraṃ svādu karṇayeyam | komalaṃ snigdham | kāntaṃ kamanīyam | etairguṇairupetā padāvalī padapaṅktiryasyāḥ sā tathā tām |

naikayānyastriyā kuryād yānaṃ śayanam āsanam |

commentary:
ekayādvitīyayānyastriyā. gṛhipravrajitayor idam iha sādhāraṇam ity anyagrahaṇam. na kuryād yānādi. saṃkṣepeṇa saṃkalayya darśayann āha. lokānāṃ yat prasādajanakaṃ na bhavati, tat sarva dṛṣṭvā śāstre vyavahāre vā. pṛṣṭvā vijñān. varjayet. anenaitad darśitaṃ bhavati—dṛṣṭe 'pi yadbādhākaram evaṃvidhaṃ tadvarjayet āpattir bhavatīti. yaduktam—

iti.

yathāha- katame ca te bodhisattvasamudācārāḥ? yāvadiha bodhisattvo nāghaḥsthāne viharati, nākāle | nākāle bhāṇī bhavati | nākālajño bhavati | nādeśajño bhavati | yatonidānamasyāntike sattvā aprasādaṃ pratisaṃvedayeyuḥ | sa sarvasattvānurakṣayā ātmanaśca bodhisaṃbhāraparipūraṇārthaṃ samyagīryāpatho bhavati, mṛdubhāṇī mandabhāṇī asaṃsargabahulaḥ pravivekābhimukhaḥ suprasannamukhaḥ iti ||

commentary: mahābhavetyādi | tatra mahābhavādrisaṃbhetteti mahāsthāmaprāptaḥ | bhavaḥ paṇcopādānaskandhāḥ | ta evādrir ajñānaśailatvāt | tasya samyagaviparītajñānalābhād bhañjanaśīlaḥ saṃbhettā | mahāṃś cāsau bhavādrisaṃbhettā ca mahābhavādrisaṃbhettā || mahāvajradharo ghana iti sarvāpāyañjahaḥ | mahāvajraṃ samantabhadrajñānaṃ tad dhārayatīti mahāvajradharaḥ | nibiḍatvān mūrtimattvāc ca ghanaḥ || mahākrūro mahāraudra iti sarvaśokatamonirghātamatiḥ | mahāṃś cāsau krūraś ca mahākrūraḥ | durdāntānāṃ sattvānāṃ mahākrodharūpasaṃdarśanāt | mahāraudra iti | śānto 'py asau bhagavān mañjuśrīḥ sattvavinayavaśād raudratām api darśayatīti || mahābhayabhayaṃkara iti jālinīprabhaḥ | mahābhayo mahābhairavarūpadhārī śaṃkara iti | tasyāpi bhayaṃ karotīti mahābhayabhayaṃkaraḥ ||

commentary:
idam api bodhisattvenābhyasanīyam ity āha.

dakṣaḥ sarvatra paṭupracāraḥ. utthānasaṃpannaḥ kausīdyāpanayanād vīryasamanvāgataḥ. ata eva svayam eva sarvaṃ karaṇīyam, na parāpekṣā kvacid api karmaṇi kāryā. idam eva nāvakāśa ityādinā darśayati.

commentary:
syād etat—yady api evam, tathāpi bhaktāc chādanamātreṇāpi paripālanīya ity atrāha.

yadi nāma bhṛtyakarmakaraṇaṃ tathāpi tatrānavasthāyisvabhāve vicakṣaṇo jñātvaiva pravartate, evaṃ prakṛte 'pi taddharmiṇi kenābhiprāyeṇa he manaḥ, tvaṃ kuruṣe vyayam upakaraṇopakṣayam?

commentary:
ata idam abhidhīyate.

śikṣyate upādīyate gṛhītasaṃvaraṇeneti vihiteṣu karaṇīyatā, pratiṣiddheṣv akaraṇaṃ śikṣā, tāṃ rakṣituṃ paripālayituṃ kāmena icchatā bodhisattvena ātmacittaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ prayatnata iti kathayiṣyamāṇāt. atha śikṣārakṣaṇādhikāre kim iti cittaṃ rakṣyata ity āha—na śikṣeti. anyathā śikṣaiva rakṣitum aśakyā calam anāyattaṃ cittam arakṣatā, cittasya calatāyāṃ śikṣāyāḥ sthairyāyogāt.

bhagavato mahānirvāṇaśayyām iva śayyāṃ parikalpayet. abhimatayā diśā śiro vidhāya, dakṣiṇena pārśvena, pādasyopari pādam ādhāya, dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum upadhānaṃ kṛtvā, vāmaṃ ca prasārya jaṅghopari niveśya, cīvaraiḥ susaṃvṛtakāyaḥ, smṛtaḥ, saṃprajānānaḥ, utthānasaṃjñī, ālokasaṃjñī, śayitaḥ, nācittakamiddhāvaṣṭabdhaḥ. na ca nidrāsukham ākhādayet, na ca pārśvasukham anyatra yāvad evaiṣāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ sthitaye yāpanāyai iti. laghutthānaḥ śīghram evottiṣṭhet. na tu jṛmbhikāṃ gātramoṭanaṃ kurvann ālasyopahitaś cireṇa. etebhya eva sarvebhyaḥ pūrvam eva.
